+ <!-- FROM VISION TO EXECUTION -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <div class="section-kicker">The Foundation</div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">From Vision to Execution — Building Organizations That Think Strategically and Operate Efficiently</h2>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="max-width: 50rem;">
+ 3N Consulting's Strategy & Operations practice helps organizations define where they want to go — and build the operational discipline to get there. We partner with executives, boards, and public leaders to translate ambition into structured, achievable results. Our methodology integrates corporate strategy, financial analysis, organizational design, and Lean operational transformation — giving decision-makers clarity, alignment, and measurable performance improvement.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- CORPORATE & GROWTH STRATEGY -->
 <section class="section">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
- <div class="section-kicker">Coming Soon</div>
- <h2 class="section-title">Content will be added</h2>
+ <div class="section-kicker">Strategic Direction</div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">Corporate & Growth Strategy</h2>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ Every successful organization begins with a clear sense of purpose — but success depends on transforming that purpose into an actionable plan. 3N Consulting helps leaders sharpen strategic direction through rigorous analysis and pragmatic execution planning. We conduct market, competitive, and stakeholder assessments to define where an organization can grow most effectively — identifying core strengths, adjacent opportunities, and potential risks.
+ </p>
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 1rem;">
+ Our consultants bring decades of experience advising Fortune 500 corporations, state institutions, and private enterprises on strategic planning, portfolio optimization, and performance alignment. We guide leadership teams in setting clear goals, prioritizing initiatives, and developing operating models that connect long-term strategy with day-to-day performance.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- MERGERS, ACQUISITIONS & INTEGRATION -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <div class="section-kicker">Growth Through Integration</div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">Mergers, Acquisitions & Organizational Integration</h2>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ Growth often requires change — and change demands precision. 3N Consulting supports clients through the full M&A lifecycle, from strategic due diligence and synergy assessment to post-merger integration and value capture. We help acquirers identify operational and cultural risks early, establish integration governance, and build alignment across teams and systems.
+ </p>
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 1rem;">
+ Our M&A advisors combine financial and operational expertise to ensure that every transaction delivers sustained value — not just a completed deal. Whether advising private equity portfolios, institutional expansions, or strategic partnerships, we focus on integrating vision, structure, and execution into one cohesive growth strategy.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- OPERATIONAL EXCELLENCE & LEAN TRANSFORMATION -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <div class="section-kicker">Continuous Improvement</div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">Operational Excellence & Lean Transformation</h2>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ Strategy without disciplined execution is just intent. 3N Consulting's operational practice is built on Lean principles — emphasizing continuous improvement, waste reduction, and performance transparency across processes and functions. We assess how work gets done, identify inefficiencies, and design workflows that deliver more value with less effort.
+ </p>
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 1rem;">
+ Our team helps clients create a culture of continuous improvement through practical tools such as value stream mapping, process standardization, performance dashboards, and KPI alignment. We emphasize measurable outcomes: shorter cycle times, improved quality, lower costs, and stronger accountability. Beyond process redesign, we help leaders sustain gains through governance structures, communication plans, and workforce engagement models that embed operational discipline at every level.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- KEY CAPABILITIES -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <div class="section-kicker">Our Expertise</div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">Strategic & Operational Excellence</h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
- Detailed information about Strategy & Operations services will be populated here.
+ Our Strategy & Operations practice encompasses:
 </p>
 </div>
+
+ <div class="grid-3">
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Corporate Strategy</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Market analysis, competitive assessment, and strategic planning that drives growth and competitive advantage.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Financial Analysis</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Performance modeling, cost analysis, and financial planning that supports strategic decision-making.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Organizational Design</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Structure optimization and talent alignment that enable effective strategy execution.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Lean Transformation</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">

+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">M&A Advisory</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Due diligence, integration planning, and value capture across the full M&A lifecycle.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Performance Management</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ KPI development, dashboarding, and governance structures that drive accountability and results.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+

+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ What distinguishes 3N Consulting is our ability to bridge strategic intent and operational reality. Our Strategy & Operations team brings together former executives, management consultants, and industry specialists who understand both the boardroom and the front line. We combine analytical rigor with a deep respect for organizational culture — ensuring that every transformation is not only efficient, but sustainable.
+ </p>
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 1rem;">
+ By integrating strategic planning, operational excellence, and financial insight, we enable clients to make better decisions, execute with confidence, and achieve measurable impact. From corporate transformations and higher education modernization to government efficiency initiatives, our clients trust 3N Consulting to help them think boldly, operate efficiently, and deliver results that last.
+ </p>
 </div>
 </section>

Here are the instructions for the Human Capital & Change Management page: Human Capital and Change Management"},{"type":"text","text":"Human Capital"},{"type":"text","text":"Empowering People to Drive Performance"},{"type":"text","text":"At 3N Consulting, we believe that organizational transformation succeeds or fails on one factor above all others — people. Our Human Capital practice helps organizations align their workforce, leadership, and culture with strategic goals to achieve measurable improvements in performance, engagement, and service delivery."},{"type":"text","text":"We partner with clients to design human capital strategies that unlock potential at every level of the organization — ensuring that talent, structure, and leadership are not just managed, but purposefully aligned to mission and results. Our approach combines quantitative analysis, behavioral insight, and organizational design to create workplaces that perform better, communicate more effectively, and adapt more confidently to change."},{"type":"text","text":"Strategic Workforce Planning & Talent Optimization"},{"type":"text","text":"3N Consulting helps organizations build the right workforce for the future. Through strategic workforce planning, we identify critical roles, assess skill gaps, and design data-informed strategies to ensure that staffing aligns with both short-term priorities and long-term growth. Our consultants develop frameworks for recruitment, retention, and succession planning that balance efficiency with equity — ensuring continuity, capability, and inclusivity across the enterprise."},{"type":"text","text":"We also help clients define clear competency models and performance expectations, building transparency and accountability into the talent lifecycle. The result is a workforce strategy that supports operational agility and strengthens the organization’s ability to execute its mission."},{"type":"text","text":"Leadership & Organizational Development"},{"type":"text","text":"Strong leadership drives every successful transformation. 3N’s leadership development programs focus on building strategic capacity, emotional intelligence, and decision-making discipline among executives and emerging leaders alike. We work with management teams to clarify leadership roles, streamline decision structures, and strengthen communication across levels of the organization."},{"type":"text","text":"Our methodology blends executive coaching, team alignment sessions, and performance feedback loops to ensure that leaders are not only empowered to lead change — but equipped to sustain it. The outcome is a culture of trust, clarity, and accountability that accelerates performance improvement and fosters long-term engagement."},{"type":"text","text":"Culture, Engagement & Change Management"},{"type":"text","text":"An organization’s culture defines how strategy becomes reality. We assess and strengthen workplace culture to ensure it supports collaboration, inclusion, and innovation. 3N’s consultants design targeted engagement strategies that improve communication, reduce turnover, and align employees around shared goals."},{"type":"text","text":"When major change occurs — whether structural, digital, or strategic — we apply a proven change management framework that prioritizes transparency, readiness, and adoption. By understanding how people experience change, we help leaders minimize resistance, sustain momentum, and embed new ways of working that endure beyond the transformation phase."},{"type":"text","text":"Human Capital Analytics & Governance"},{"type":"text","text":"We integrate data and governance to bring objectivity and discipline to workforce decisions. 3N Consulting helps organizations define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) for human capital management — such as workforce productivity, engagement levels, leadership pipeline health, and training ROI."},{"type":"text","text":"Through structured governance processes, we ensure that HR policies, compliance systems, and organizational structures operate efficiently and transparently. Our consultants provide insights that enable leadership to make informed, evidence-based decisions — transforming HR from a support function into a strategic partner driving organizational success."},{"type":"text","text":"Lasting Value Through People"},{"type":"text","text":"3N Consulting’s Human Capital methodology is rooted in a simple truth: performance improves when people are engaged, aligned, and empowered. We combine strategic foresight with practical implementation to help organizations build resilient workforces, high-performing cultures, and leadership teams capable of sustaining excellence."},{"type":"text","text":"Whether guiding workforce redesign for public institutions, advising boards on leadership strategy, or supporting organizational change in the private sector, 3N’s Human Capital practice delivers what every transformation requires most — people who believe in the mission, and leaders who know how to bring it to life."}],"context":{"currentFile":{"path":"index.html","fsPath":"/Users/anupeesay/PycharmProjects/3NWebsite2/index.html","sources":["opened_tab"],"content":"<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

 /* Inline CSS so this preview actually renders with layout */
 *, *::before, *::after { box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
 html, body {
 font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
 color: #111827;
 background-color: #f9fafb;
 line-height: 1.6;
 }
 img, video { max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; }
 .site-wrapper { min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; }
 .main { flex: 1; }

 .site-header {
 background: #020617;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 border-bottom: 1px solid #1f2937;
 position: sticky;
 top: 0;
 z-index: 10;
 }
 .nav-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
 display: flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: space-between;
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 .brand-title {
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: 0.08em;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 font-size: 0.9rem;
 }
 .brand-tagline { font-size: 0.75rem; color: #9ca3af; }
 .brand-logo { height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px; }
 .nav-links { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; }
 .nav-links a {
 color: #e5e7eb;
 text-decoration: none;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 padding: 0.35rem 0.7rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
 }
 .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }
 .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
 .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }

 @media (max-width: 768px) {
 .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
 .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
 .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
 .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
 }

 .hero {
 padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .hero-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 3fr) minmax(0, 2fr);
 gap: 3rem;
 align-items: center;
 }
 .hero-eyebrow {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.13em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
 }
 .hero-title {
 font-size: clamp(2.1rem, 3vw, 2.7rem);
 font-weight: 750;
 letter-spacing: -0.03em;
 margin-bottom: 1rem;
 }
 .hero-highlight { color: #38bdf8; }
 .hero-body {
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 color: #d1d5db;
 max-width: 32rem;
 margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
 }
 .hero-meta {
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1.25rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 2rem;
 }
 .chip {
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.7);
 }
 .hero-media {
 border-radius: 1.2rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, rgba(56,189,248,0.12), transparent 50%),
 radial-gradient(circle at bottom right, rgba(52,211,153,0.12), transparent 55%);
 padding: 1rem;
 display: flex;
 flex-direction: column;
 gap: 0.75rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .badge-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.5rem; align-items: center; }
 .badge {
 border-radius: 999px;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.7rem;
 font-size: 0.7rem;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.12em;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.8);
 white-space: nowrap;
 }
 .badge-outline { background: transparent; }
 .logo-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; align-items: center; }
 .logo-row img { max-height: 40px; width: auto; }
 .caps-label {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.16em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 }

 .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }
 .section-alt { background: #f3f4f6; }
 .section-inner { max-width: 1120px; margin: 0 auto; }
 .section-header { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; }
 .section-kicker {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.15em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 font-weight: 600;

 margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
 }
 .section-title {

 font-weight: 700;

 margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
 }
 .section-subtitle {

 }

 .grid-3 {

 }

 }
 @media (max-width: 640px) {

 .card {

 background: #ffffff;

 }
 .card-title {

 font-weight: 600;

 }
 .card-body { font-size: 0.9rem; color: #4b5563; }

 .testimonial-quote { font-style: italic; margin-bottom: 0.4rem; }
 .testimonial-client { font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.2rem; }
 .testimonial-ratings { font-size: 0.8rem; color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.4; }

 .btn {
 display: inline-flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: center;
 gap: 0.4rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.55rem 1.2rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 text-decoration: none;
 border: 1px solid transparent;
 cursor: pointer;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease, border-color 0.15s ease, transform 0.08s ease;
 }

 .site-footer {

 }
 .footer-inner {

 }

 }
 .footer-links a {

<body>

 <!-- WHY 3N -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Why 3N Consulting?</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">
 Because we maintain integrity. Because we value clients. And because we deliver results.
 </h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our model is built for outcome-based partnerships, true ownership of commitments,
 and a cost structure that puts client value first.
 </p>

 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Ownership</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Ownership:</strong> We don't "staff"—we own results and keep our commitments.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Cost structure</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Cost Structure:</strong> Frugal by design—invest in talent, minimize overhead, pass savings on.
 </p>
 </article>

- <!-- Content sections will be added here -->
+ <!-- HUMAN CAPITAL -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <div class="section-kicker">Human Capital</div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">Empowering People to Drive Performance</h2>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ At 3N Consulting, we believe that organizational transformation succeeds or fails on one factor above all others — people. Our Human Capital practice helps organizations align their workforce, leadership, and culture with strategic goals to achieve measurable improvements in performance, engagement, and service delivery.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem; margin-top: 1rem;">
+ We partner with clients to design human capital strategies that unlock potential at every level of the organization — ensuring that talent, structure, and leadership are not just managed, but purposefully aligned to mission and results. Our approach combines quantitative analysis, behavioral insight, and organizational design to create workplaces that perform better, communicate more effectively, and adapt more confidently to change.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- STRATEGIC WORKFORCE PLANNING -->
 <section class="section">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
- <div class="section-kicker">Coming Soon</div>
- <h2 class="section-title">Content will be added</h2>
- <p class="section-subtitle">
- Detailed information about Human Capital & Change Management services will be populated here.
- </p>
- </div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">Strategic Workforce Planning & Talent Optimization</h2>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ 3N Consulting helps organizations build the right workforce for the future. Through strategic workforce planning, we identify critical roles, assess skill gaps, and design data-informed strategies to ensure that staffing aligns with both short-term priorities and long-term growth.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem; margin-top: 1rem;">
+ Our consultants develop frameworks for recruitment, retention, and succession planning that balance efficiency with equity — ensuring continuity, capability, and inclusivity across the enterprise. We also help clients define clear competency models and performance expectations, building transparency and accountability into the talent lifecycle. The result is a workforce strategy that supports operational agility and strengthens the organization's ability to execute its mission.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- LEADERSHIP & ORGANIZATIONAL DEVELOPMENT -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Leadership & Organizational Development</h2>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ Strong leadership drives every successful transformation. 3N's leadership development programs focus on building strategic capacity, emotional intelligence, and decision-making discipline among executives and emerging leaders alike.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem; margin-top: 1rem;">
+ We work with management teams to clarify leadership roles, streamline decision structures, and strengthen communication across levels of the organization. Our methodology blends executive coaching, team alignment sessions, and performance feedback loops to ensure that leaders are not only empowered to lead change — but equipped to sustain it. The outcome is a culture of trust, clarity, and accountability that accelerates performance improvement and fosters long-term engagement.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- CULTURE, ENGAGEMENT & CHANGE MANAGEMENT -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Culture, Engagement & Change Management</h2>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ An organization's culture defines how strategy becomes reality. We assess and strengthen workplace culture to ensure it supports collaboration, inclusion, and innovation.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem; margin-top: 1rem;">
+ 3N's consultants design targeted engagement strategies that improve communication, reduce turnover, and align employees around shared goals. When major change occurs — whether structural, digital, or strategic — we apply a proven change management framework that prioritizes transparency, readiness, and adoption. By understanding how people experience change, we help leaders minimize resistance, sustain momentum, and embed new ways of working that endure beyond the transformation phase.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- HUMAN CAPITAL ANALYTICS & GOVERNANCE -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Human Capital Analytics & Governance</h2>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ We integrate data and governance to bring objectivity and discipline to workforce decisions. 3N Consulting helps organizations define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) for human capital management.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem; margin-top: 1rem;">
+ We track indicators such as workforce productivity, engagement levels, leadership pipeline health, and training ROI. Through structured governance processes, we ensure that HR policies, compliance systems, and organizational structures operate efficiently and transparently. Our consultants provide insights that enable leadership to make informed, evidence-based decisions — transforming HR from a support function into a strategic partner driving organizational success.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- LASTING VALUE -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Lasting Value Through People</h2>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ 3N Consulting's Human Capital methodology is rooted in a simple truth: performance improves when people are engaged, aligned, and empowered. We combine strategic foresight with practical implementation to help organizations build resilient workforces, high-performing cultures, and leadership teams capable of sustaining excellence.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem; margin-top: 1rem;">
+ Whether guiding workforce redesign for public institutions, advising boards on leadership strategy, or supporting organizational change in the private sector, 3N's Human Capital practice delivers what every transformation requires most — people who believe in the mission, and leaders who know how to bring it to life.
+ </p>
 </div>
 </section>

Through strategic workforce planning, we identify critical roles, assess skill gaps, and design data-informed strategies to ensure that staffing aligns with both short-term priorities and long-term growth.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3Cp style=%22color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem; margin-top: 1rem;%22%3E%0A Our consultants develop frameworks for recruitment, retention, and succession planning that balance efficiency with equity %E2%80%94 ensuring continuity, capability, and inclusivity across the enterprise. We also help clients define clear competency models and performance expectations, building transparency and accountability into the talent lifecycle. The result is a workforce strategy that supports operational agility and strengthens the organization's ability to execute its mission.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- LEADERSHIP & ORGANIZATIONAL DEVELOPMENT --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section section-alt%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-header%22%3E%0A %3Ch2 class=%22section-title%22%3ELeadership & Organizational Development%3C/h2%3E%0A %3Cp class=%22section-subtitle%22%3E%0A Strong leadership drives every successful transformation. 3N's leadership development programs focus on building strategic capacity, emotional intelligence, and decision-making discipline among executives and emerging leaders alike.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3Cp style=%22color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem; margin-top: 1rem;%22%3E%0A We work with management teams to clarify leadership roles, streamline decision structures, and strengthen communication across levels of the organization. Our methodology blends executive coaching, team alignment sessions, and performance feedback loops to ensure that leaders are not only empowered to lead change %E2%80%94 but equipped to sustain it. The outcome is a culture of trust, clarity, and accountability that accelerates performance improvement and fosters long-term engagement.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- CULTURE, ENGAGEMENT & CHANGE MANAGEMENT --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-header%22%3E%0A %3Ch2 class=%22section-title%22%3ECulture, Engagement & Change Management%3C/h2%3E%0A %3Cp class=%22section-subtitle%22%3E%0A An organization's culture defines how strategy becomes reality. We assess and strengthen workplace culture to ensure it supports collaboration, inclusion, and innovation.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3Cp style=%22color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem; margin-top: 1rem;%22%3E%0A 3N's consultants design targeted engagement strategies that improve communication, reduce turnover, and align employees around shared goals. When major change occurs %E2%80%94 whether structural, digital, or strategic %E2%80%94 we apply a proven change management framework that prioritizes transparency, readiness, and adoption. By understanding how people experience change, we help leaders minimize resistance, sustain momentum, and embed new ways of working that endure beyond the transformation phase.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- HUMAN CAPITAL ANALYTICS & GOVERNANCE --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section section-alt%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-header%22%3E%0A %3Ch2 class=%22section-title%22%3EHuman Capital Analytics & Governance%3C/h2%3E%0A %3Cp class=%22section-subtitle%22%3E%0A We integrate data and governance to bring objectivity and discipline to workforce decisions. 3N Consulting helps organizations define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) for human capital management.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3Cp style=%22color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem; margin-top: 1rem;%22%3E%0A We track indicators such as workforce productivity, engagement levels, leadership pipeline health, and training ROI. Through structured governance processes, we ensure that HR policies, compliance systems, and organizational structures operate efficiently and transparently. Our consultants provide insights that enable leadership to make informed, evidence-based decisions %E2%80%94 transforming HR from a support function into a strategic partner driving organizational success.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- LASTING VALUE --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-header%22%3E%0A %3Ch2 class=%22section-title%22%3ELasting Value Through People%3C/h2%3E%0A %3Cp class=%22section-subtitle%22%3E%0A 3N Consulting's Human Capital methodology is rooted in a simple truth: performance improves when people are engaged, aligned, and empowered. We combine strategic foresight with practical implementation to help organizations build resilient workforces, high-performing cultures, and leadership teams capable of sustaining excellence.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3Cp style=%22color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem; margin-top: 1rem;%22%3E%0A Whether guiding workforce redesign for public institutions, advising boards on leadership strategy, or supporting organizational change in the private sector, 3N's Human Capital practice delivers what every transformation requires most %E2%80%94 people who believe in the mission, and leaders who know how to bring it to life.%0A %3C/p

Here are the instructions for the Organizational Redesign page: Organizational Redesign"},{"type":"text","text":"Organizational Redesign"},{"type":"text","text":"Transforming Structure into Strategy"},{"type":"text","text":"Organizational Redesign is the cornerstone of 3N Consulting’s practice — our flagship service and the foundation of how we help clients achieve lasting performance. At its core, Organizational Design defines how an organization works: how decisions are made, how people and processes align, and how accountability flows. Redesign, meanwhile, is the deliberate act of reshaping that structure — resizing, reconfiguring, and reorienting teams and resources to meet new challenges and opportunities."},{"type":"text","text":"In today’s world, the cheese is constantly moving. Digital transformation, artificial intelligence, and market disruption are redefining how value is created and delivered. The organizations that thrive are those that adapt — quickly and intelligently — aligning their operating model to a changing environment. 3N Consulting helps organizations not just react to change, but design for it."},{"type":"text","text":"Why It Matters"},{"type":"text","text":"Every organization is perfectly designed to get the results it currently gets. When performance falters, growth stalls, or transformation lags, the root cause is often structural — unclear roles, misaligned leadership, duplicated functions, or outdated processes."},{"type":"text","text":"Organizational Redesign is essential because it ensures that structure follows strategy. As technology, talent, and expectations evolve, so too must the way organizations are built. 3N helps clients answer critical questions:"},{"type":"text","text":"Are we structured to deliver our mission efficiently?"},{"type":"text","text":"Do our leaders have the span of control and authority to succeed?"},{"type":"text","text":"Is our size right for the work we’re doing — or for what’s next?"},{"type":"text","text":"By addressing these questions through data-driven analysis and pragmatic implementation, we enable organizations to achieve clarity, accountability, and agility — all while improving morale and performance."},{"type":"text","text":"Why 3N Consulting Leads the Market"},{"type":"text","text":"Organizational Redesign is 3N Consulting’s defining capability. It is led by CEO Nick Gupta, who previously built and led Organization Design practices serving Fortune 500 firms and private equity portfolio companies. His background combines strategy, finance, and operations — enabling a holistic understanding of how structure impacts performance and value."},{"type":"text","text":"Today, that legacy continues under Dr. DeMuth, one of the nation’s foremost authorities in organizational effectiveness and change leadership. Together, Nick and Dr. DeMuth have built a practice that merges Fortune 500 discipline with public sector and higher education mission impact — combining evidence-based design with the empathy and adaptability required for human-centered transformation."},{"type":"text","text":"Our team is not simply experienced — we are specialists. Organizational Redesign is not a subset of what we do; it is what we do best."},{"type":"text","text":"Who We Serve"},{"type":"text","text":"3N Consulting’s Organizational Redesign services span public and private sectors, including:"},{"type":"text","text":"Fortune 500 companies seeking structural agility to compete in AI and digital-first markets."},{"type":"text","text":"Public sector agencies modernizing operating models to deliver citizen services more effectively."},{"type":"text","text":"Higher education institutions realigning roles and processes to sustain enrollment, equity, and efficiency."},{"type":"text","text":"Private equity firms optimizing portfolio companies to unlock post-acquisition value through structure and leadership alignment."},{"type":"text","text":"Across industries, our redesigns share one trait — they create measurable, sustainable impact."},{"type":"text","text":"Our Proprietary Tools: O-RAM™ and AAA™"},{"type":"text","text":"3N’s Organizational Redesign practice is powered by two proprietary frameworks:"},{"type":"text","text":"O-RAM™ (Organizational Redesign Assessment Model): A data-driven diagnostic that identifies misalignments between strategy, structure, and performance. O-RAM™ rapidly maps organizational health across leadership, roles, processes, and outcomes — pinpointing where structure helps or hinders success."},{"type":"text","text":"AAA™ (Align–Analyze–Act): A proven agile methodology that delivers “quick hits” and measurable results in short, iterative cycles. AAA™ moves redesign from theory to implementation, engaging stakeholders at every level to ensure adoption and momentum."},{"type":"text","text":"Together, these assets transform the complexity of organizational change into a structured, repeatable process that drives results — fast."},{"type":"text","text":"Our Track Record"},{"type":"text","text":"3N has executed Organizational Redesigns that have reshaped how institutions and enterprises operate:"},{"type":"text","text":"For a Maryland-based college, we restructured administrative functions and procurement processes to eliminate redundancy, strengthen accountability, and enhance student-facing services."},{"type":"text","text":"For a private manufacturer, we redesigned the leadership and production model, reducing operational friction and restoring profitability."},{"type":"text","text":"For a state agency, we modernized an antiquated division, realigning people, technology, and governance for digital transformation and stronger fiscal control."},{"type":"text","text":"Across every engagement, our redesigns lead to tangible performance gains — sharper decision-making, reduced waste, empowered leadership, and measurable mission delivery."},{"type":"text","text":"When Organizations Turn to 3N"},{"type":"text","text":"Clients engage 3N when they face moments of truth:"},{"type":"text","text":"Leadership Alignment Challenges: When the right people are in the wrong roles, and leadership dynamics are limiting outcomes."},{"type":"text","text":"Underperformance or Stagnation: When a division or function is under-delivering and the root cause isn’t clear."},{"type":"text","text":"Transformation Readiness: When technology and innovation are outpacing the current operating model."},{"type":"text","text":"Growth or Contraction: When scaling up, merging, or resizing requires rethinking the structure and decision-making model."},{"type":"text","text":"In each case, we provide not just assessment but action — a clear path from “what’s wrong” to “what’s next.”"},{"type":"text","text":"The 3N Difference"},{"type":"text","text":"3N Consulting’s Organizational Redesign is where strategy meets structure. We don’t rearrange boxes on an org chart — we realign how organizations think, lead, and deliver. Our approach blends analytical rigor with human understanding, ensuring that design is not only efficient but livable."},{"type":"text","text":"We bring the precision of private sector consulting, the purpose of public service, and the agility of an entrepreneurial firm. That is why clients return to 3N when stakes are high, missions are critical, and change must deliver."},{"type":"text","text":"At 3N Consulting, Organizational Redesign isn’t just what we offer — it’s who we are."}],"context":{"currentFile":{"path":"index.html","fsPath":"/Users/anupeesay/PycharmProjects/3NWebsite2/index.html","sources":["opened_tab"],"content":"<!DOCTYPE html>

 <h1 class="hero-title">
 Results. <span class="hero-highlight">Delivered.</span>
 </h1>
 <p class="hero-body">
 3N Consulting is a Maryland-based management consulting firm that
 builds long-term partnerships, takes ownership of outcomes, and
 practices frugality so savings flow to clients.
 </p>
 <div class="hero-meta">

 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">NMSDC</div>

 <!-- WHY 3N -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Why 3N Consulting?</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">
 Because we maintain integrity. Because we value clients. And because we deliver results.
 </h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our model is built for outcome-based partnerships, true ownership of commitments,
 and a cost structure that puts client value first.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Vested in client success</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Vested in Client Success:</strong> Outcome-based partnerships and long-term relationships.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Ownership</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Ownership:</strong> We don't "staff"—we own results and keep our commitments.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Cost structure</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Cost Structure:</strong> Frugal by design—invest in talent, minimize overhead, pass savings on.
 </p>

 <!-- TESTIMONIALS -->
 <section class="section">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header" style="display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:baseline;gap:0.75rem;flex-wrap:wrap;">

- <!-- Content sections will be added here -->
+ <!-- ORGANIZATIONAL REDESIGN FOUNDATION -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <div class="section-kicker">Organizational Redesign</div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">Transforming Structure into Strategy</h2>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ Organizational Redesign is the cornerstone of 3N Consulting's practice — our flagship service and the foundation of how we help clients achieve lasting performance. At its core, Organizational Design defines how an organization works: how decisions are made, how people and processes align, and how accountability flows.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem; margin-top: 1rem;">
+ Redesign is the deliberate act of reshaping that structure — resizing, reconfiguring, and reorienting teams and resources to meet new challenges and opportunities. In today's world, the cheese is constantly moving. Digital transformation, artificial intelligence, and market disruption are redefining how value is created and delivered. The organizations that thrive are those that adapt — quickly and intelligently — aligning their operating model to a changing environment. 3N Consulting helps organizations not just react to change, but design for it.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- WHY IT MATTERS -->
 <section class="section">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
- <div class="section-kicker">Coming Soon</div>
- <h2 class="section-title">Content will be added</h2>
- <p class="section-subtitle">
- Detailed information about Organizational Redesign services will be populated here.
- </p>
- </div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">Why It Matters</h2>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ Every organization is perfectly designed to get the results it currently gets. When performance falters, growth stalls, or transformation lags, the root cause is often structural — unclear roles, misaligned leadership, duplicated functions, or outdated processes.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem; margin-top: 1rem; margin-bottom: 1.5rem;">
+ Organizational Redesign is essential because it ensures that structure follows strategy. As technology, talent, and expectations evolve, so too must the way organizations are built. 3N helps clients answer critical questions:
+ </p>
+ <div style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.8; font-size: 0.98rem; margin-left: 1.5rem;">
+ <p style="margin-bottom: 0.75rem;">• Are we structured to deliver our mission efficiently?</p>
+ <p style="margin-bottom: 0.75rem;">• Do our leaders have the span of control and authority to succeed?</p>
+ <p style="margin-bottom: 1rem;">• Is our size right for the work we're doing — or for what's next?</p>
+ </div>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem;">
+ By addressing these questions through data-driven analysis and pragmatic implementation, we enable organizations to achieve clarity, accountability, and agility — all while improving morale and performance.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- WHY 3N LEADS THE MARKET -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Why 3N Consulting Leads the Market</h2>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ Organizational Redesign is 3N Consulting's defining capability. It is led by CEO Nick Gupta, who previously built and led Organization Design practices serving Fortune 500 firms and private equity portfolio companies.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem; margin-top: 1rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;">
+ His background combines strategy, finance, and operations — enabling a holistic understanding of how structure impacts performance and value. Today, that legacy continues under Dr. DeMuth, one of the nation's foremost authorities in organizational effectiveness and change leadership. Together, Nick and Dr. DeMuth have built a practice that merges Fortune 500 discipline with public sector and higher education mission impact — combining evidence-based design with the empathy and adaptability required for human-centered transformation.
+ </p>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem;">
+ Our team is not simply experienced — we are specialists. Organizational Redesign is not a subset of what we do; it is what we do best.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- WHO WE SERVE -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Who We Serve</h2>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ 3N Consulting's Organizational Redesign services span public and private sectors:
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ <div style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.8; font-size: 0.98rem; margin-left: 1.5rem; margin-top: 1rem;">
+ <p style="margin-bottom: 1rem;"><strong>Fortune 500 companies</strong> seeking structural agility to compete in AI and digital-first markets.</p>
+ <p style="margin-bottom: 1rem;"><strong>Public sector agencies</strong> modernizing operating models to deliver citizen services more effectively.</p>
+ <p style="margin-bottom: 1rem;"><strong>Higher education institutions</strong> realigning roles and processes to sustain enrollment, equity, and efficiency.</p>
+ <p><strong>Private equity firms</strong> optimizing portfolio companies to unlock post-acquisition value through structure and leadership alignment.</p>
+ </div>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem; margin-top: 1.5rem;">
+ Across industries, our redesigns share one trait — they create measurable, sustainable impact.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- PROPRIETARY TOOLS -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Our Proprietary Tools: O-RAM™ and AAA™</h2>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ 3N's Organizational Redesign practice is powered by two proprietary frameworks that transform complexity into structured, repeatable processes.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ <div style="margin-top: 1.5rem;">
+ <div style="margin-bottom: 2rem;">
+ <h3 style="font-size: 1.1rem; font-weight: 600; color: #111827; margin-bottom: 0.75rem;">O-RAM™ (Organizational Redesign Assessment Model)</h3>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem;">
+ A data-driven diagnostic that identifies misalignments between strategy, structure, and performance. O-RAM™ rapidly maps organizational health across leadership, roles, processes, and outcomes — pinpointing where structure helps or hinders success.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ <div>
+ <h3 style="font-size: 1.1rem; font-weight: 600; color: #111827; margin-bottom: 0.75rem;">AAA™ (Align–Analyze–Act)</h3>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem;">
+ A proven agile methodology that delivers "quick hits" and measurable results in short, iterative cycles. AAA™ moves redesign from theory to implementation, engaging stakeholders at every level to ensure adoption and momentum.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem; margin-top: 1.5rem;">
+ Together, these assets transform the complexity of organizational change into a structured, repeatable process that drives results — fast.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- TRACK RECORD -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Our Track Record</h2>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ 3N has executed Organizational Redesigns that have reshaped how institutions and enterprises operate:
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ <div style="margin-top: 1.5rem;">
+ <div style="margin-bottom: 1.5rem;">
+ <p style="color: #111827; font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">For a Maryland-based college</p>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem;">
+ We restructured administrative functions and procurement processes to eliminate redundancy, strengthen accountability, and enhance student-facing services.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ <div style="margin-bottom: 1.5rem;">
+ <p style="color: #111827; font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">For a private manufacturer</p>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem;">
+ We redesigned the leadership and production model, reducing operational friction and restoring profitability.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ <div>
+ <p style="color: #111827; font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">For a state agency</p>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem;">
+ We modernized an antiquated division, realigning people, technology, and governance for digital transformation and stronger fiscal control.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem; margin-top: 1.5rem;">
+ Across every engagement, our redesigns lead to tangible performance gains — sharper decision-making, reduced waste, empowered leadership, and measurable mission delivery.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- WHEN ORGANIZATIONS TURN TO 3N -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">When Organizations Turn to 3N</h2>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ Clients engage 3N when they face moments of truth:
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ <div style="margin-top: 1.5rem;">
+ <div style="margin-bottom: 1.5rem;">
+ <p style="color: #111827; font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">Leadership Alignment Challenges</p>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem;">
+ When the right people are in the wrong roles, and leadership dynamics are limiting outcomes.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ <div style="margin-bottom: 1.5rem;">
+ <p style="color: #111827; font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">Underperformance or Stagnation</p>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem;">
+ When a division or function is under-delivering and the root cause isn't clear.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ <div style="margin-bottom: 1.5rem;">
+ <p style="color: #111827; font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">Transformation Readiness</p>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem;">
+ When technology and innovation are outpacing the current operating model.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ <div>
+ <p style="color: #111827; font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">Growth or Contraction</p>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem;">
+ When scaling up, merging, or resizing requires rethinking the structure and decision-making model.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem; margin-top: 1.5rem;">
+ In each case, we provide not just assessment but action — a clear path from "what's wrong" to "what's next."
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- THE 3N DIFFERENCE -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">The 3N Difference</h2>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ 3N Consulting's Organizational Redesign is where strategy meets structure. We don't rearrange boxes on an org chart — we realign how organizations think, lead, and deliver.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem; margin-top: 1rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;">
+ Our approach blends analytical rigor with human understanding, ensuring that design is not only efficient but livable. We bring the precision of private sector consulting, the purpose of public service, and the agility of an entrepreneurial firm. That is why clients return to 3N when stakes are high, missions are critical, and change must deliver.
+ </p>
+ <p style="color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.7; font-size: 0.98rem; font-weight: 600;">
+ At 3N Consulting, Organizational Redesign isn't just what we offer — it's who we are.
+ </p>
 </div>
 </section>

<head>
 <meta charset="UTF-8">
 <title>3N Consulting | Results. Delivered.</title>

 *, *::before, *::after { box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
 html, body {
 font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
 color: #111827;
 background-color: #f9fafb;
 line-height: 1.6;
 }
 img, video { max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; }
 .site-wrapper { min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; }
 .main { flex: 1; }

 .site-header {
 background: #020617;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 border-bottom: 1px solid #1f2937;
 position: sticky;
 top: 0;
 z-index: 10;
 }
 .nav-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
 display: flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: space-between;
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 .brand-title {
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: 0.08em;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 font-size: 0.9rem;
 }
 .brand-tagline { font-size: 0.75rem; color: #9ca3af; }
 .brand-logo { height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px; }
 .nav-links { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; }
 .nav-links a {
 color: #e5e7eb;
 text-decoration: none;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 padding: 0.35rem 0.7rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
 }
 .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }
 .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
 .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }

 @media (max-width: 768px) {
 .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
 .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
 .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
 .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
 }

 .hero {
 padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .hero-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 3fr) minmax(0, 2fr);
 gap: 3rem;
 align-items: center;
 }
 .hero-eyebrow {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.13em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
 }
 .hero-title {
 font-size: clamp(2.1rem, 3vw, 2.7rem);
 font-weight: 750;
 letter-spacing: -0.03em;
 margin-bottom: 1rem;
 }
 .hero-highlight { color: #38bdf8; }

 margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
 }
 .hero-meta {
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1.25rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 2rem;
 }
 .chip {
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.7);
 }
 .hero-media {
 border-radius: 1.2rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, rgba(56,189,248,0.12), transparent 50%),
 radial-gradient(circle at bottom right, rgba(52,211,153,0.12), transparent 55%);
 padding: 1rem;
 display: flex;
 flex-direction: column;
 gap: 0.75rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .badge-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.5rem; align-items: center; }
 .badge {
 border-radius: 999px;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.7rem;
 font-size: 0.7rem;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.12em;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.8);
 white-space: nowrap;
 }
 .badge-outline { background: transparent; }
 .logo-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; align-items: center; }
 .logo-row img { max-height: 40px; width: auto; }
 .caps-label {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.16em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 }

 .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }
 .section-alt { background: #f3f4f6; }
 .section-inner { max-width: 1120px; margin: 0 auto; }
 .section-header { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; }
 .section-kicker {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.15em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 color: #6b7280;
 margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
 }
 .section-title {
 font-size: 1.8rem;
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: -0.02em;
 margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
 }
 .section-subtitle {
 color: #4b5563;
 max-width: 40rem;
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 }

 .grid-3 {
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0,1fr));
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 @media (max-width: 900px) {
 .hero-inner { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0,1fr)); }
 }
 @media (max-width: 640px) {
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 }

 .card {
 border-radius: 1rem;
 border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 background: #ffffff;
 padding: 1.1rem 1.1rem 1.25rem;
 box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(15,23,42,0.04);
 }
 .card-title {
 font-size: 1rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 margin-bottom: 0.4rem;
 }
 .card-body { font-size: 0.9rem; color: #4b5563; }

 .testimonial-quote { font-style: italic; margin-bottom: 0.4rem; }
 .testimonial-client { font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.2rem; }
 .testimonial-ratings { font-size: 0.8rem; color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.4; }

 .btn {
 display: inline-flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: center;
 gap: 0.4rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.55rem 1.2rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 text-decoration: none;
 border: 1px solid transparent;
 cursor: pointer;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease, border-color 0.15s ease, transform 0.08s ease;
 }
 .btn-primary { background: #38bdf8; color: #020617; border-color: #0ea5e9; }
 .btn-primary:hover { background: #0ea5e9; transform: translateY(-1px); }
 .btn-ghost { background: transparent; color: #111827; border-color: #d1d5db; }
 .btn-ghost:hover { background: #e5e7eb; }

 .site-footer {
 border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 2rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #6b7280;
 background: #f9fafb;
 }
 .footer-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1rem;
 justify-content: space-between;
 }
 .footer-links {
 display: flex;
 gap: 0.9rem;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 }
 .footer-links a {
 color: #6b7280;
 text-decoration: none;
 }
 .footer-links a:hover { text-decoration: underline; }
 .footer-image { max-width: 150px; height: auto; }
 </style>
</head>

 <section class="hero">

 Results. <span class="hero-highlight">Delivered.</span>
 </h1>
 <p class="hero-body">
 3N Consulting is a Maryland-based management consulting firm that
 builds long-term partnerships, takes ownership of outcomes, and
 practices frugality so savings flow to clients.

 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">NMSDC</div>
 </div>
 <p style="font-size:0.8rem; color:#9ca3af;">
 Proud to support Maryland's public agencies, colleges, and communities.
 </p>
 </aside>

 </section>

 <!-- WHY 3N -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Why 3N Consulting?</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">
 Because we maintain integrity. Because we value clients. And because we deliver results.
 </h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our model is built for outcome-based partnerships, true ownership of commitments,
 and a cost structure that puts client value first.
 </p>

 <div class="grid-3">

 </p>

 <article class="card">

 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Cost structure</h3>
 <p class="card-body">

 </p>

Here are the instructions for the Procurement page: Procurement Solution"},{"type":"text","text":"Transforming Procurement into a Strategic Advantage"},{"type":"text","text":"3N Consulting’s Procurement Solution is a productized offering designed to help organizations achieve cost reduction, compliance, and operational efficiency through data-driven assessment and actionable improvement. We combine management consulting rigor with analytical precision to turn procurement from a transactional function into a strategic value driver."},{"type":"text","text":"Our Procurement Solution delivers a comprehensive, evidence-based assessment of how your procurement organization performs today—and a clear roadmap for how it can perform better tomorrow."},{"type":"text","text":"The Challenge"},{"type":"text","text":"Procurement functions today face mounting pressure to deliver more value with fewer resources. Leaders must balance fiscal responsibility, vendor transparency, policy compliance, and agility—all while managing fragmented processes and outdated systems."},{"type":"text","text":"Many organizations struggle to answer key questions:"},{"type":"text","text":"Are we spending efficiently and in compliance with policy?"},{"type":"text","text":"Are we leveraging data to negotiate better contracts and supplier performance?"},{"type":"text","text":"Where can we achieve savings without compromising service quality or timelines?"},{"type":"text","text":"3N’s Procurement Solution provides those answers—clearly, quickly, and credibly."},{"type":"text","text":"Our Approach"},{"type":"text","text":"We apply a structured, data-driven framework that combines analytics, stakeholder engagement, and process evaluation to identify quick wins and long-term transformation opportunities."},{"type":"text","text":"Our solution includes:"},{"type":"text","text":"Diagnostic Assessment: Comprehensive review of current-state procurement operations, organizational structure, technology enablement, and spend management."},{"type":"text","text":"Cost & Efficiency Analysis: Quantitative evaluation of procurement spend, transaction cost, and cycle time to uncover opportunities for savings and process optimization."},{"type":"text","text":"Compliance & Policy Review: Examination of existing procurement policies, approvals, and workflows to ensure adherence to internal controls and public-sector standards."},{"type":"text","text":"Strategic Sourcing & Category Insights: Identification of high-impact sourcing categories and supplier consolidation opportunities."},{"type":"text","text":"Roadmap for Improvement: Clear, prioritized recommendations that balance quick wins with long-term structural reform."},{"type":"text","text":"Each engagement is grounded in evidence and execution—turning insight into measurable improvement."},{"type":"text","text":"Powered by Data and Experience"},{"type":"text","text":"3N Consulting leverages our proprietary analytics frameworks and procurement dashboards to deliver real-time visibility into spend, performance, and compliance trends. By integrating analytics with process and policy review, we provide quantifiable savings potential and actionable implementation strategies."},{"type":"text","text":"Our team brings decades of combined experience across public-sector, higher education, and private industry procurement environments, ensuring every recommendation is realistic, implementable, and tailored to the organization’s mission and constraints."},{"type":"text","text":"Results That Matter"},{"type":"text","text":"Our Procurement Solution has delivered measurable impact for clients across Maryland and beyond—helping them centralize procurement functions, identify redundant spend, improve vendor accountability, and strengthen policy compliance. In every case, the results are consistent:"},{"type":"text","text":"Lower total cost of procurement"},{"type":"text","text":"Reduced cycle times and administrative overhead"},{"type":"text","text":"Improved transparency and audit readiness"},{"type":"text","text":"Enhanced supplier performance and diversity participation"},{"type":"text","text":"Procurement becomes not just a compliance function, but a strategic enabler of performance and trust."},{"type":"text","text":"Why 3N Consulting"},{"type":"text","text":"3N’s Procurement Solution stands apart because it blends strategic insight, operational know-how, and data analytics. We don’t simply benchmark; we build capacity. We don’t just identify issues; we design and deliver sustainable solutions."},{"type":"text","text":"Our mission is to help organizations turn procurement into a competitive advantage—driving measurable savings, operational efficiency, and policy excellence."},{"type":"text","text":"At 3N Consulting, Procurement is no longer a back-office function—it’s a front-line driver of performance and integrity."}],"context":{"currentFile":{"path":"index.html","fsPath":"/Users/anupeesay/PycharmProjects/3NWebsite2/index.html","sources":["opened_tab"],"content":"<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
 <meta charset="UTF-8">
 <title>3N Consulting | Results. Delivered.</title>
 <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
 <style>
 /* Inline CSS so this preview actually renders with layout */
 *, *::before, *::after { box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
 html, body {
 font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
 color: #111827;
 background-color: #f9fafb;
 line-height: 1.6;
 }
 img, video { max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; }
 .site-wrapper { min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; }
 .main { flex: 1; }

 .site-header {
 background: #020617;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 border-bottom: 1px solid #1f2937;
 position: sticky;
 top: 0;
 z-index: 10;
 }
 .nav-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
 display: flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: space-between;
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 .brand-title {
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: 0.08em;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 font-size: 0.9rem;
 }
 .brand-tagline { font-size: 0.75rem; color: #9ca3af; }
 .brand-logo { height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px; }
 .nav-links { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; }
 .nav-links a {
 color: #e5e7eb;
 text-decoration: none;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 padding: 0.35rem 0.7rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
 }
 .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }
 .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
 .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }

 @media (max-width: 768px) {
 .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
 .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
 .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
 .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
 }

 .hero {
 padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .hero-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 3fr) minmax(0, 2fr);
 gap: 3rem;
 align-items: center;
 }
 .hero-eyebrow {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.13em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
 }
 .hero-title {
 font-size: clamp(2.1rem, 3vw, 2.7rem);
 font-weight: 750;
 letter-spacing: -0.03em;
 margin-bottom: 1rem;
 }
 .hero-highlight { color: #38bdf8; }
 .hero-body {
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 color: #d1d5db;
 max-width: 32rem;
 margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
 }
 .hero-meta {
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1.25rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 2rem;
 }
 .chip {
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.7);
 }
 .hero-media {
 border-radius: 1.2rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, rgba(56,189,248,0.12), transparent 50%),
 radial-gradient(circle at bottom right, rgba(52,211,153,0.12), transparent 55%);
 padding: 1rem;
 display: flex;
 flex-direction: column;
 gap: 0.75rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .badge-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.5rem; align-items: center; }
 .badge {
 border-radius: 999px;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.7rem;
 font-size: 0.7rem;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.12em;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.8);
 white-space: nowrap;
 }
 .badge-outline { background: transparent; }
 .logo-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; align-items: center; }
 .logo-row img { max-height: 40px; width: auto; }
 .caps-label {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.16em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 }

 .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }
 .section-alt { background: #f3f4f6; }
 .section-inner { max-width: 1120px; margin: 0 auto; }
 .section-header { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; }
 .section-kicker {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.15em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 color: #6b7280;
 margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
 }
 .section-title {
 font-size: 1.8rem;
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: -0.02em;
 margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
 }
 .section-subtitle {
 color: #4b5563;
 max-width: 40rem;
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 }

 .grid-3 {
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0,1fr));
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 @media (max-width: 900px) {
 .hero-inner { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0,1fr)); }
 }
 @media (max-width: 640px) {
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 }

 .card {
 border-radius: 1rem;
 border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 background: #ffffff;
 padding: 1.1rem 1.1rem 1.25rem;
 box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(15,23,42,0.04);
 }
 .card-title {
 font-size: 1rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 margin-bottom: 0.4rem;
 }
 .card-body { font-size: 0.9rem; color: #4b5563; }

 .testimonial-quote { font-style: italic; margin-bottom: 0.4rem; }
 .testimonial-client { font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.2rem; }
 .testimonial-ratings { font-size: 0.8rem; color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.4; }

 .btn {
 display: inline-flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: center;
 gap: 0.4rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.55rem 1.2rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 text-decoration: none;
 border: 1px solid transparent;
 cursor: pointer;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease, border-color 0.15s ease, transform 0.08s ease;
 }
 .btn-primary { background: #38bdf8; color: #020617; border-color: #0ea5e9; }
 .btn-primary:hover { background: #0ea5e9; transform: translateY(-1px); }
 .btn-ghost { background: transparent; color: #111827; border-color: #d1d5db; }
 .btn-ghost:hover { background: #e5e7eb; }

 .site-footer {
 border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 2rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #6b7280;
 background: #f9fafb;
 }
 .footer-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1rem;
 justify-content: space-between;
 }
 .footer-links {
 display: flex;
 gap: 0.9rem;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 }
 .footer-links a {
 color: #6b7280;
 text-decoration: none;
 }
 .footer-links a:hover { text-decoration: underline; }
 .footer-image { max-width: 150px; height: auto; }
 </style>
</head>
<body>
<div class="site-wrapper">
 <header class="site-header">
 <div class="nav-inner">
 <div class="brand">
 <img src="images/3nlogo.png" alt="3N Consulting Logo" style="height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px;">
 </div>
 <button class="nav-toggle" aria-label="Toggle navigation">☰</button>
 <nav class="nav-links">
 <a href="#" class="active">Home</a>
 <a href="about.html">About Us</a>
 <a href="services.html">Service Lines</a>
 <a href="careers.html">Careers</a>
 <a href="contact.html">Contact Us</a>
 <a href="thought-leadership.html">Thought Leadership</a>
 <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
 </nav>
 </div>
 </header>

 <main class="main">
 <!-- HERO -->
 <section class="hero">
 <div class="hero-inner">
 <div>
 <div class="hero-eyebrow">Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes</div>
 <h1 class="hero-title">
 Results. <span class="hero-highlight">Delivered.</span>
 </h1>
 <p class="hero-body">
 3N Consulting is a Maryland-based management consulting firm that
 builds long-term partnerships, takes ownership of outcomes, and
 practices frugality so savings flow to clients.
 </p>
 <div class="hero-meta">
 <span class="chip">Certified MD Minority Business Enterprise (MBE)</span>
 <span class="chip">Small Business Reserve (SBR) Program</span>
 <span class="chip">NMSDC Certified MBE</span>
 </div>
 <div class="hero-cta">
 <a href="#" class="btn btn-primary">Discuss your initiative →</a>
 <a href="case-studies.html" class="btn btn-ghost">View recent case studies</a>
 </div>
 </div>

 <aside class="hero-media">
 <div class="caps-label">Our work in motion</div>
 <div style="background:#020617;border-radius:0.9rem;padding:1.5rem;text-align:center;font-size:0.85rem;color:#9ca3af;">
 Video / animation placeholder
 </div>
 <div class="badge-row">
 <span class="badge">MD MBE • SBR</span>
 <span class="badge badge-outline">NMSDC Certified MBE</span>
 </div>
 <div class="logo-row">
 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">MD MBE</div>
 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">NMSDC</div>
 </div>
 <p style="font-size:0.8rem; color:#9ca3af;">
 Proud to support Maryland's public agencies, colleges, and communities.
 </p>
 </aside>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- WHY 3N -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Why 3N Consulting?</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">
 Because we maintain integrity. Because we value clients. And because we deliver results.
 </h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our model is built for outcome-based partnerships, true ownership of commitments,
 and a cost structure that puts client value first.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Vested in client success</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Vested in Client Success:</strong> Outcome-based partnerships and long-term relationships.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Ownership</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Ownership:</strong> We don't "staff"—we own results and keep our commitments.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Cost structure</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Cost Structure:</strong> Frugal by design—invest in talent, minimize overhead, pass savings on.
 </p>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- TESTIMONIALS -->
 <section class="section">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header" style="display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:baseline;gap:0.75rem;flex-wrap:wrap;">
 <div>
 <div class="section-kicker">Client testimonials</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">What our clients say</h2>
 </div>
 <a href="case-studies.html" class="btn btn-ghost">Recent case studies →</a>
 </div>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our performance is continuously evaluated. Below are excerpts from formal client satisfaction surveys.
 </p>

 <div class="grid-3">

 <meta charset="UTF-8">
 <title>3N Consulting | Results. Delivered.</title>
