 <style>
 /* Inline CSS so this preview actually renders with layout */
 *, *::before, *::after { box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
 html, body {
 font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
 color: #111827;
 background-color: #f9fafb;
 line-height: 1.6;
 }
 img, video { max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; }
 .site-wrapper { min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; }
 .main { flex: 1; }

 .site-header {
 background: #020617;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 border-bottom: 1px solid #1f2937;
 position: sticky;
 top: 0;
 z-index: 10;
 }
 .nav-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
 display: flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: space-between;
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 .brand-title {
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: 0.08em;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 font-size: 0.9rem;
 }
 .brand-tagline { font-size: 0.75rem; color: #9ca3af; }
 .brand-logo { height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px; }
 .nav-links { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; }
 .nav-links a {
 color: #e5e7eb;
 text-decoration: none;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 padding: 0.35rem 0.7rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
 }
 .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }
 .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
 .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }

 @media (max-width: 768px) {
 .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
 .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
 .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
 .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
 }

 .hero {
 padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .hero-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 3fr) minmax(0, 2fr);
 gap: 3rem;
 align-items: center;
 }
 .hero-eyebrow {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.13em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
 }
 .hero-title {
 font-size: clamp(2.1rem, 3vw, 2.7rem);
 font-weight: 750;
 letter-spacing: -0.03em;
 margin-bottom: 1rem;
 }
 .hero-highlight { color: #38bdf8; }
 .hero-body {
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 color: #d1d5db;
 max-width: 32rem;
 margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
 }
 .hero-meta {
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1.25rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 2rem;
 }
 .chip {
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.7);
 }
 .hero-media {
 border-radius: 1.2rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, rgba(56,189,248,0.12), transparent 50%),
 radial-gradient(circle at bottom right, rgba(52,211,153,0.12), transparent 55%);
 padding: 1rem;
 display: flex;
 flex-direction: column;
 gap: 0.75rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .badge-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.5rem; align-items: center; }
 .badge {
 border-radius: 999px;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.7rem;
 font-size: 0.7rem;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.12em;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.8);
 white-space: nowrap;
 }
 .badge-outline { background: transparent; }
 .logo-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; align-items: center; }
 .logo-row img { max-height: 40px; width: auto; }
 .caps-label {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.16em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 }

 .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }
 .section-alt { background: #f3f4f6; }
 .section-inner { max-width: 1120px; margin: 0 auto; }
 .section-header { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; }
 .section-kicker {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.15em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 color: #6b7280;
 margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
 }
 .section-title {
 font-size: 1.8rem;
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: -0.02em;
 margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
 }
 .section-subtitle {
 color: #4b5563;
 max-width: 40rem;
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 }

 .grid-3 {
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0,1fr));
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 @media (max-width: 900px) {
 .hero-inner { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0,1fr)); }
 }
 @media (max-width: 640px) {
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 }

 .card {
 border-radius: 1rem;
 border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 background: #ffffff;
 padding: 1.1rem 1.1rem 1.25rem;
 box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(15,23,42,0.04);
 }
 .card-title {
 font-size: 1rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 margin-bottom: 0.4rem;
 }
 .card-body { font-size: 0.9rem; color: #4b5563; }

 .testimonial-quote { font-style: italic; margin-bottom: 0.4rem; }
 .testimonial-client { font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.2rem; }
 .testimonial-ratings { font-size: 0.8rem; color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.4; }

 .btn {
 display: inline-flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: center;
 gap: 0.4rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.55rem 1.2rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 text-decoration: none;
 border: 1px solid transparent;
 cursor: pointer;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease, border-color 0.15s ease, transform 0.08s ease;
 }
 .btn-primary { background: #38bdf8; color: #020617; border-color: #0ea5e9; }
 .btn-primary:hover { background: #0ea5e9; transform: translateY(-1px); }
 .btn-ghost { background: transparent; color: #111827; border-color: #d1d5db; }
 .btn-ghost:hover { background: #e5e7eb; }

 .site-footer {
 border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 2rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #6b7280;
 background: #f9fafb;
 }
 .footer-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1rem;
 justify-content: space-between;
 }
 .footer-links {
 display: flex;
 gap: 0.9rem;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 }
 .footer-links a {
 color: #6b7280;
 text-decoration: none;
 }
 .footer-links a:hover { text-decoration: underline; }
 .footer-image { max-width: 150px; height: auto; }
 </style>
</head>

 <main class="main">

 <section class="hero">
 <div class="hero-inner">
 <div>
 <div class="hero-eyebrow">Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes</div>
 <h1 class="hero-title">
 Results. <span class="hero-highlight">Delivered.</span>
 </h1>
 <p class="hero-body">
 3N Consulting is a Maryland-based management consulting firm that
 builds long-term partnerships, takes ownership of outcomes, and
 practices frugality so savings flow to clients.
 </p>
 <div class="hero-meta">
 <span class="chip">Certified MD Minority Business Enterprise (MBE)</span>

 </div>

 <aside class="hero-media">
 <div class="caps-label">Our work in motion</div>
 <div style="background:#020617;border-radius:0.9rem;padding:1.5rem;text-align:center;font-size:0.85rem;color:#9ca3af;">

+<div class="site-wrapper">

+ <main class="main">
+ <!-- HERO -->
+ <section class="hero">
+ <div class="hero-inner">
+ <div class="hero-eyebrow">Productized Solution</div>
+ <h1 class="hero-title">
+ Procurement <span class="hero-highlight">Solution</span>
+ </h1>
+ <p class="hero-body">
+ Transforming Procurement into a Strategic Advantage
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- INTRO -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">A Comprehensive, Evidence-Based Assessment</h2>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ 3N Consulting's Procurement Solution is a productized offering designed to help organizations achieve cost reduction, compliance, and operational efficiency through data-driven assessment and actionable improvement. We combine management consulting rigor with analytical precision to turn procurement from a transactional function into a strategic value driver.
+ </p>
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 1rem;">
+ Our Procurement Solution delivers a comprehensive, evidence-based assessment of how your procurement organization performs today—and a clear roadmap for how it can perform better tomorrow.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- THE CHALLENGE -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <div class="section-kicker">The Challenge</div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">Procurement Under Pressure</h2>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ Procurement functions today face mounting pressure to deliver more value with fewer resources. Leaders must balance fiscal responsibility, vendor transparency, policy compliance, and agility—all while managing fragmented processes and outdated systems.
+ </p>
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 1rem;">
+ Many organizations struggle to answer key questions:
+ </p>
+ <div class="list-section">
+ <ul>
+ <li>Are we spending efficiently and in compliance with policy?</li>
+ <li>Are we leveraging data to negotiate better contracts and supplier performance?</li>
+ <li>Where can we achieve savings without compromising service quality or timelines?</li>
+ </ul>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 1.5rem;">
+ 3N's Procurement Solution provides those answers—clearly, quickly, and credibly.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- OUR APPROACH -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <div class="section-kicker">Our Approach</div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">Structured, Data-Driven Framework</h2>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ We apply a structured, data-driven framework that combines analytics, stakeholder engagement, and process evaluation to identify quick wins and long-term transformation opportunities.
+ </p>
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 1rem;">
+ Our solution includes:
+ </p>
+
+ <div class="grid-3" style="margin-top: 2rem;">
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Diagnostic Assessment</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Comprehensive review of current-state procurement operations, organizational structure, technology enablement, and spend management.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Cost & Efficiency Analysis</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Quantitative evaluation of procurement spend, transaction cost, and cycle time to uncover opportunities for savings and process optimization.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Compliance & Policy Review</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Examination of existing procurement policies, approvals, and workflows to ensure adherence to internal controls and public-sector standards.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Strategic Sourcing & Category Insights</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Identification of high-impact sourcing categories and supplier consolidation opportunities.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Roadmap for Improvement</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Clear, prioritized recommendations that balance quick wins with long-term structural reform.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+ </div>
+
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 2rem;">
+ Each engagement is grounded in evidence and execution—turning insight into measurable improvement.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- POWERED BY DATA -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <div class="section-kicker">Our Capabilities</div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">Powered by Data and Experience</h2>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ 3N Consulting leverages our proprietary analytics frameworks and procurement dashboards to deliver real-time visibility into spend, performance, and compliance trends. By integrating analytics with process and policy review, we provide quantifiable savings potential and actionable implementation strategies.
+ </p>
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 1rem;">
+ Our team brings decades of combined experience across public-sector, higher education, and private industry procurement environments, ensuring every recommendation is realistic, implementable, and tailored to the organization's mission and constraints.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- RESULTS THAT MATTER -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <div class="section-kicker">Proven Impact</div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">Results That Matter</h2>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ Our Procurement Solution has delivered measurable impact for clients across Maryland and beyond—helping them centralize procurement functions, identify redundant spend, improve vendor accountability, and strengthen policy compliance. In every case, the results are consistent:
+ </p>
+
+ <div class="grid-2" style="margin-top: 2rem;">
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Lower Total Cost of Procurement</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Reducing spend and administrative overhead through process optimization and strategic sourcing.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Reduced Cycle Times and Overhead</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Streamlining workflows and eliminating redundancy to accelerate procurement cycles.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Improved Transparency and Audit Readiness</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Strengthening governance and compliance through better visibility and documentation.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Enhanced Supplier Performance and Diversity</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Improving vendor accountability and expanding diverse supplier participation.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+ </div>
+
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 2rem;">
+ Procurement becomes not just a compliance function, but a strategic enabler of performance and trust.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- WHY 3N -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <div class="section-kicker">Why 3N Consulting</div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">A Blended Approach to Transformation</h2>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ 3N's Procurement Solution stands apart because it blends strategic insight, operational know-how, and data analytics. We don't simply benchmark; we build capacity. We don't just identify issues; we design and deliver sustainable solutions.
+ </p>
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 1rem;">
+ Our mission is to help organizations turn procurement into a competitive advantage—driving measurable savings, operational efficiency, and policy excellence.
+ </p>
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 1rem;">
+ At 3N Consulting, Procurement is no longer a back-office function—it's a front-line driver of performance and integrity.
+ </p>
+
+ <div style="margin-top: 2rem;">
+ <a href="contact.html" class="btn btn-primary">Discuss your procurement initiative →</a>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+ </main>
+
+ <footer class="site-footer">
+ <div class="footer-inner">
+ <div>
+ <div><strong>Results. Delivered.</strong> Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes.</div>
+ <div style="margin-top:0.4rem; font-size:0.85rem;">
+ We build long-term partnerships, take ownership of outcomes, and practice frugality so savings flow to clients.
+ </div>
+ <div style="margin-top:0.75rem; font-size:0.85rem;">
+ <strong>Phone:</strong> (301) 723-7057<br>
+ <strong>Address:</strong> 6710A Rockledge Drive, Bethesda, MD 20817
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ <img src="images/img.png" alt="Footer Image" class="footer-image">
+ <div class="footer-links">
+ <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/3nconsultinggroup/" target="_blank"> LinkedIn</a>
+ <a href="contact.html">Contact</a>
+ <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </footer>
+</div>
+
+<script src="script.js"></script>
+</body>

We don't just identify issues; we design and deliver sustainable solutions.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3Cp class=%22section-subtitle%22 style=%22margin-top: 1rem;%22%3E%0A Our mission is to help organizations turn procurement into a competitive advantage%E2%80%94driving measurable savings, operational efficiency, and policy excellence.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3Cp class=%22section-subtitle%22 style=%22margin-top: 1rem;%22%3E%0A At 3N Consulting, Procurement is no longer a back-office function%E2%80%94it's a front-line driver of performance and integrity.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A%0A %3Cdiv style=%22margin-top: 2rem;%22%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22contact.html%22 class=%22btn btn-primary%22%3EDiscuss your procurement initiative %E2%86%92%3C/a%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A %3C/main%3E%0A%0A %3Cfooter class=%22site-footer%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22footer-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv%3E%0A %3Cdiv%3E%3Cstrong%3EResults. Here are the instructions for the CIO Services page: CIO Services"},{"type":"text","text":"Maximizing Value from Technology Investments"},{"type":"text","text":"3N Consulting’s CIO Services Solution helps organizations take control of their technology landscape—optimizing IT spend, rationalizing application portfolios, and improving the performance of development and maintenance operations."},{"type":"text","text":"Our goal is simple: ensure that every technology dollar supports the mission, not just the infrastructure. By combining strategic assessment, financial analytics, and deep IT modernization expertise, 3N empowers technology leaders to make confident, data-driven decisions about where to invest, consolidate, or innovate."},{"type":"text","text":"The Challenge"},{"type":"text","text":"Today’s IT environment is more complex and costly than ever. Many organizations face:"},{"type":"text","text":"Escalating IT spend without clear linkage to business value"},{"type":"text","text":"Redundant or underused applications driving unnecessary maintenance costs"},{"type":"text","text":"Inefficient development and support models consuming valuable resources"},{"type":"text","text":"Siloed technology decisions that hinder agility and innovation"},{"type":"text","text":"3N’s CIO Services provide a structured, evidence-based approach to uncover inefficiencies, eliminate redundancies, and modernize operations—turning IT from a cost center into a strategic enabler."},{"type":"text","text":"Our Approach"},{"type":"text","text":"Our CIO Services Solution begins with a comprehensive, data-driven assessment that connects financial, operational, and technical insights into one unified view of IT performance."},{"type":"text","text":"We focus on four key dimensions:"},{"type":"text","text":"IT Spend Assessment: Analyze total cost of ownership (TCO) across infrastructure, applications, and services to identify immediate cost reduction opportunities."},{"type":"text","text":"Application Portfolio Analysis: Evaluate the performance, utilization, and value contribution of each system across the enterprise."},{"type":"text","text":"Application Rationalization: Streamline redundant or outdated systems and prioritize modernization initiatives that yield the highest ROI."},{"type":"text","text":"Development & Maintenance Optimization: Assess development productivity, vendor performance, and resource allocation to improve delivery speed and quality."},{"type":"text","text":"The result is a clear, actionable roadmap that aligns IT investments with strategic priorities while improving efficiency and accountability."},{"type":"text","text":"Powered by Analytics and Modernization Expertise"},{"type":"text","text":"3N leverages proven frameworks, including Technology Value Mapping, Application Health Scoring, and Total Cost Diagnostics, to provide a fact-based foundation for every recommendation. Our consultants combine experience in enterprise IT governance, financial modeling, and digital transformation to ensure that CIOs have the insights needed to make high-impact decisions quickly."},{"type":"text","text":"Our team has supported clients across public sector agencies, higher education, and Fortune 500 enterprises, helping them right-size their technology portfolios, strengthen vendor management, and unlock millions in operational savings."},{"type":"text","text":"Results That Matter"},{"type":"text","text":"Organizations using 3N’s CIO Services Solution achieve measurable results, including:"},{"type":"text","text":"10–30% reduction in IT spend through rationalization and sourcing optimization"},{"type":"text","text":"Streamlined application portfolios, reducing complexity and maintenance overhead"},{"type":"text","text":"Improved time-to-market for new digital products and enhancements"},{"type":"text","text":"Greater alignment between IT operations and business strategy"},{"type":"text","text":"Enhanced governance, transparency, and performance measurement"},{"type":"text","text":"Each engagement delivers tangible value—helping CIOs build credibility with business leadership and deliver technology that performs with purpose."},{"type":"text","text":"Why 3N Consulting"},{"type":"text","text":"3N’s CIO Services are designed for leaders who demand clarity, control, and measurable impact from their technology investments. We go beyond benchmarking—we build a foundation for modernization that is both strategic and executable."},{"type":"text","text":"Our approach bridges the gap between business and IT, combining consulting rigor with technical depth to deliver sustained results."},{"type":"text","text":"At 3N Consulting, CIO Services means smarter spend, simpler portfolios, and stronger performance."}],"context":{"currentFile":{"path":"index.html","fsPath":"/Users/anupeesay/PycharmProjects/3NWebsite2/index.html","sources":["opened_tab"],"content":"<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

 *, *::before, *::after { box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
 html, body {
 font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
 color: #111827;
 background-color: #f9fafb;
 line-height: 1.6;
 }
 img, video { max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; }
 .site-wrapper { min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; }
 .main { flex: 1; }

 .site-header {
 background: #020617;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 border-bottom: 1px solid #1f2937;
 position: sticky;
 top: 0;
 z-index: 10;
 }
 .nav-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
 display: flex;
 align-items: center;

 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 .brand-title {
 font-weight: 700;

 text-transform: uppercase;
 font-size: 0.9rem;
 }
 .brand-tagline { font-size: 0.75rem; color: #9ca3af; }
 .brand-logo { height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px; }
 .nav-links { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; }
 .nav-links a {
 color: #e5e7eb;
 text-decoration: none;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 padding: 0.35rem 0.7rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
 }
 .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }
 .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
 .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }

 @media (max-width: 768px) {
 .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
 .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
 .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
 .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
 }

 .hero {
 padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .hero-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 3fr) minmax(0, 2fr);
 gap: 3rem;
 align-items: center;
 }
 .hero-eyebrow {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.13em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
 }
 .hero-title {
 font-size: clamp(2.1rem, 3vw, 2.7rem);
 font-weight: 750;
 letter-spacing: -0.03em;
 margin-bottom: 1rem;
 }
 .hero-highlight { color: #38bdf8; }

 font-size: 0.98rem;
 color: #d1d5db;

 margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
 }

 }

 }

 }

 border-radius: 999px;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;

 font-size: 0.7rem;
 text-transform: uppercase;

 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.8);

 }
 .badge-outline { background: transparent; }
 .logo-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; align-items: center; }
 .logo-row img { max-height: 40px; width: auto; }
 .caps-label {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.16em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 }

 .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }
 .section-alt { background: #f3f4f6; }
 .section-inner { max-width: 1120px; margin: 0 auto; }

 .section-kicker {
 text-transform: uppercase;

 }

 }

 .grid-3 {

 }

 .card {

 .btn {

 }

 }

 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">NMSDC</div>

 <h2 class="section-title">
 Because we maintain integrity. Because we value clients. And because we deliver results.
 </h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our model is built for outcome-based partnerships, true ownership of commitments,
 and a cost structure that puts client value first.
 </p>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Cost structure</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Cost Structure:</strong> Frugal by design—invest in talent, minimize overhead, pass savings on.
 </p>

+<body>
+<div class="site-wrapper">
+ <header class="site-header">
+ <div class="nav-inner">
+ <div class="brand">
+ <img src="images/3nlogo.png" alt="3N Consulting Logo" style="height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px;">
+ </div>
+ <button class="nav-toggle" aria-label="Toggle navigation">☰</button>
+ <nav class="nav-links">
+ <a href="index.html">Home</a>
+ <a href="about.html">About Us</a>
+ <a href="services.html">Service Lines</a>
+ <a href="careers.html">Careers</a>
+ <a href="contact.html">Contact Us</a>
+ <a href="thought-leadership.html">Thought Leadership</a>
+ <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
+ </nav>
+ </div>
+ </header>
+
+ <main class="main">
+ <!-- HERO -->
+ <section class="hero">
+ <div class="hero-inner">
+ <div class="hero-eyebrow">Productized Solution</div>
+ <h1 class="hero-title">
+ CIO <span class="hero-highlight">Services</span>
+ </h1>
+ <p class="hero-body">
+ Maximizing Value from Technology Investments
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- INTRO -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Take Control of Your Technology Landscape</h2>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ 3N Consulting's CIO Services Solution helps organizations take control of their technology landscape—optimizing IT spend, rationalizing application portfolios, and improving the performance of development and maintenance operations.
+ </p>
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 1rem;">
+ Our goal is simple: ensure that every technology dollar supports the mission, not just the infrastructure. By combining strategic assessment, financial analytics, and deep IT modernization expertise, 3N empowers technology leaders to make confident, data-driven decisions about where to invest, consolidate, or innovate.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- THE CHALLENGE -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <div class="section-kicker">The Challenge</div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">IT Complexity and Cost</h2>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ Today's IT environment is more complex and costly than ever. Many organizations face:
+ </p>
+ <div class="list-section">
+ <ul>
+ <li>Escalating IT spend without clear linkage to business value</li>
+ <li>Redundant or underused applications driving unnecessary maintenance costs</li>
+ <li>Inefficient development and support models consuming valuable resources</li>
+ <li>Siloed technology decisions that hinder agility and innovation</li>
+ </ul>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 1.5rem;">
+ 3N's CIO Services provide a structured, evidence-based approach to uncover inefficiencies, eliminate redundancies, and modernize operations—turning IT from a cost center into a strategic enabler.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- OUR APPROACH -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <div class="section-kicker">Our Approach</div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">Comprehensive, Data-Driven Assessment</h2>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ Our CIO Services Solution begins with a comprehensive, data-driven assessment that connects financial, operational, and technical insights into one unified view of IT performance. We focus on four key dimensions:
+ </p>
+
+ <div class="grid-2" style="margin-top: 2rem;">
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">IT Spend Assessment</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Analyze total cost of ownership (TCO) across infrastructure, applications, and services to identify immediate cost reduction opportunities.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Application Portfolio Analysis</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Evaluate the performance, utilization, and value contribution of each system across the enterprise.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Application Rationalization</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Streamline redundant or outdated systems and prioritize modernization initiatives that yield the highest ROI.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Development & Maintenance Optimization</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Assess development productivity, vendor performance, and resource allocation to improve delivery speed and quality.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+ </div>
+
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 2rem;">
+ The result is a clear, actionable roadmap that aligns IT investments with strategic priorities while improving efficiency and accountability.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- POWERED BY ANALYTICS -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <div class="section-kicker">Our Capabilities</div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">Powered by Analytics and Modernization Expertise</h2>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ 3N leverages proven frameworks, including Technology Value Mapping, Application Health Scoring, and Total Cost Diagnostics, to provide a fact-based foundation for every recommendation. Our consultants combine experience in enterprise IT governance, financial modeling, and digital transformation to ensure that CIOs have the insights needed to make high-impact decisions quickly.
+ </p>
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 1rem;">
+ Our team has supported clients across public sector agencies, higher education, and Fortune 500 enterprises, helping them right-size their technology portfolios, strengthen vendor management, and unlock millions in operational savings.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- RESULTS THAT MATTER -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <div class="section-kicker">Proven Impact</div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">Results That Matter</h2>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ Organizations using 3N's CIO Services Solution achieve measurable results, including:
+ </p>
+
+ <div class="grid-2" style="margin-top: 2rem;">
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">10–30% Reduction in IT Spend</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Through rationalization and sourcing optimization.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Streamlined Application Portfolios</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Reducing complexity and maintenance overhead.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Improved Time-to-Market</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ For new digital products and enhancements.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Greater Strategic Alignment</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Between IT operations and business strategy.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+ </div>
+
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 2rem;">
+ Each engagement delivers tangible value—helping CIOs build credibility with business leadership and deliver technology that performs with purpose.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- WHY 3N -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <div class="section-kicker">Why 3N Consulting</div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">Clarity, Control, and Measurable Impact</h2>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">

We go beyond benchmarking%E2%80%94we build a foundation for modernization that is both strategic and executable.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3Cp class=%22section-subtitle%22 style=%22margin-top: 1rem;%22%3E%0A Our approach bridges the gap between business and IT, combining consulting rigor with technical depth to deliver sustained results.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3Cp class=%22section-subtitle%22 style=%22margin-top: 1rem;%22%3E%0A At 3N Consulting, CIO Services means smarter spend, simpler portfolios, and stronger performance.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A%0A %3Cdiv style=%22margin-top: 2rem;%22%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22contact.html%22 class=%22btn btn-primary%22%3EDiscuss your CIO strategy %E2%86%92%3C/a%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A %3C/main%3E%0A%0A %3Cfooter class=%22site-footer%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22footer-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv%3E%0A %3Cdiv%3E%3Cstrong%3EResults. Here are the instructions for the Manufacturing page: Manufacturing Planning Solution"},{"type":"text","text":"Aligning Production, Demand, and Profitability"},{"type":"text","text":"3N Consulting’s Manufacturing Planning Solution helps manufacturers achieve the perfect balance between production efficiency, demand fulfillment, and inventory optimization. We bring together data analytics, operational strategy, and digital tools to transform production planning from a reactive scheduling function into a proactive, performance-driven capability."},{"type":"text","text":"Our solution is built for manufacturers seeking to improve schedule reliability, reduce waste, and increase throughput—all while maintaining cost efficiency and customer satisfaction."},{"type":"text","text":"The Challenge"},{"type":"text","text":"Manufacturers today face growing complexity: unpredictable demand, global supply constraints, labor shortages, and rising input costs. Without integrated visibility across production, inventory, and demand planning, even strong operations struggle with:"},{"type":"text","text":"Overproduction or stockouts due to inaccurate forecasts"},{"type":"text","text":"Idle capacity and scheduling conflicts"},{"type":"text","text":"Excess working capital tied up in inventory"},{"type":"text","text":"Missed delivery commitments and customer dissatisfaction"},{"type":"text","text":"3N’s Manufacturing Planning Solution addresses these challenges head-on, ensuring that production plans are aligned, adaptive, and analytics-driven."},{"type":"text","text":"Our Approach"},{"type":"text","text":"We apply a structured, end-to-end methodology that connects forecasting, scheduling, and inventory management into one cohesive system of performance."},{"type":"text","text":"Our process includes:"},{"type":"text","text":"Current-State Assessment: Evaluate production planning, scheduling, and supply chain workflows across plants or business units."},{"type":"text","text":"Demand & Capacity Analysis: Identify gaps between customer demand, production capacity, and resource allocation."},{"type":"text","text":"Scheduling Optimization: Develop data-driven production schedules that balance throughput, equipment utilization, and lead times."},{"type":"text","text":"Inventory Optimization: Analyze inventory turnover, safety stock levels, and material flow to minimize working capital without risking availability."},{"type":"text","text":"Digital Enablement: Introduce planning dashboards, forecasting models, and AI-driven simulations to anticipate bottlenecks and improve decision-making."},{"type":"text","text":"Execution Roadmap: Deliver a clear, actionable plan with quantifiable targets for cost savings, on-time delivery, and efficiency improvements."},{"type":"text","text":"Every recommendation is grounded in data, discipline, and practicality—ensuring measurable gains across productivity, cost, and performance."},{"type":"text","text":"Powered by Analytics and Industry Insight"},{"type":"text","text":"3N Consulting integrates advanced analytics and operational modeling into every planning engagement. By combining real-time production data with predictive forecasting and “what-if” simulation, our solution helps manufacturers respond faster to shifts in demand, supply disruptions, or resource constraints."},{"type":"text","text":"Our consultants bring deep experience in industrial products, automotive, electronics, and consumer goods manufacturing, enabling us to adapt proven methods—such as Lean, Six Sigma, and constraint-based scheduling—to each client’s unique environment."},{"type":"text","text":"Results That Matter"},{"type":"text","text":"Organizations using 3N’s Manufacturing Planning Solution achieve measurable operational and financial improvements, including:"},{"type":"text","text":"10–25% reduction in inventory holding costs"},{"type":"text","text":"Improved on-time delivery performance by 15–30%"},{"type":"text","text":"Increased production throughput and utilization"},{"type":"text","text":"Shorter planning cycles and faster response to demand changes"},{"type":"text","text":"Enhanced visibility across supply, production, and logistics functions"},{"type":"text","text":"The result: a production system that runs smarter, leaner, and more predictably—with improved ability to meet customer demand while protecting margins."},{"type":"text","text":"Why 3N Consulting"},{"type":"text","text":"3N’s Manufacturing Planning Solution brings together strategy, analytics, and operational excellence. We help manufacturers move from siloed scheduling and reactive planning to a fully integrated, data-driven model that empowers decision-makers across production, supply chain, and sales."},{"type":"text","text":"Our approach is pragmatic and execution-focused—delivering quick wins while laying the foundation for long-term digital transformation in manufacturing operations."},{"type":"text","text":"At 3N Consulting, we don’t just plan production—we engineer performance."}],"context":{"currentFile":{"path":"index.html","fsPath":"/Users/anupeesay/PycharmProjects/3NWebsite2/index.html","sources":["opened_tab"],"content":"<!DOCTYPE html>

 *, *::before, *::after { box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0; padding: 0; }

 img, video { max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; }

 .main { flex: 1; }

 top: 0;

 }

 color: #e5e7eb;
 text-decoration: none;
 font-size: 0.85rem;

 border-radius: 999px;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
 }
 .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }

 .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }

 @media (max-width: 768px) {
 .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
 .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
 .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
 .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
 }

 .hero {
 padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .hero-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 3fr) minmax(0, 2fr);
 gap: 3rem;
 align-items: center;
 }
 .hero-eyebrow {
 text-transform: uppercase;

 }

 }

 .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }

</div>

<script>
 const toggle = document.querySelector('.nav-toggle');
 const links = document.querySelector('.nav-links');
 if (toggle && links) {
 toggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
 links.classList.toggle('show');
 });
 }
</script>
</body>

+<body>
+<div class="site-wrapper">
+ <header class="site-header">
+ <div class="nav-inner">
+ <div class="brand">
+ <img src="images/3nlogo.png" alt="3N Consulting Logo" style="height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px;">
+ </div>
+ <button class="nav-toggle" aria-label="Toggle navigation">☰</button>
+ <nav class="nav-links">
+ <a href="index.html">Home</a>
+ <a href="about.html">About Us</a>
+ <a href="services.html">Service Lines</a>
+ <a href="careers.html">Careers</a>
+ <a href="contact.html">Contact Us</a>
+ <a href="thought-leadership.html">Thought Leadership</a>
+ <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
+ </nav>
+ </div>
+ </header>
+
+ <main class="main">
+ <!-- HERO -->
+ <section class="hero">
+ <div class="hero-inner">
+ <div class="hero-eyebrow">Productized Solution</div>
+ <h1 class="hero-title">
+ Manufacturing Planning <span class="hero-highlight">Solution</span>
+ </h1>
+ <p class="hero-body">
+ Aligning Production, Demand, and Profitability
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- INTRO -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Transform Production Planning Into Performance</h2>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ 3N Consulting's Manufacturing Planning Solution helps manufacturers achieve the perfect balance between production efficiency, demand fulfillment, and inventory optimization. We bring together data analytics, operational strategy, and digital tools to transform production planning from a reactive scheduling function into a proactive, performance-driven capability.
+ </p>
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 1rem;">
+ Our solution is built for manufacturers seeking to improve schedule reliability, reduce waste, and increase throughput—all while maintaining cost efficiency and customer satisfaction.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- THE CHALLENGE -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <div class="section-kicker">The Challenge</div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">Complexity in Modern Manufacturing</h2>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ Manufacturers today face growing complexity: unpredictable demand, global supply constraints, labor shortages, and rising input costs. Without integrated visibility across production, inventory, and demand planning, even strong operations struggle with:
+ </p>
+ <div class="list-section">
+ <ul>
+ <li>Overproduction or stockouts due to inaccurate forecasts</li>
+ <li>Idle capacity and scheduling conflicts</li>
+ <li>Excess working capital tied up in inventory</li>
+ <li>Missed delivery commitments and customer dissatisfaction</li>
+ </ul>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 1.5rem;">
+ 3N's Manufacturing Planning Solution addresses these challenges head-on, ensuring that production plans are aligned, adaptive, and analytics-driven.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- OUR APPROACH -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <div class="section-kicker">Our Approach</div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">Structured, End-to-End Methodology</h2>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ We apply a structured, end-to-end methodology that connects forecasting, scheduling, and inventory management into one cohesive system of performance. Our process includes:
+ </p>
+
+ <div class="grid-3" style="margin-top: 2rem;">
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Current-State Assessment</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Evaluate production planning, scheduling, and supply chain workflows across plants or business units.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Demand & Capacity Analysis</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Identify gaps between customer demand, production capacity, and resource allocation.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Scheduling Optimization</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Develop data-driven production schedules that balance throughput, equipment utilization, and lead times.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Inventory Optimization</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Analyze inventory turnover, safety stock levels, and material flow to minimize working capital without risking availability.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Digital Enablement</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Introduce planning dashboards, forecasting models, and AI-driven simulations to anticipate bottlenecks and improve decision-making.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Execution Roadmap</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Deliver a clear, actionable plan with quantifiable targets for cost savings, on-time delivery, and efficiency improvements.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+ </div>
+
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 2rem;">
+ Every recommendation is grounded in data, discipline, and practicality—ensuring measurable gains across productivity, cost, and performance.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- POWERED BY ANALYTICS -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <div class="section-kicker">Our Capabilities</div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">Powered by Analytics and Industry Insight</h2>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ 3N Consulting integrates advanced analytics and operational modeling into every planning engagement. By combining real-time production data with predictive forecasting and "what-if" simulation, our solution helps manufacturers respond faster to shifts in demand, supply disruptions, or resource constraints.
+ </p>
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 1rem;">
+ Our consultants bring deep experience in industrial products, automotive, electronics, and consumer goods manufacturing, enabling us to adapt proven methods—such as Lean, Six Sigma, and constraint-based scheduling—to each client's unique environment.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- RESULTS THAT MATTER -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <div class="section-kicker">Proven Impact</div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">Results That Matter</h2>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ Organizations using 3N's Manufacturing Planning Solution achieve measurable operational and financial improvements, including:
+ </p>
+
+ <div class="grid-2" style="margin-top: 2rem;">
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">10–25% Inventory Cost Reduction</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Through optimized holding levels and improved turnover.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Improved On-Time Delivery</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Performance improvement of 15–30% through better planning and scheduling.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Increased Production Throughput</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Higher utilization rates and reduced cycle times.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+
+ <article class="card">
+ <h3 class="card-title">Faster Response Capability</h3>
+ <p class="card-body">
+ Shorter planning cycles and faster response to demand changes.
+ </p>
+ </article>
+ </div>
+
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 2rem;">
+ The result: a production system that runs smarter, leaner, and more predictably—with improved ability to meet customer demand while protecting margins.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- WHY 3N -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <div class="section-kicker">Why 3N Consulting</div>
+ <h2 class="section-title">Strategy, Analytics, and Operational Excellence</h2>
+ </div>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ 3N's Manufacturing Planning Solution brings together strategy, analytics, and operational excellence. We help manufacturers move from siloed scheduling and reactive planning to a fully integrated, data-driven model that empowers decision-makers across production, supply chain, and sales.
+ </p>
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 1rem;">
+ Our approach is pragmatic and execution-focused—delivering quick wins while laying the foundation for long-term digital transformation in manufacturing operations.
+ </p>
+ <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 1rem;">
+ At 3N Consulting, we don't just plan production—we engineer performance.
+ </p>
+
+ <div style="margin-top: 2rem;">
+ <a href="contact.html" class="btn btn-primary">Discuss your manufacturing planning →</a>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+ </main>
+
+ <footer class="site-footer">
+ <div class="footer-inner">
+ <div>
+ <div><strong>Results. Delivered.</strong> Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes.</div>
+ <div style="margin-top:0.4rem; font-size:0.85rem;">
+ We build long-term partnerships, take ownership of outcomes, and practice frugality so savings flow to clients.
+ </div>
+ <div style="margin-top:0.75rem; font-size:0.85rem;">
+ <strong>Phone:</strong> (301) 723-7057<br>
+ <strong>Address:</strong> 6710A Rockledge Drive, Bethesda, MD 20817
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ <img src="images/img.png" alt="Footer Image" class="footer-image">
+ <div class="footer-links">
+ <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/3nconsultinggroup/" target="_blank"> LinkedIn</a>
+ <a href="contact.html">Contact</a>
+ <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </footer>
+</div>
+
+<script src="script.js"></script>
+</body>
+</html>","refToolCallId":"toolu_01J5WH6PDn6JcbojQ7AZhgGP"},{"type":"text","text":"Now let me update the index.html to add the link to the Manufacturing page:"},{"type":"toolCall","toolCallId":"toolu_01WJjSp23we4iFuAP8YrryL9","statusText":"Change generated","status":"SUCCESS","context":{"files":[{"path":"index.html","fsPath":"/Users/anupeesay/PycharmProjects/3NWebsite2/index.html"}]},"isHidden":false},{"type":"codeHunk","lineBasedDiff":"--- /Users/anupeesay/PycharmProjects/3NWebsite2/index.html

 <p class="card-body">
 Planning, operations, and process redesign for manufacturers seeking to
 scale while maintaining service and quality.","refToolCallId":"toolu_01WJjSp23we4iFuAP8YrryL9"},{"type":"text","text":"Perfect! ✅ I've successfully created your Manufacturing Planning Solution page and linked it from the home page. Here's what I did:

 .brand-tagline { font-size: 0.75rem; color: #9ca3af; }

 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
 }
 .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }
 .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
 .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }

 @media (max-width: 768px) {

 .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
 }

 .hero {

 .card {

<div class="site-wrapper">
 <header class="site-header">

 <main class="main">
 <!-- HERO -->
 <section class="hero">
 <div class="hero-inner">
 <div>
 <div class="hero-eyebrow">Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes</div>
 <h1 class="hero-title">
 Results. <span class="hero-highlight">Delivered.</span>
 </h1>
 <p class="hero-body">
 3N Consulting is a Maryland-based management consulting firm that
 builds long-term partnerships, takes ownership of outcomes, and
 practices frugality so savings flow to clients.
 </p>
 <div class="hero-meta">
 <span class="chip">Certified MD Minority Business Enterprise (MBE)</span>

 </div>
 </div>

 <aside class="hero-media">
 <div class="caps-label">Our work in motion</div>
 <div style="background:#020617;border-radius:0.9rem;padding:1.5rem;text-align:center;font-size:0.85rem;color:#9ca3af;">
 Video / animation placeholder

 <div class="badge-row">

 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">MD MBE</div>
 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">NMSDC</div>
 </div>
 <p style="font-size:0.8rem; color:#9ca3af;">
 Proud to support Maryland's public agencies, colleges, and communities.
 </p>
 </aside>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- WHY 3N -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Why 3N Consulting?</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">
 Because we maintain integrity. Because we value clients. And because we deliver results.
 </h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our model is built for outcome-based partnerships, true ownership of commitments,
 and a cost structure that puts client value first.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Vested in client success</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Vested in Client Success:</strong> Outcome-based partnerships and long-term relationships.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Ownership</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Ownership:</strong> We don't "staff"—we own results and keep our commitments.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Cost structure</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Cost Structure:</strong> Frugal by design—invest in talent, minimize overhead, pass savings on.
 </p>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- TESTIMONIALS -->
 <section class="section">

 </a>

 <div class="grid-3">

 Planning, operations, and process redesign for manufacturers seeking to
 scale while maintaining service and quality.

 <article class="card">

 <article class="card">

 </p>
 </article>

 *, *::before, *::after { box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
 html, body {
 font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
 color: #111827;
 background-color: #f9fafb;
 line-height: 1.6;
 }
 img, video { max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; }
 .site-wrapper { min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; }
 .main { flex: 1; }

 .site-header {
 background: #020617;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 border-bottom: 1px solid #1f2937;
 position: sticky;
 top: 0;
 z-index: 10;
 }
 .nav-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
 display: flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: space-between;
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 .brand-title {
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: 0.08em;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 font-size: 0.9rem;
 }
 .brand-tagline { font-size: 0.75rem; color: #9ca3af; }
 .brand-logo { height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px; }
 .nav-links { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; }
 .nav-links a {
 color: #e5e7eb;
 text-decoration: none;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 padding: 0.35rem 0.7rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
 }
 .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }
 .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
 .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }

 @media (max-width: 768px) {
 .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
 .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
 .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
 .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
 }

 .hero {
 padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .hero-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 3fr) minmax(0, 2fr);
 gap: 3rem;
 align-items: center;
 }
 .hero-eyebrow {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.13em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
 }
 .hero-title {
 font-size: clamp(2.1rem, 3vw, 2.7rem);
 font-weight: 750;
 letter-spacing: -0.03em;
 margin-bottom: 1rem;
 }
 .hero-highlight { color: #38bdf8; }
 .hero-body {
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 color: #d1d5db;
 max-width: 32rem;
 margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
 }
 .hero-meta {
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1.25rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 2rem;
 }
 .chip {
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.7);
 }
 .hero-media {
 border-radius: 1.2rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, rgba(56,189,248,0.12), transparent 50%),
 radial-gradient(circle at bottom right, rgba(52,211,153,0.12), transparent 55%);
 padding: 1rem;
 display: flex;
 flex-direction: column;
 gap: 0.75rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .badge-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.5rem; align-items: center; }
 .badge {
 border-radius: 999px;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.7rem;
 font-size: 0.7rem;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.12em;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.8);
 white-space: nowrap;
 }
 .badge-outline { background: transparent; }
 .logo-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; align-items: center; }
 .logo-row img { max-height: 40px; width: auto; }
 .caps-label {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.16em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 }

 .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }
 .section-alt { background: #f3f4f6; }
 .section-inner { max-width: 1120px; margin: 0 auto; }
 .section-header { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; }
 .section-kicker {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.15em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 color: #6b7280;
 margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
 }
 .section-title {
 font-size: 1.8rem;
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: -0.02em;
 margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
 }
 .section-subtitle {
 color: #4b5563;
 max-width: 40rem;
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 }

 .grid-3 {
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0,1fr));
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 @media (max-width: 900px) {
 .hero-inner { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0,1fr)); }
 }
 @media (max-width: 640px) {
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 }

 .card {
 border-radius: 1rem;
 border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 background: #ffffff;
 padding: 1.1rem 1.1rem 1.25rem;
 box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(15,23,42,0.04);
 }
 .card-title {
 font-size: 1rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 margin-bottom: 0.4rem;
 }
 .card-body { font-size: 0.9rem; color: #4b5563; }

 .testimonial-quote { font-style: italic; margin-bottom: 0.4rem; }
 .testimonial-client { font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.2rem; }
 .testimonial-ratings { font-size: 0.8rem; color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.4; }

 .btn {
 display: inline-flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: center;
 gap: 0.4rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.55rem 1.2rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;

 text-decoration: none;
 border: 1px solid transparent;
 cursor: pointer;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease, border-color 0.15s ease, transform 0.08s ease;
 }
 .btn-primary { background: #38bdf8; color: #020617; border-color: #0ea5e9; }

 .footer-inner {

 }

 }
 .footer-links a {
 color: #6b7280;
 text-decoration: none;
 }

 .footer-image { max-width: 150px; height: auto; }
 </style>
</head>

<div class="site-wrapper">
 <header class="site-header">
 <div class="nav-inner">

 <main class="main">
 <!-- HERO -->
 <section class="hero">
 <div class="hero-inner">
 <div>
 <div class="hero-eyebrow">Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes</div>
 <h1 class="hero-title">
 Results. <span class="hero-highlight">Delivered.</span>
 </h1>
 <p class="hero-body">
 3N Consulting is a Maryland-based management consulting firm that
 builds long-term partnerships, takes ownership of outcomes, and
 practices frugality so savings flow to clients.
 </p>
 <div class="hero-meta">
 <span class="chip">Certified MD Minority Business Enterprise (MBE)</span>
 <span class="chip">Small Business Reserve (SBR) Program</span>
 <span class="chip">NMSDC Certified MBE</span>
 </div>
 <div class="hero-cta">
 <a href="#" class="btn btn-primary">Discuss your initiative →</a>
 <a href="case-studies.html" class="btn btn-ghost">View recent case studies</a>
 </div>
 </div>

 <aside class="hero-media">
 <div class="caps-label">Our work in motion</div>
 <div style="background:#020617;border-radius:0.9rem;padding:1.5rem;text-align:center;font-size:0.85rem;color:#9ca3af;">
 Video / animation placeholder
 </div>
 <div class="badge-row">
 <span class="badge">MD MBE • SBR</span>
 <span class="badge badge-outline">NMSDC Certified MBE</span>
 </div>
 <div class="logo-row">
 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">MD MBE</div>
 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">NMSDC</div>
 </div>
 <p style="font-size:0.8rem; color:#9ca3af;">
 Proud to support Maryland's public agencies, colleges, and communities.
 </p>
 </aside>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- WHY 3N -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Why 3N Consulting?</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">
 Because we maintain integrity. Because we value clients. And because we deliver results.
 </h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our model is built for outcome-based partnerships, true ownership of commitments,
 and a cost structure that puts client value first.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Vested in client success</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Vested in Client Success:</strong> Outcome-based partnerships and long-term relationships.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Ownership</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Ownership:</strong> We don't "staff"—we own results and keep our commitments.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Cost structure</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Cost Structure:</strong> Frugal by design—invest in talent, minimize overhead, pass savings on.
 </p>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- TESTIMONIALS -->
 <section class="section">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header" style="display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:baseline;gap:0.75rem;flex-wrap:wrap;">
 <div>
 <div class="section-kicker">Client testimonials</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">What our clients say</h2>

 </div>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our performance is continuously evaluated. Below are excerpts from formal client satisfaction surveys.
 </p>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">

 </p>
 <div class="testimonial-ratings">

 Management Team: "Exceptional"<br>
 Cost Control: "Exceptional"<br>
 Schedule Management: "Very Good"
 </div>
 </article>

 <article class="card">

 </p>
 <div class="testimonial-ratings">
 <strong>Client Satisfaction Survey Rating:</strong><br>

 Management Team: "Exceptional"<br>

 </div>
 </article>

 <article class="card">

 </div>
 <p class="testimonial-quote">
 "We would highly recommend them to others"
 </p>
 <div class="testimonial-ratings">
 <strong>Client Satisfaction Survey Rating:</strong><br>
 Quality of Work: "Exceptional"<br>
 Management Team: "Very Good"<br>
 Cost Control: "Exceptional"<br>
 Schedule Management: "Exceptional"
 </div>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- CAPABILITIES -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Capabilities</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">Core areas where we deliver results</h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 These capability areas link into your service lines and toolkits, supported by
 proven methods like O-RAM and AAA.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <a href="organizational-redesign.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Organizational Redesign</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 Align structure, people, and processes for resilience and agility.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <a href="strategy-operations.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Strategy & Operations</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 Corporate strategy. Interim management. Lean improvements that minimize waste and maximize efficiency.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <a href="data-analytics.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Data Analytics</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 Frameworks & dashboards that uncover patterns and predict trends.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <a href="digital-transformation.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Digital Transformation</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 From legacy modernization to AI—reduce the ~70% failure risk with alignment.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <a href="human-capital.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Human Capital & Change Management</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 Strengthen engagement, accelerate adoption, and lead with purpose.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- SOLUTIONS -->
 <section class="section">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Productized solution offerings</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">Solutions we can rapidly deploy</h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Solutions we can rapidly deploy through assets developed over years of
 knowledge and experience—in procurement, manufacturing, and technology.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title"><a href="manufacturing.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">Manufacturing</a></h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 Planning, operations, and process redesign for manufacturers seeking to
 scale while maintaining service and quality.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title"><a href="cio-services.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">CIO Services</a></h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 Portfolio rationalization, IT strategy, and value-focused technology
 investment for public sector and mid-market organizations.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title"><a href="procurement.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">Procurement</a></h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 A structured procurement solution to unlock savings, improve compliance,
 and turn purchasing into a strategic advantage.
 </p>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>
 </main>

 </div>
 <div style="margin-top:0.75rem; font-size:0.85rem;">

 <strong>Address:</strong> 6710A Rockledge Drive, Bethesda, MD 20817
 </div>
 </div>

+ <div style="margin-bottom: 3rem;">
+ <h2 style="text-align: center; margin-bottom: 2rem; font-size: 1.8rem; font-weight: 700;">Our Thought Leaders</h2>
+ <p style="text-align: center; color: #4b5563; margin-bottom: 2rem; max-width: 600px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;">Explore insights and perspectives from our team of experienced consultants and industry experts.</p>

With more than 25 years of management consulting experience, Mr. Gupta has become a trusted advisor to CEOs, investors, and boards—helping organizations achieve measurable operational and financial improvement under aggressive growth or turnaround mandates."},{"type":"text","text":"Mr. Gupta’s background includes extensive work with private equity portfolio companies, where he has partnered with management teams and investors to stabilize operations, accelerate EBITDA growth, and deliver post-acquisition value creation. He has served on Boards of Directors, Advisory Boards, and Technical Advisory Boards, helping firms navigate operational transformation, scale technology infrastructure, and successfully raise Series A funding. His expertise in aligning financial objectives with sustainable workforce and operational practices has made him a sought-after advisor for mid-market firms across technology, consumer goods, and manufacturing."},{"type":"text","text":"Prior to founding 3N Consulting, Mr. Gupta served as Global Head of Organizational Redesign at Wipro Consulting Services, where he was one of the fastest-tracked professionals from Manager to Partner in the firm’s history. He pioneered Wipro’s “Value Engineering” delivery model—offering performance assessments at no cost and sharing in verified client savings. His earlier career at Deloitte and BearingPoint shaped his foundation in strategy, process optimization, and financial modeling."},{"type":"text","text":"Across his career, Mr. Gupta has led major transformation programs for Wal-Mart, BNY Mellon, NBC Universal, Citigroup, and others. At Wal-Mart’s Bentonville headquarters, his redesign of the company’s Information Systems Division (ISD) directly preserved 350 U.S. jobs that were slated for outsourcing—earning executive recognition for balancing efficiency with workforce protection."},{"type":"text","text":"A Maryland native, Mr. Gupta holds a B.S. in Management Science and Statistics from the University of Maryland, College Park (Scholarship Recipient) and an MBA in Finance and Strategy from Purdue University’s Krannert School of Management (CIBER Assistantship Recipient). He continues to lead 3N Consulting with a mission rooted in excellence, partnership, and measurable value creation—helping organizations realize their financial and operational potential through insight, discipline, and execution."}],"context":{"currentFile":{"path":"index.html","fsPath":"/Users/anupeesay/PycharmProjects/3NWebsite2/index.html","sources":["opened_tab"],"content":"<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
 <meta charset="UTF-8">
 <title>3N Consulting | Results. Delivered.</title>
 <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
 <style>
 /* Inline CSS so this preview actually renders with layout */
 *, *::before, *::after { box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
 html, body {
 font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
 color: #111827;
 background-color: #f9fafb;
 line-height: 1.6;
 }
 img, video { max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; }
 .site-wrapper { min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; }
 .main { flex: 1; }

 .site-header {
 background: #020617;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 border-bottom: 1px solid #1f2937;
 position: sticky;
 top: 0;
 z-index: 10;
 }
 .nav-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
 display: flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: space-between;
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 .brand-title {
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: 0.08em;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 font-size: 0.9rem;
 }
 .brand-tagline { font-size: 0.75rem; color: #9ca3af; }
 .brand-logo { height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px; }
 .nav-links { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; }
 .nav-links a {
 color: #e5e7eb;
 text-decoration: none;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 padding: 0.35rem 0.7rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
 }
 .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }
 .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
 .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }

 @media (max-width: 768px) {
 .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
 .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
 .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
 .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
 }

 .hero {
 padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .hero-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 3fr) minmax(0, 2fr);
 gap: 3rem;
 align-items: center;
 }
 .hero-eyebrow {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.13em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
 }
 .hero-title {
 font-size: clamp(2.1rem, 3vw, 2.7rem);
 font-weight: 750;
 letter-spacing: -0.03em;
 margin-bottom: 1rem;
 }
 .hero-highlight { color: #38bdf8; }
 .hero-body {
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 color: #d1d5db;
 max-width: 32rem;
 margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
 }
 .hero-meta {
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1.25rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 2rem;
 }
 .chip {
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.7);
 }
 .hero-media {
 border-radius: 1.2rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, rgba(56,189,248,0.12), transparent 50%),
 radial-gradient(circle at bottom right, rgba(52,211,153,0.12), transparent 55%);
 padding: 1rem;
 display: flex;
 flex-direction: column;
 gap: 0.75rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .badge-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.5rem; align-items: center; }
 .badge {
 border-radius: 999px;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.7rem;
 font-size: 0.7rem;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.12em;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.8);
 white-space: nowrap;
 }
 .badge-outline { background: transparent; }
 .logo-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; align-items: center; }
 .logo-row img { max-height: 40px; width: auto; }
 .caps-label {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.16em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 }

 .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }
 .section-alt { background: #f3f4f6; }
 .section-inner { max-width: 1120px; margin: 0 auto; }
 .section-header { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; }
 .section-kicker {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.15em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 color: #6b7280;
 margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
 }
 .section-title {
 font-size: 1.8rem;
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: -0.02em;
 margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
 }
 .section-subtitle {
 color: #4b5563;
 max-width: 40rem;
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 }

 .grid-3 {
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0,1fr));
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 @media (max-width: 900px) {
 .hero-inner { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0,1fr)); }
 }
 @media (max-width: 640px) {
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 }

 .card {
 border-radius: 1rem;
 border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 background: #ffffff;
 padding: 1.1rem 1.1rem 1.25rem;
 box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(15,23,42,0.04);
 }
 .card-title {
 font-size: 1rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 margin-bottom: 0.4rem;
 }
 .card-body { font-size: 0.9rem; color: #4b5563; }

 .testimonial-quote { font-style: italic; margin-bottom: 0.4rem; }
 .testimonial-client { font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.2rem; }
 .testimonial-ratings { font-size: 0.8rem; color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.4; }

 .btn {
 display: inline-flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: center;
 gap: 0.4rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.55rem 1.2rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 text-decoration: none;
 border: 1px solid transparent;
 cursor: pointer;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease, border-color 0.15s ease, transform 0.08s ease;
 }
 .btn-primary { background: #38bdf8; color: #020617; border-color: #0ea5e9; }
 .btn-primary:hover { background: #0ea5e9; transform: translateY(-1px); }
 .btn-ghost { background: transparent; color: #111827; border-color: #d1d5db; }
 .btn-ghost:hover { background: #e5e7eb; }

 .site-footer {
 border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 2rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #6b7280;
 background: #f9fafb;
 }
 .footer-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1rem;
 justify-content: space-between;
 }
 .footer-links {
 display: flex;
 gap: 0.9rem;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 }
 .footer-links a {
 color: #6b7280;
 text-decoration: none;
 }
 .footer-links a:hover { text-decoration: underline; }
 .footer-image { max-width: 150px; height: auto; }
 </style>
</head>
<body>
<div class="site-wrapper">
 <header class="site-header">
 <div class="nav-inner">
 <div class="brand">
 <img src="images/3nlogo.png" alt="3N Consulting Logo" style="height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px;">
 </div>
 <button class="nav-toggle" aria-label="Toggle navigation">☰</button>
 <nav class="nav-links">
 <a href="#" class="active">Home</a>
