 <a href="thought-leadership.html">Thought Leadership</a>
 <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
 </nav>
 </div>
 </header>

 <main class="main">
 <!-- HERO -->
 <section class="hero">
 <div class="hero-inner">
 <div>
 <div class="hero-eyebrow">Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes</div>
 <h1 class="hero-title">
 Results. <span class="hero-highlight">Delivered.</span>
 </h1>
 <p class="hero-body">
 3N Consulting is a Maryland-based management consulting firm that
 builds long-term partnerships, takes ownership of outcomes, and
 practices frugality so savings flow to clients.
 </p>
 <div class="hero-meta">
 <span class="chip">Certified MD Minority Business Enterprise (MBE)</span>
 <span class="chip">Small Business Reserve (SBR) Program</span>
 <span class="chip">NMSDC Certified MBE</span>
 </div>
 <div class="hero-cta">
 <a href="#" class="btn btn-primary">Discuss your initiative →</a>
 <a href="case-studies.html" class="btn btn-ghost">View recent case studies</a>
 </div>
 </div>

 <aside class="hero-media">
 <div class="caps-label">Our work in motion</div>
 <div style="background:#020617;border-radius:0.9rem;padding:1.5rem;text-align:center;font-size:0.85rem;color:#9ca3af;">
 Video / animation placeholder
 </div>
 <div class="badge-row">
 <span class="badge">MD MBE • SBR</span>
 <span class="badge badge-outline">NMSDC Certified MBE</span>
 </div>
 <div class="logo-row">
 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">MD MBE</div>
 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">NMSDC</div>
 </div>
 <p style="font-size:0.8rem; color:#9ca3af;">
 Proud to support Maryland's public agencies, colleges, and communities.
 </p>
 </aside>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- WHY 3N -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Why 3N Consulting?</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">
 Because we maintain integrity. Because we value clients. And because we deliver results.
 </h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our model is built for outcome-based partnerships, true ownership of commitments,
 and a cost structure that puts client value first.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Vested in client success</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Vested in Client Success:</strong> Outcome-based partnerships and long-term relationships.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Ownership</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Ownership:</strong> We don't "staff"—we own results and keep our commitments.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Cost structure</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Cost Structure:</strong> Frugal by design—invest in talent, minimize overhead, pass savings on.
 </p>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- TESTIMONIALS -->
 <section class="section">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header" style="display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:baseline;gap:0.75rem;flex-wrap:wrap;">
 <div>
 <div class="section-kicker">Client testimonials</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">What our clients say</h2>
 </div>
 <a href="case-studies.html" class="btn btn-ghost">Recent case studies →</a>
 </div>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our performance is continuously evaluated. Below are excerpts from formal client satisfaction surveys.
 </p>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <div class="testimonial-client">State Education Agency ~ Project Executive</div>

 </p>

 </article>

 <div class="testimonial-ratings">

 <article class="card">

 </div>

 </p>
 <div class="testimonial-ratings">
 <strong>Client Satisfaction Survey Rating:</strong><br>

+<div class="site-wrapper">
+ <header class="site-header">

+ <nav class="nav-links">
+ <a href="index.html">Home</a>
+ <a href="about.html">About Us</a>
+ <a href="services.html">Service Lines</a>
+ <a href="careers.html">Careers</a>
+ <a href="contact.html">Contact Us</a>
+ <a href="thought-leadership.html" class="active">Thought Leadership</a>
+ <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
+ </nav>
+ </div>
+ </header>
+
+ <main class="main">
+ <!-- HERO -->
+ <section class="hero">
+ <div class="hero-inner">
+ <div>
+ <div class="hero-eyebrow">Thought Leadership</div>
+ <h1 class="hero-title">Nick Gupta</h1>
+ <div class="hero-subtitle">Chief Executive Officer</div>
+ <p class="hero-body">
+ Founder of 3N Consulting LLC | 25+ Years of Management Consulting | Enterprise Transformation & Value Creation Leader
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- BIOGRAPHY SECTION -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Biography</h2>
+ </div>
+ <div class="bio-section">
+ <p>
+ Nick Gupta is the Founder of 3N Consulting LLC, where he leads enterprise efficiency, transformation, and value-creation initiatives across the private equity, commercial, and public sectors. With more than 25 years of management consulting experience, Mr. Gupta has become a trusted advisor to CEOs, investors, and boards—helping organizations achieve measurable operational and financial improvement under aggressive growth or turnaround mandates.
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ Mr. Gupta's background includes extensive work with private equity portfolio companies, where he has partnered with management teams and investors to stabilize operations, accelerate EBITDA growth, and deliver post-acquisition value creation. He has served on Boards of Directors, Advisory Boards, and Technical Advisory Boards, helping firms navigate operational transformation, scale technology infrastructure, and successfully raise Series A funding. His expertise in aligning financial objectives with sustainable workforce and operational practices has made him a sought-after advisor for mid-market firms across technology, consumer goods, and manufacturing.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- EXPERIENCE & EXPERTISE SECTION -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Career Highlights</h2>
+ </div>
+ <div class="bio-section">
+ <p>
+ <strong>Wipro Consulting Services:</strong> Prior to founding 3N Consulting, Mr. Gupta served as Global Head of Organizational Redesign at Wipro Consulting Services, where he was one of the fastest-tracked professionals from Manager to Partner in the firm's history. He pioneered Wipro's "Value Engineering" delivery model—offering performance assessments at no cost and sharing in verified client savings.
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ <strong>Early Career:</strong> His earlier career at Deloitte and BearingPoint shaped his foundation in strategy, process optimization, and financial modeling.
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ <strong>Major Transformations:</strong> Across his career, Mr. Gupta has led major transformation programs for Wal-Mart, BNY Mellon, NBC Universal, Citigroup, and others. At Wal-Mart's Bentonville headquarters, his redesign of the company's Information Systems Division (ISD) directly preserved 350 U.S. jobs that were slated for outsourcing—earning executive recognition for balancing efficiency with workforce protection.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- EDUCATION & BACKGROUND SECTION -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Education & Background</h2>
+ </div>
+ <div class="bio-section">
+ <p>
+ A Maryland native, Mr. Gupta holds a <strong>B.S. in Management Science and Statistics</strong> from the University of Maryland, College Park (Scholarship Recipient) and an <strong>MBA in Finance and Strategy</strong> from Purdue University's Krannert School of Management (CIBER Assistantship Recipient).
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ He continues to lead 3N Consulting with a mission rooted in excellence, partnership, and measurable value creation—helping organizations realize their financial and operational potential through insight, discipline, and execution.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- CTA SECTION -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="cta-section">
+ <h3 style="font-size: 1.3rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;">Ready to Work with 3N Consulting?</h3>
+ <p style="margin-bottom: 1.5rem; color: #4b5563;">Let's discuss how we can help your organization achieve transformational results.</p>
+ <a href="contact.html" class="btn btn-primary">Contact Us →</a>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+ </main>
+
+ <footer class="site-footer">
+ <div class="footer-inner">
+ <div style="flex: 1; min-width: 200px;">
+ <div style="font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">3N Consulting</div>
+ <p style="color: #6b7280;">Results. Delivered.</p>
+ </div>
+ <div class="footer-links">
+ <a href="index.html">Home</a>
+ <a href="about.html">About</a>
+ <a href="services.html">Services</a>
+ <a href="contact.html">Contact</a>
+ <a href="thought-leadership.html">Thought Leadership</a>
+ <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ <div style="text-align: center; margin-top: 1.5rem; padding-top: 1.5rem; border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb; color: #9ca3af;">
+ <p>© 2024 3N Consulting. All rights reserved.</p>
+ </div>
+ </footer>

width: auto; max-width: 250px;%22%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3Cbutton class=%22nav-toggle%22 aria-label=%22Toggle navigation%22%3E%E2%98%B0%3C/button%3E%0A %3Cnav class=%22nav-links%22%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22index.html%22%3EHome%3C/a%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22about.html%22%3EAbout Us%3C/a%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22services.html%22%3EService Lines%3C/a%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22careers.html%22%3ECareers%3C/a%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22contact.html%22%3EContact Us%3C/a%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22thought-leadership.html%22 class=%22active%22%3EThought Leadership%3C/a%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22disclaimers.html%22%3EDisclaimers%3C/a%3E%0A %3C/nav%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/header%3E%0A%0A %3Cmain class=%22main%22%3E%0A %3C!-- HERO --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22hero%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22hero-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22hero-eyebrow%22%3EThought Leadership%3C/div%3E%0A %3Ch1 class=%22hero-title%22%3ENick Gupta%3C/h1%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22hero-subtitle%22%3EChief Executive Officer%3C/div%3E%0A %3Cp class=%22hero-body%22%3E%0A Founder of 3N Consulting LLC %7C 25+ Years of Management Consulting %7C Enterprise Transformation & Value Creation Leader%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- BIOGRAPHY SECTION --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section section-alt%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-header%22%3E%0A %3Ch2 class=%22section-title%22%3EBiography%3C/h2%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22bio-section%22%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A Nick Gupta is the Founder of 3N Consulting LLC, where he leads enterprise efficiency, transformation, and value-creation initiatives across the private equity, commercial, and public sectors. With more than 25 years of management consulting experience, Mr. Gupta has become a trusted advisor to CEOs, investors, and boards%E2%80%94helping organizations achieve measurable operational and financial improvement under aggressive growth or turnaround mandates.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A Mr. Gupta's background includes extensive work with private equity portfolio companies, where he has partnered with management teams and investors to stabilize operations, accelerate EBITDA growth, and deliver post-acquisition value creation. He has served on Boards of Directors, Advisory Boards, and Technical Advisory Boards, helping firms navigate operational transformation, scale technology infrastructure, and successfully raise Series A funding. His expertise in aligning financial objectives with sustainable workforce and operational practices has made him a sought-after advisor for mid-market firms across technology, consumer goods, and manufacturing.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- EXPERIENCE & EXPERTISE SECTION --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-header%22%3E%0A %3Ch2 class=%22section-title%22%3ECareer Highlights%3C/h2%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22bio-section%22%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A %3Cstrong%3EWipro Consulting Services:%3C/strong%3E Prior to founding 3N Consulting, Mr. Gupta served as Global Head of Organizational Redesign at Wipro Consulting Services, where he was one of the fastest-tracked professionals from Manager to Partner in the firm's history. He pioneered Wipro's %22Value Engineering%22 delivery model%E2%80%94offering performance assessments at no cost and sharing in verified client savings.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A %3Cstrong%3EEarly Career:%3C/strong%3E His earlier career at Deloitte and BearingPoint shaped his foundation in strategy, process optimization, and financial modeling.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A %3Cstrong%3EMajor Transformations:%3C/strong%3E Across his career, Mr. Gupta has led major transformation programs for Wal-Mart, BNY Mellon, NBC Universal, Citigroup, and others. At Wal-Mart's Bentonville headquarters, his redesign of the company's Information Systems Division (ISD) directly preserved 350 U.S. jobs that were slated for outsourcing%E2%80%94earning executive recognition for balancing efficiency with workforce protection.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- EDUCATION & BACKGROUND SECTION --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section section-alt%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-header%22%3E%0A %3Ch2 class=%22section-title%22%3EEducation & Background%3C/h2%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22bio-section%22%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A A Maryland native, Mr. Gupta holds a %3Cstrong%3EB.S. in Management Science and Statistics%3C/strong%3E from the University of Maryland, College Park (Scholarship Recipient) and an %3Cstrong%3EMBA in Finance and Strategy%3C/strong%3E from Purdue University's Krannert School of Management (CIBER Assistantship Recipient).%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A He continues to lead 3N Consulting with a mission rooted in excellence, partnership, and measurable value creation%E2%80%94helping organizations realize their financial and operational potential through insight, discipline, and execution.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- CTA SECTION --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22cta-section%22%3E%0A %3Ch3 style=%22font-size: 1.3rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;%22%3EReady to Work with 3N Consulting?%3C/h3%3E%0A %3Cp style=%22margin-bottom: 1.5rem; color: #4b5563;%22%3ELet's discuss how we can help your organization achieve transformational results.%3C/p%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22contact.html%22 class=%22btn btn-primary%22%3EContact Us %E2%86%92%3C/a%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A %3C/main%3E%0A%0A %3Cfooter class=%22site-footer%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22footer-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv style=%22flex: 1; min-width: 200px;%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv style=%22font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;%22%3E3N Consulting%3C/div%3E%0A %3Cp style=%22color: #6b7280;%22%3EResults. Delivered.%3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22footer-links%22%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22index.html%22%3EHome%3C/a%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22about.html%22%3EAbout%3C/a%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22services.html%22%3EServices%3C/a%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22contact.html%22%3EContact%3C/a%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22thought-leadership.html%22%3EThought Leadership%3C/a%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22disclaimers.html%22%3EDisclaimers%3C/a%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3Cdiv style=%22text-align: center; margin-top: 1.5rem; padding-top: 1.5rem; border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb; color: #9ca3af;%22%3E%0A %3Cp%3E© 2024 3N Consulting. ","isNew":true,"isApplied":true}]}],"context":{"author":"Coding Agent","operationId":"3d7189bc-0b61-4f5b-ae29-a6eeee54866e","usageStatistics":{"llmCallsUsedForAnswer":2.0,"llmCallsUsedTotal":146.0,"llmCallsLimit":280.0,"limitRenewalMillisecondTimestamp":1764430567383}},"createdAt":1764355631362,"isInternal":false},{"id":"8f659216-8646-49e8-bd2e-8efeef94ee1a","role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Here is the information for Rechel DeMuth's page, linked to the words "Rachel DeMuth" on the Thought Leadership" page: Director, Organizational Design Practice"},{"type":"text","text":"Dr. Rachel Frautschy Demuth serves as Director of the Organizational Design Practice at 3N Consulting LLC, where she leads the implementation of organizational design and transformation recommendations with a strong focus on change management, leadership alignment, and workforce readiness. With over 20 years of experience in organizational psychology, talent strategy, and human capital transformation, Dr. Demuth helps clients translate strategic intent into structure, culture, and behavior—ensuring sustainable performance through periods of rapid growth, merger integration, and strategic realignment."},{"type":"text","text":"Before joining 3N Consulting, Dr. Demuth founded Right, Left, Forward Design, LLC, a consulting firm specializing in organization design and transformation. In this capacity, she led design and change management engagements for Fortune 500 and high-growth companies, including multi-region oil and gas enterprises and national healthcare providers. Her portfolio includes work with The RBL Group, where she directed multiple organization design workstreams for a global transformation of an $18B firm, and Trilogy Health Services, where she streamlined HR field operations to improve service delivery and operational efficiency."},{"type":"text","text":"Previously, Dr. Demuth spent more than a decade at Humana, advancing to Director of Organization Effectiveness and Talent Management. There, she led enterprise-wide organization design, M&A integration, and culture alignment initiatives—including HR design and talent workstreams for Humana’s $5.7B acquisition of Kindred at Home. She also spearheaded leadership development and succession planning programs that resulted in a 30% increase in diverse executive mobility within the first year."},{"type":"text","text":"A recognized expert in organization effectiveness and human capital strategy, Dr. Demuth holds a Ph.D. and M.A. in Industrial/Organizational Psychology from Northern Illinois University, and an M.S. in Psychology from the University of Wisconsin–River Falls. She is a member of the Society for Industrial and Organizational Psychology (SIOP) and is known for combining systems thinking, design thinking, and data-driven methods to deliver organizational change that endures."}],"context":{"currentFile":{"path":"index.html","fsPath":"/Users/anupeesay/PycharmProjects/3NWebsite2/index.html","sources":["opened_tab"],"content":"<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
 <meta charset="UTF-8">
 <title>3N Consulting | Results. Delivered.</title>
 <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
 <style>
 /* Inline CSS so this preview actually renders with layout */
 *, *::before, *::after { box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
 html, body {
 font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
 color: #111827;
 background-color: #f9fafb;
 line-height: 1.6;
 }
 img, video { max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; }
 .site-wrapper { min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; }
 .main { flex: 1; }

 .site-header {
 background: #020617;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 border-bottom: 1px solid #1f2937;
 position: sticky;
 top: 0;
 z-index: 10;
 }
 .nav-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
 display: flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: space-between;
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 .brand-title {
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: 0.08em;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 font-size: 0.9rem;
 }
 .brand-tagline { font-size: 0.75rem; color: #9ca3af; }
 .brand-logo { height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px; }
 .nav-links { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; }
 .nav-links a {
 color: #e5e7eb;
 text-decoration: none;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 padding: 0.35rem 0.7rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
 }
 .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }
 .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
 .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }

 @media (max-width: 768px) {
 .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
 .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
 .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
 .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
 }

 .hero {
 padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .hero-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 3fr) minmax(0, 2fr);
 gap: 3rem;
 align-items: center;
 }
 .hero-eyebrow {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.13em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
 }
 .hero-title {
 font-size: clamp(2.1rem, 3vw, 2.7rem);
 font-weight: 750;
 letter-spacing: -0.03em;
 margin-bottom: 1rem;
 }
 .hero-highlight { color: #38bdf8; }
 .hero-body {
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 color: #d1d5db;
 max-width: 32rem;
 margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
 }
 .hero-meta {
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1.25rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 2rem;
 }
 .chip {
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.7);
 }
 .hero-media {
 border-radius: 1.2rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, rgba(56,189,248,0.12), transparent 50%),
 radial-gradient(circle at bottom right, rgba(52,211,153,0.12), transparent 55%);
 padding: 1rem;
 display: flex;
 flex-direction: column;
 gap: 0.75rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .badge-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.5rem; align-items: center; }
 .badge {
 border-radius: 999px;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.7rem;
 font-size: 0.7rem;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.12em;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.8);
 white-space: nowrap;
 }
 .badge-outline { background: transparent; }
 .logo-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; align-items: center; }
 .logo-row img { max-height: 40px; width: auto; }
 .caps-label {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.16em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 }

 .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }
 .section-alt { background: #f3f4f6; }
 .section-inner { max-width: 1120px; margin: 0 auto; }
 .section-header { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; }
 .section-kicker {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.15em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 color: #6b7280;
 margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
 }
 .section-title {
 font-size: 1.8rem;
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: -0.02em;
 margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
 }
 .section-subtitle {
 color: #4b5563;
 max-width: 40rem;
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 }

 .grid-3 {
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0,1fr));
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 @media (max-width: 900px) {
 .hero-inner { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0,1fr)); }
 }
 @media (max-width: 640px) {
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 }

 .card {
 border-radius: 1rem;
 border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 background: #ffffff;
 padding: 1.1rem 1.1rem 1.25rem;
 box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(15,23,42,0.04);
 }
 .card-title {
 font-size: 1rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 margin-bottom: 0.4rem;
 }
 .card-body { font-size: 0.9rem; color: #4b5563; }

 .testimonial-quote { font-style: italic; margin-bottom: 0.4rem; }
 .testimonial-client { font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.2rem; }
 .testimonial-ratings { font-size: 0.8rem; color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.4; }

 .btn {
 display: inline-flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: center;
 gap: 0.4rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.55rem 1.2rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 text-decoration: none;
 border: 1px solid transparent;
 cursor: pointer;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease, border-color 0.15s ease, transform 0.08s ease;
 }
 .btn-primary { background: #38bdf8; color: #020617; border-color: #0ea5e9; }
 .btn-primary:hover { background: #0ea5e9; transform: translateY(-1px); }
 .btn-ghost { background: transparent; color: #111827; border-color: #d1d5db; }
 .btn-ghost:hover { background: #e5e7eb; }

 .site-footer {
 border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 2rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #6b7280;
 background: #f9fafb;
 }
 .footer-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1rem;
 justify-content: space-between;
 }
 .footer-links {
 display: flex;
 gap: 0.9rem;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 }
 .footer-links a {
 color: #6b7280;
 text-decoration: none;
 }
 .footer-links a:hover { text-decoration: underline; }
 .footer-image { max-width: 150px; height: auto; }
 </style>
</head>
<body>
<div class="site-wrapper">
 <header class="site-header">

+ <main class="main">
+ <!-- HERO -->
+ <section class="hero">
+ <div class="hero-inner">
+ <div>
+ <div class="hero-eyebrow">Thought Leadership</div>
+ <h1 class="hero-title">Rachel DeMuth</h1>
+ <div class="hero-subtitle">Director, Organizational Design Practice</div>
+ <p class="hero-body">
+ Ph.D. in Industrial/Organizational Psychology | 20+ Years of Experience | Organization Design & Transformation Expert
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- BIOGRAPHY SECTION -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Biography</h2>
+ </div>
+ <div class="bio-section">
+ <p>
+ Dr. Rachel Frautschy Demuth serves as Director of the Organizational Design Practice at 3N Consulting LLC, where she leads the implementation of organizational design and transformation recommendations with a strong focus on change management, leadership alignment, and workforce readiness. With over 20 years of experience in organizational psychology, talent strategy, and human capital transformation, Dr. Demuth helps clients translate strategic intent into structure, culture, and behavior—ensuring sustainable performance through periods of rapid growth, merger integration, and strategic realignment.
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ Before joining 3N Consulting, Dr. Demuth founded Right, Left, Forward Design, LLC, a consulting firm specializing in organization design and transformation. In this capacity, she led design and change management engagements for Fortune 500 and high-growth companies, including multi-region oil and gas enterprises and national healthcare providers. Her portfolio includes work with The RBL Group, where she directed multiple organization design workstreams for a global transformation of an $18B firm, and Trilogy Health Services, where she streamlined HR field operations to improve service delivery and operational efficiency.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE SECTION -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Professional Experience</h2>
+ </div>
+ <div class="bio-section">
+ <p>
+ <strong>Humana:</strong> Previously, Dr. Demuth spent more than a decade at Humana, advancing to Director of Organization Effectiveness and Talent Management. There, she led enterprise-wide organization design, M&A integration, and culture alignment initiatives—including HR design and talent workstreams for Humana's $5.7B acquisition of Kindred at Home. She also spearheaded leadership development and succession planning programs that resulted in a 30% increase in diverse executive mobility within the first year.
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ <strong>Expertise:</strong> A recognized expert in organization effectiveness and human capital strategy, Dr. Demuth is known for combining systems thinking, design thinking, and data-driven methods to deliver organizational change that endures.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- EDUCATION & CREDENTIALS SECTION -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Education & Credentials</h2>
+ </div>
+ <div class="bio-section">
+ <p>
+ Dr. Demuth holds a <strong>Ph.D. in Industrial/Organizational Psychology</strong> from Northern Illinois University, an <strong>M.A. in Industrial/Organizational Psychology</strong> from Northern Illinois University, and an <strong>M.S. in Psychology</strong> from the University of Wisconsin–River Falls.
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ She is a member of the <strong>Society for Industrial and Organizational Psychology (SIOP)</strong>, a leading professional organization for I/O psychologists and organizational consultants. Her academic foundation and professional certifications position her as a thought leader in organizational design, change management, and human capital strategy.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- CTA SECTION -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="cta-section">
+ <h3 style="font-size: 1.3rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;">Ready to Transform Your Organization?</h3>
+ <p style="margin-bottom: 1.5rem; color: #4b5563;">Let's discuss how organizational design and change management can drive sustainable performance.</p>
+ <a href="contact.html" class="btn btn-primary">Contact Us →</a>
+ </div>
+ </div>

With over 20 years of experience in organizational psychology, talent strategy, and human capital transformation, Dr. Demuth helps clients translate strategic intent into structure, culture, and behavior%E2%80%94ensuring sustainable performance through periods of rapid growth, merger integration, and strategic realignment.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A Before joining 3N Consulting, Dr. Demuth founded Right, Left, Forward Design, LLC, a consulting firm specializing in organization design and transformation. In this capacity, she led design and change management engagements for Fortune 500 and high-growth companies, including multi-region oil and gas enterprises and national healthcare providers. Her portfolio includes work with The RBL Group, where she directed multiple organization design workstreams for a global transformation of an $18B firm, and Trilogy Health Services, where she streamlined HR field operations to improve service delivery and operational efficiency.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE SECTION --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-header%22%3E%0A %3Ch2 class=%22section-title%22%3EProfessional Experience%3C/h2%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22bio-section%22%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A %3Cstrong%3EHumana:%3C/strong%3E Previously, Dr. Demuth spent more than a decade at Humana, advancing to Director of Organization Effectiveness and Talent Management. There, she led enterprise-wide organization design, M&A integration, and culture alignment initiatives%E2%80%94including HR design and talent workstreams for Humana's $5.7B acquisition of Kindred at Home. She also spearheaded leadership development and succession planning programs that resulted in a 30%25 increase in diverse executive mobility within the first year.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A %3Cstrong%3EExpertise:%3C/strong%3E A recognized expert in organization effectiveness and human capital strategy, Dr. Demuth is known for combining systems thinking, design thinking, and data-driven methods to deliver organizational change that endures.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- EDUCATION & CREDENTIALS SECTION --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section section-alt%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-header%22%3E%0A %3Ch2 class=%22section-title%22%3EEducation & Credentials%3C/h2%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22bio-section%22%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A Dr. Demuth holds a %3Cstrong%3EPh.D. in Industrial/Organizational Psychology%3C/strong%3E from Northern Illinois University, an %3Cstrong%3EM.A. in Industrial/Organizational Psychology%3C/strong%3E from Northern Illinois University, and an %3Cstrong%3EM.S. in Psychology%3C/strong%3E from the University of Wisconsin%E2%80%93River Falls.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A She is a member of the %3Cstrong%3ESociety for Industrial and Organizational Psychology (SIOP)%3C/strong%3E, a leading professional organization for I/O psychologists and organizational consultants. Her academic foundation and professional certifications position her as a thought leader in organizational design, change management, and human capital strategy.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- CTA SECTION --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22cta-section%22%3E%0A %3Ch3 style=%22font-size: 1.3rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;%22%3EReady to Transform Your Organization?%3C/h3%3E%0A %3Cp style=%22margin-bottom: 1.5rem; color: #4b5563;%22%3ELet's discuss how organizational design and change management can drive sustainable performance.%3C/p%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22contact.html%22 class=%22btn btn-primary%22%3EContact Us %E2%86%92%3C/a%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A %3C/main%3E%0A%0A %3Cfooter class=%22site-footer%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22footer-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv style=%22flex: 1; min-width: 200px;%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv style=%22font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;%22%3E3N Consulting%3C/div%3E%0A %3Cp style=%22color: #6b7280;%22%3EResults. Here is the information for the Organizational Readiness Assessment Methodology (O-RAM) page: Methodology: Organizational Readiness Assessment Methodology (O-RAM)"},{"type":"text","text":"Organizational Readiness & Alignment Model (O-RAM)"},{"type":"text","text":"Transforming Insight into Actionable, Measurable Change"},{"type":"text","text":"At 3N Consulting, we believe that true transformation doesn’t begin with technology or structure — it begins with clarity. The Organizational Readiness & Alignment Model (O-RAM) is our proprietary assessment framework designed to help organizations understand how well their people, processes, and systems are aligned to their mission, and to identify the levers that unlock measurable performance gains."},{"type":"text","text":"O-RAM assesses organizational health across six integrated dimensions — Leadership, Structure, Metrics & Rewards, Governance & Processes, Technology/Systems, and Culture & Communication. Each area is evaluated against the organization’s strategic objectives to determine readiness for change and alignment with long-term goals. The result is a 360-degree diagnostic that translates qualitative insights into quantitative indicators of performance maturity."},{"type":"text","text":"By applying O-RAM, organizations gain a clear, data-driven understanding of where strengths exist and where misalignments may be holding back results. Leadership teams receive an actionable roadmap that prioritizes initiatives based on impact, risk, and readiness — enabling them to focus resources where they will drive the greatest value."},{"type":"text","text":"O-RAM delivers measurable value in three key ways:"},{"type":"text","text":"Strategic Alignment: Ensures leadership vision is translated into operational behavior and measurable outcomes."},{"type":"text","text":"Organizational Efficiency: Identifies duplications, gaps, and process inefficiencies, creating a foundation for streamlined operations and improved service delivery."},{"type":"text","text":"Change Readiness: Equips leaders with an objective, evidence-based view of how prepared the workforce, systems, and culture are for transformation."},{"type":"text","text":"Deployed across sectors — from higher education to public agencies and private enterprises — O-RAM has become a cornerstone of 3N Consulting’s performance improvement work. It empowers decision-makers with clarity, structure, and confidence to execute transformation that endures."}],"context":{"currentFile":{"path":"index.html","fsPath":"/Users/anupeesay/PycharmProjects/3NWebsite2/index.html","sources":["opened_tab"],"content":"<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
 <meta charset="UTF-8">
 <title>3N Consulting | Results. Delivered.</title>
 <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
 <style>
 /* Inline CSS so this preview actually renders with layout */
 *, *::before, *::after { box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
 html, body {
 font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
 color: #111827;
 background-color: #f9fafb;
 line-height: 1.6;
 }
 img, video { max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; }
 .site-wrapper { min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; }
 .main { flex: 1; }

 .site-header {
 background: #020617;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 border-bottom: 1px solid #1f2937;
 position: sticky;
 top: 0;
 z-index: 10;
 }
 .nav-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
 display: flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: space-between;
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 .brand-title {
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: 0.08em;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 font-size: 0.9rem;
 }
 .brand-tagline { font-size: 0.75rem; color: #9ca3af; }
 .brand-logo { height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px; }
 .nav-links { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; }
 .nav-links a {
 color: #e5e7eb;
 text-decoration: none;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 padding: 0.35rem 0.7rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
 }
 .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }
 .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
 .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }

 @media (max-width: 768px) {
 .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
 .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
 .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
 .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
 }

 .hero {
 padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .hero-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 3fr) minmax(0, 2fr);
 gap: 3rem;
 align-items: center;
 }
 .hero-eyebrow {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.13em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
 }
 .hero-title {
 font-size: clamp(2.1rem, 3vw, 2.7rem);
 font-weight: 750;
 letter-spacing: -0.03em;
 margin-bottom: 1rem;
 }
 .hero-highlight { color: #38bdf8; }
 .hero-body {
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 color: #d1d5db;
 max-width: 32rem;
 margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
 }
 .hero-meta {
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1.25rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 2rem;
 }
 .chip {
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.7);
 }
 .hero-media {
 border-radius: 1.2rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, rgba(56,189,248,0.12), transparent 50%),
 radial-gradient(circle at bottom right, rgba(52,211,153,0.12), transparent 55%);
 padding: 1rem;
 display: flex;
 flex-direction: column;
 gap: 0.75rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .badge-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.5rem; align-items: center; }
 .badge {
 border-radius: 999px;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.7rem;
 font-size: 0.7rem;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.12em;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.8);
 white-space: nowrap;
 }
 .badge-outline { background: transparent; }
 .logo-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; align-items: center; }
 .logo-row img { max-height: 40px; width: auto; }
 .caps-label {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.16em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;

Here is the information for the Organizational Readiness Assessment Methodology (O-RAM) page: Methodology: Organizational Readiness Assessment Methodology (O-RAM)"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Organizational Readiness & Alignment Model (O-RAM)"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Transforming Insight into Actionable, Measurable Change"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"At 3N Consulting, we believe that true transformation doesn’t begin with technology or structure — it begins with clarity. The Organizational Readiness & Alignment Model (O-RAM) is our proprietary assessment framework designed to help organizations understand how well their people, processes, and systems are aligned to their mission, and to identify the levers that unlock measurable performance gains."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"O-RAM assesses organizational health across six integrated dimensions — Leadership, Structure, Metrics & Rewards, Governance & Processes, Technology/Systems, and Culture & Communication. Each area is evaluated against the organization’s strategic objectives to determine readiness for change and alignment with long-term goals. The result is a 360-degree diagnostic that translates qualitative insights into quantitative indicators of performance maturity."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"By applying O-RAM, organizations gain a clear, data-driven understanding of where strengths exist and where misalignments may be holding back results. Leadership teams receive an actionable roadmap that prioritizes initiatives based on impact, risk, and readiness — enabling them to focus resources where they will drive the greatest value."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"O-RAM delivers measurable value in three key ways:"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Strategic Alignment: Ensures leadership vision is translated into operational behavior and measurable outcomes."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Organizational Efficiency: Identifies duplications, gaps, and process inefficiencies, creating a foundation for streamlined operations and improved service delivery."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Change Readiness: Equips leaders with an objective, evidence-based view of how prepared the workforce, systems, and culture are for transformation."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Deployed across sectors — from higher education to public agencies and private enterprises — O-RAM has become a cornerstone of 3N Consulting’s performance improvement work. It empowers decision-makers with clarity, structure, and confidence to execute transformation that endures."}]}]}},{"id":"55c7d08e-0567-43df-a6d4-9d4010f72d15","role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I'll help you link the toolkit options and create the O-RAM page. + font-size: 0.85rem;
+ font-weight: 600;
+ text-decoration: none;
+ border: 1px solid transparent;
+ cursor: pointer;
+ transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease, border-color 0.15s ease, transform 0.08s ease;
+ }
+ .btn-primary { background: #38bdf8; color: #020617; border-color: #0ea5e9; }
+ .btn-primary:hover { background: #0ea5e9; transform: translateY(-1px); }
+
+ .site-footer {
+ border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
+ padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 2rem;
+ font-size: 0.8rem;
+ color: #6b7280;
+ background: #f9fafb;
+ margin-top: 2rem;
+ }
+ .footer-inner {
+ max-width: 1120px;
+ margin: 0 auto;
+ display: flex;
+ flex-wrap: wrap;
+ gap: 1rem;
+ justify-content: space-between;
+ }
+ .footer-links {
+ display: flex;
+ gap: 0.9rem;
+ flex-wrap: wrap;
+ }
+ .footer-links a {
+ color: #6b7280;
+ text-decoration: none;
+ }
+ .footer-links a:hover { text-decoration: underline; }
+
+ @media (max-width: 768px) {
+ .hero { padding: 3rem 1.5rem 2rem; }
+ .section { padding: 2rem 1.5rem; }
+ .dimensions-grid { grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 1fr); }
+ }
+ </style>
+</head>
+<body>
+<div class="site-wrapper">
+ <header class="site-header">
+ <div class="nav-inner">
+ <div class="brand">
+ <img src="images/3nlogo.png" alt="3N Consulting Logo" style="height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px;">
+ </div>
+ <button class="nav-toggle" aria-label="Toggle navigation">☰</button>
+ <nav class="nav-links">
+ <a href="index.html">Home</a>
+ <a href="about.html">About Us</a>
+ <a href="services.html">Service Lines</a>
+ <a href="careers.html">Careers</a>
+ <a href="contact.html">Contact Us</a>
+ <a href="thought-leadership.html">Meet Our Team</a>
+ <a href="toolkit.html">Our Toolkit</a>
+ <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
+ </nav>
+ </div>
+ </header>
+
+ <main class="main">
+ <!-- HERO -->
+ <section class="hero">
+ <div class="hero-inner">
+ <div>
+ <div class="hero-eyebrow">Strategic Assessment Methodology</div>
+ <h1 class="hero-title">Organizational Readiness & Alignment Model (O-RAM)</h1>
+ <p class="hero-body">
+ Transforming Insight into Actionable, Measurable Change
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- OVERVIEW SECTION -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">What is O-RAM?</h2>
+ </div>
+ <div class="content-block">
+ <p>
+ At 3N Consulting, we believe that true transformation doesn't begin with technology or structure — it begins with clarity. The Organizational Readiness & Alignment Model (O-RAM) is our proprietary assessment framework designed to help organizations understand how well their people, processes, and systems are aligned to their mission, and to identify the levers that unlock measurable performance gains.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- THE SIX DIMENSIONS SECTION -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">The Six Integrated Dimensions</h2>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ O-RAM assesses organizational health across six key areas, each evaluated against your strategic objectives to determine readiness for change and alignment with long-term goals.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+
+ <div class="dimensions-grid">
+ <div class="dimension-box">
+ <h4>Leadership</h4>
+ <p>Vision clarity, decision-making authority, and strategic alignment at all levels.</p>
+ </div>
+ <div class="dimension-box">
+ <h4>Structure</h4>
+ <p>Organizational design, reporting relationships, and accountability frameworks.</p>
+ </div>
+ <div class="dimension-box">
+ <h4>Metrics & Rewards</h4>
+ <p>Performance indicators, compensation alignment, and incentive structures.</p>
+ </div>
+ <div class="dimension-box">
+ <h4>Governance & Processes</h4>
+ <p>Decision frameworks, workflows, and operational efficiency.</p>
+ </div>
+ <div class="dimension-box">
+ <h4>Technology/Systems</h4>
+ <p>System capabilities, integration, and technical readiness for initiatives.</p>
+ </div>
+ <div class="dimension-box">
+ <h4>Culture & Communication</h4>
+ <p>Organizational values, engagement levels, and information flow.</p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+
+ <div class="content-block">
+ <p>
+ The result is a 360-degree diagnostic that translates qualitative insights into quantitative indicators of performance maturity.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- INSIGHTS SECTION -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">What O-RAM Reveals</h2>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ By applying O-RAM, organizations gain a clear, data-driven understanding of where strengths exist and where misalignments may be holding back results.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+
+ <div class="content-block">
+ <p>
+ Leadership teams receive an actionable roadmap that prioritizes initiatives based on impact, risk, and readiness — enabling them to focus resources where they will drive the greatest value.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- VALUE DELIVERY SECTION -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Three Key Value Drivers</h2>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ O-RAM delivers measurable value across your organization:
+ </p>
+ </div>
+
+ <div class="value-box">
+ <h4>Strategic Alignment</h4>
+ <p>Ensures leadership vision is translated into operational behavior and measurable outcomes.</p>
+ </div>
+
+ <div class="value-box">
+ <h4>Organizational Efficiency</h4>
+ <p>Identifies duplications, gaps, and process inefficiencies, creating a foundation for streamlined operations and improved service delivery.</p>
+ </div>
+
+ <div class="value-box">
+ <h4>Change Readiness</h4>
+ <p>Equips leaders with an objective, evidence-based view of how prepared the workforce, systems, and culture are for transformation.</p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- IMPACT SECTION -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Proven Track Record Across Sectors</h2>
+ </div>
+
+ <div class="content-block">
+ <p>
+ Deployed across sectors — from higher education to public agencies and private enterprises — O-RAM has become a cornerstone of 3N Consulting's performance improvement work. It empowers decision-makers with clarity, structure, and confidence to execute transformation that endures.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- CTA SECTION -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="cta-section">
+ <h3 style="font-size: 1.3rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;">Ready to Assess Your Organization?</h3>
+ <p style="margin-bottom: 1.5rem; color: #4b5563;">Let's discuss how O-RAM can provide the clarity and insight your organization needs to drive transformation.</p>
+ <a href="contact.html" class="btn btn-primary">Schedule Your O-RAM Assessment →</a>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+ </main>
+
+ <footer class="site-footer">
+ <div class="footer-inner">
+ <div style="flex: 1; min-width: 200px;">
+ <div style="font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">3N Consulting</div>
+ <p style="color: #6b7280;">Results. Delivered.</p>
+ </div>
+ <div class="footer-links">
+ <a href="index.html">Home</a>
+ <a href="about.html">About</a>
+ <a href="services.html">Services</a>
+ <a href="contact.html">Contact</a>
+ <a href="thought-leadership.html">Meet Our Team</a>
+ <a href="toolkit.html">Our Toolkit</a>
+ <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ <div style="text-align: center; margin-top: 1.5rem; padding-top: 1.5rem; border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb; color: #9ca3af;">
+ <p>© 2024 3N Consulting. All rights reserved.</p>
+ </div>
+ </footer>
+</div>
+
+<script src="script.js"></script>
+</body>

class=%22content-block%22%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A At 3N Consulting, we believe that true transformation doesn't begin with technology or structure %E2%80%94 it begins with clarity. their mission, and to identify the levers that unlock measurable performance gains.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- THE SIX DIMENSIONS SECTION --%3E%0A indicators of performance maturity.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- INSIGHTS SECTION --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section section-alt%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv where they will drive the greatest value.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- VALUE DELIVERY SECTION --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-header%22%3E%0A %3Ch2 class=%22section-title%22%3EThree Key Value Drivers%3C/h2%3E%0A %3Cp class=%22section-subtitle%22%3E%0A O-RAM delivers into operational behavior and measurable outcomes.%3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A%0A %3Cdiv class=%22value-box%22%3E%0A %3Ch4%3EOrganizational Efficiency%3C/h4%3E%0A %3Cp%3EIdentifies duplications, gaps, Readiness%3C/h4%3E%0A %3Cp%3EEquips leaders with an objective, evidence-based view of how prepared the workforce, systems, and culture are for transformation.%3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A class=%22section-title%22%3EProven Track Record Across Sectors%3C/h2%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A%0A %3Cdiv class=%22content-block%22%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A Deployed across sectors %E2%80%94 from higher education to public agencies and private enterprises %E2%80%94 O-RAM has become a cornerstone of 3N Consulting's performance improvement work. It empowers decision-makers with clarity, structure, and confidence to execute transformation that endures.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- CTA SECTION --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22cta-section%22%3E%0A %3Ch3 style=%22font-size: 1.3rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;%22%3EReady to Assess Your Organization?%3C/h3%3E%0A %3Cp style=%22margin-bottom: 1.5rem; color: #4b5563;%22%3ELet's discuss how O-RAM can provide the clarity and insight your organization needs to drive transformation.%3C/p%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22contact.html%22 class=%22btn btn-primary%22%3ESchedule Your O-RAM Assessment %E2%86%92%3C/a%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A %3C/main%3E%0A%0A %3Cfooter class=%22site-footer%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22footer-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv style=%22flex: 1; min-width: 200px;%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv style=%22font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;%22%3E3N Consulting%3C/div%3E%0A %3Cp style=%22color: #6b7280;%22%3EResults. ","isNew":true,"isApplied":true}]}],"context":{"author":"Coding Agent","operationId":"22d31949-704d-4202-af25-a0de4b4efa17","usageStatistics":{"llmCallsUsedForAnswer":5.0,"llmCallsUsedTotal":252.0,"llmCallsLimit":280.0,"limitRenewalMillisecondTimestamp":1764430567381}},"createdAt":1764360810426,"isInternal":false},{"id":"af825263-284d-4943-95d3-7466ef1ca7d4","role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Here is the information for the AAA page, linked to its section in the "Our Toolkit" page: Toolkit: AAA"},{"type":"text","text":"While O-RAM provides the methodological foundation for every 3N Consulting engagement, our Assess–Align–Accelerate (AAA) Enabler transforms that framework into action."},{"type":"text","text":"The AAA Enabler is a toolkit and delivery accelerator that allows 3N to perform complex organizational assessments and transformations in days or weeks—not months. It combines structured diagnostic models, financial tools, interview frameworks, and operational checklists to drive clarity and results under even the most aggressive timelines."},{"type":"text","text":"AAA is where strategy meets speed—maintaining analytical rigor while enabling rapid insight, collaboration, and decision-making."},{"type":"text","text":"⚙️ How AAA Works"},{"type":"text","text":"AAA translates O-RAM’s methodological depth into an Agile-style execution rhythm. By working in short, focused sprints across parallel workstreams, our consultants capture insights, validate data, and align stakeholders in real time."},{"type":"text","text":"This structure allows for:"},{"type":"text","text":"Rapid discovery and data collection"},{"type":"text","text":"Ongoing validation and feedback loops"},{"type":"text","text":"Continuous synthesis and adjustment of recommendations"},{"type":"text","text":"The result is a faster, smarter path from assessment to action—without compromising quality or stakeholder engagement."},{"type":"text","text":" The Three Phases of AAA"},{"type":"text","text":"Each AAA engagement moves through three integrated, iterative phases. Your web designer can present these visually—such as in a horizontal process flow or three-column section."},{"type":"text","text":"1. Assess — Data-Driven Baseline and Diagnostic"},{"type":"text","text":"Every transformation begins with facts. 3N establishes a transparent, data-driven baseline that defines how work truly gets done."},{"type":"text","text":"Activities include:"},{"type":"text","text":"Process mapping and workload modeling"},{"type":"text","text":"Cost and efficiency benchmarking"},{"type":"text","text":"Evaluation of span-of-control ratios and technology utilization"},{"type":"text","text":"For public-sector and education clients, we benchmark against peer organizations (for example, Maryland’s St. Mary’s, Charles, Carroll, Cecil, and Wicomico Counties) to contextualize findings and identify opportunities for improvement."},{"type":"text","text":"Outcome: A clear operational baseline that quantifies inefficiencies and prioritizes opportunities for change."},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"2. Align — Organizational and Workforce Optimization"},{"type":"text","text":"Once insights are gathered, 3N translates data into design. We assess how organizational structures, reporting relationships, and staffing models align with mission and service expectations."},{"type":"text","text":"Activities include:"},{"type":"text","text":"Role alignment and workload balancing"},{"type":"text","text":"Skill-mix and resource optimization"},{"type":"text","text":"Governance structure and collaboration redesign"},{"type":"text","text":"Outcome: A future-state operating model that reduces duplication, clarifies accountability, and improves cross-functional coordination—all while protecting critical service delivery, such as instructional quality in K–12 systems."},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"3. Accelerate — Implementation and Continuous Improvement"},{"type":"text","text":"Efficiency gains must endure. In this phase, we turn recommendations into actionable, measurable, and sustainable improvements."},{"type":"text","text":"Activities include:"},{"type":"text","text":"Development of implementation roadmaps with milestones and cost-benefit projections"},{"type":"text","text":"Creation of KPI dashboards, process templates, and service-level frameworks"},{"type":"text","text":"Embedding continuous improvement tools within daily operations"},{"type":"text","text":"Outcome: Enduring efficiency, measurable results, and a culture of continuous improvement."},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":" The Result: Speed with Substance"},{"type":"text","text":"3N’s AAA Enabler harmonizes O-RAM’s strategic rigor with execution velocity—helping clients move from analysis to action with confidence."},{"type":"text","text":"AAA delivers:"},{"type":"text","text":"Rapid, data-driven diagnostics"},{"type":"text","text":"Aligned organizational and workforce designs"},{"type":"text","text":"Implementation roadmaps backed by metrics"},{"type":"text","text":"Accelerated delivery without compromising quality"},{"type":"text","text":"Whether serving a Fortune 500 firm, portfolio of a private equity investment, state agency, higher-education institution, or K-12 district, 3N’s Assess–Align–Accelerate model empowers leaders to act decisively—turning insight into impact faster than ever before."}],"context":{"currentFile":{"path":"index.html","fsPath":"/Users/anupeesay/PycharmProjects/3NWebsite2/index.html","sources":["opened_tab"],"content":"<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
 <meta charset="UTF-8">
 <title>3N Consulting | Results. Delivered.</title>
 <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
 <style>
 /* Inline CSS so this preview actually renders with layout */
 *, *::before, *::after { box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
 html, body {
 font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
 color: #111827;
 background-color: #f9fafb;
 line-height: 1.6;
 }
 img, video { max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; }
 .site-wrapper { min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; }
 .main { flex: 1; }

 .site-header {
 background: #020617;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 border-bottom: 1px solid #1f2937;
 position: sticky;
 top: 0;
 z-index: 10;
 }
 .nav-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
 display: flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: space-between;
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 .brand-title {
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: 0.08em;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 font-size: 0.9rem;
 }
 .brand-tagline { font-size: 0.75rem; color: #9ca3af; }
 .brand-logo { height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px; }
 .nav-links { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; }
 .nav-links a {
 color: #e5e7eb;
 text-decoration: none;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 padding: 0.35rem 0.7rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
 }
 .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }
 .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
 .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }

 @media (max-width: 768px) {
 .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
 .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
 .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
 .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
 }

 .hero {
 padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .hero-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 3fr) minmax(0, 2fr);
 gap: 3rem;
 align-items: center;
 }
 .hero-eyebrow {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.13em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
 }
 .hero-title {
 font-size: clamp(2.1rem, 3vw, 2.7rem);
 font-weight: 750;
 letter-spacing: -0.03em;
 margin-bottom: 1rem;
 }
 .hero-highlight { color: #38bdf8; }
 .hero-body {
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 color: #d1d5db;
 max-width: 32rem;
 margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
 }
 .hero-meta {
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1.25rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 2rem;
 }
 .chip {
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.7);
 }
 .hero-media {
 border-radius: 1.2rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, rgba(56,189,248,0.12), transparent 50%),
 radial-gradient(circle at bottom right, rgba(52,211,153,0.12), transparent 55%);
 padding: 1rem;
 display: flex;
 flex-direction: column;
 gap: 0.75rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .badge-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.5rem; align-items: center; }
 .badge {
 border-radius: 999px;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.7rem;
 font-size: 0.7rem;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.12em;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.8);
 white-space: nowrap;
 }
 .badge-outline { background: transparent; }
 .logo-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; align-items: center; }
 .logo-row img { max-height: 40px; width: auto; }
 .caps-label {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.16em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 }

 .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }
 .section-alt { background: #f3f4f6; }
 .section-inner { max-width: 1120px; margin: 0 auto; }
 .section-header { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; }
 .section-kicker {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.15em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 color: #6b7280;
 margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
 }
 .section-title {
 font-size: 1.8rem;
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: -0.02em;
 margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
 }
 .section-subtitle {
 color: #4b5563;
 max-width: 40rem;
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 }

 .grid-3 {
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0,1fr));
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 @media (max-width: 900px) {
 .hero-inner { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0,1fr)); }
 }
 @media (max-width: 640px) {
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 }

 .card {
 border-radius: 1rem;
 border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 background: #ffffff;
 padding: 1.1rem 1.1rem 1.25rem;
 box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(15,23,42,0.04);
 }
 .card-title {
 font-size: 1rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 margin-bottom: 0.4rem;
 }
 .card-body { font-size: 0.9rem; color: #4b5563; }

 .testimonial-quote { font-style: italic; margin-bottom: 0.4rem; }
 .testimonial-client { font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.2rem; }
 .testimonial-ratings { font-size: 0.8rem; color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.4; }

 .btn {
 display: inline-flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: center;
 gap: 0.4rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.55rem 1.2rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 text-decoration: none;
 border: 1px solid transparent;
 cursor: pointer;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease, border-color 0.15s ease, transform 0.08s ease;
 }
 .btn-primary { background: #38bdf8; color: #020617; border-color: #0ea5e9; }
 .btn-primary:hover { background: #0ea5e9; transform: translateY(-1px); }
 .btn-ghost { background: transparent; color: #111827; border-color: #d1d5db; }
 .btn-ghost:hover { background: #e5e7eb; }

 .site-footer {
 border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 2rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #6b7280;
 background: #f9fafb;
 }
 .footer-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1rem;
 justify-content: space-between;
 }
 .footer-links {
 display: flex;
 gap: 0.9rem;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 }
 .footer-links a {
 color: #6b7280;
 text-decoration: none;
 }
 .footer-links a:hover { text-decoration: underline; }

It combines structured diagnostic models, financial tools, interview frameworks, and operational checklists to drive clarity and results under even the most aggressive timelines."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"AAA is where strategy meets speed—maintaining analytical rigor while enabling rapid insight, collaboration, and decision-making."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"⚙️ How AAA Works"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"AAA translates O-RAM’s methodological depth into an Agile-style execution rhythm. Assess — Data-Driven Baseline and Diagnostic"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Every transformation begins with facts. 3N establishes a transparent, data-driven baseline that defines how work truly gets done."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Activities include:"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Process mapping and workload modeling"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Cost and efficiency benchmarking"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Evaluation of span-of-control ratios and technology utilization"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"For public-sector and education clients, we benchmark against peer organizations (for example, Maryland’s St. Mary’s, Charles, Carroll, Cecil, and Wicomico Counties) to contextualize findings and identify opportunities for improvement."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Outcome: A clear operational baseline that quantifies inefficiencies and prioritizes opportunities for change."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2. Align — Organizational and Workforce Optimization"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Once insights are gathered, 3N translates data into design. We assess how organizational structures, reporting relationships, and staffing models align with mission and service expectations."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Activities include:"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role alignment and workload balancing"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Skill-mix and resource optimization"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Governance structure and collaboration redesign"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Outcome: A future-state operating model that reduces duplication, clarifies accountability, and improves cross-functional coordination—all while protecting critical service delivery, such as instructional quality in K–12 systems."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3. Accelerate — Implementation and Continuous Improvement"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Efficiency gains must endure. include:"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Development of implementation roadmaps with milestones and cost-benefit +

+ background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ecfdf5 0%, #d1fae5 100%);
+ border-left: 4px solid #10b981;
+ padding: 1rem;
+ margin-top: 1rem;
+ border-radius: 0.5rem;
+ }
+
+ .outcome-badge strong {
+ color: #047857;
+ display: block;
+ margin-bottom: 0.3rem;
+ font-size: 0.9rem;
+ text-transform: uppercase;
+ letter-spacing: 0.05em;
+ }
+
+ .outcome-badge p {
+ color: #4b5563;
+ font-size: 0.95rem;
+ }
+
+ .benefits-grid {
+ display: grid;
+ grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(220px, 1fr));
+ gap: 1.5rem;
+ margin: 2rem 0;
+ }
+
+ .benefit-card {
+ background: #ffffff;
+ border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
+ border-radius: 1rem;
+ padding: 1.5rem;
+ text-align: center;
+ }
+
+ .benefit-card p {
+ font-weight: 600;
+ color: #020617;
+ font-size: 1rem;
+ }
+
+ .cta-section {
+ text-align: center;
+ padding: 2rem;
+ background: #f3f4f6;
+ border-radius: 1rem;
+ margin-top: 3rem;
+ }
+
+ .btn {
+ display: inline-flex;
+ align-items: center;
+ justify-content: center;
+ gap: 0.4rem;
+ border-radius: 999px;
+ padding: 0.55rem 1.2rem;
+ font-size: 0.85rem;
+ font-weight: 600;
+ text-decoration: none;
+ border: 1px solid transparent;
+ cursor: pointer;
+ transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease, border-color 0.15s ease, transform 0.08s ease;
+ }
+ .btn-primary { background: #38bdf8; color: #020617; border-color: #0ea5e9; }
+ .btn-primary:hover { background: #0ea5e9; transform: translateY(-1px); }
+
+ .site-footer {
+ border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
+ padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 2rem;
+ font-size: 0.8rem;
+ color: #6b7280;
+ background: #f9fafb;
+ margin-top: 2rem;
+ }
+ .footer-inner {
+ max-width: 1120px;
+ margin: 0 auto;
+ display: flex;
+ flex-wrap: wrap;
+ gap: 1rem;
+ justify-content: space-between;
+ }
+ .footer-links {
+ display: flex;
+ gap: 0.9rem;
+ flex-wrap: wrap;
+ }
+ .footer-links a {
+ color: #6b7280;
+ text-decoration: none;
+ }
+ .footer-links a:hover { text-decoration: underline; }
+
+ @media (max-width: 768px) {
+ .hero { padding: 3rem 1.5rem 2rem; }
+ .section { padding: 2rem 1.5rem; }
+ .phase-grid { grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 1fr); }
+ .benefits-grid { grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(150px, 1fr)); }
+ }
+ </style>
+</head>
+<body>
+<div class="site-wrapper">
+ <header class="site-header">
+ <div class="nav-inner">
+ <div class="brand">
+ <img src="images/3nlogo.png" alt="3N Consulting Logo" style="height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px;">
+ </div>
+ <button class="nav-toggle" aria-label="Toggle navigation">☰</button>
+ <nav class="nav-links">
+ <a href="index.html">Home</a>
+ <a href="about.html">About Us</a>
+ <a href="services.html">Service Lines</a>
+ <a href="careers.html">Careers</a>
+ <a href="contact.html">Contact Us</a>
+ <a href="thought-leadership.html">Meet Our Team</a>
+ <a href="toolkit.html">Our Toolkit</a>
+ <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
+ </nav>
+ </div>
+ </header>
+
+ <main class="main">
+ <!-- HERO -->
+ <section class="hero">
+ <div class="hero-inner">
+ <div>
+ <div class="hero-eyebrow">Execution Accelerator Methodology</div>
+ <h1 class="hero-title">Assess–Align–Accelerate (AAA)</h1>
+ <p class="hero-body">
+ Strategy meets speed — transforming complex organizational challenges into actionable results in days and weeks, not months.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- OVERVIEW SECTION -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">From Framework to Action</h2>
+ </div>
+ <div class="content-block">
+ <p>
+ While O-RAM provides the methodological foundation for every 3N Consulting engagement, our Assess–Align–Accelerate (AAA) Enabler transforms that framework into action.
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ The AAA Enabler is a toolkit and delivery accelerator that allows 3N to perform complex organizational assessments and transformations in days or weeks—not months. It combines structured diagnostic models, financial tools, interview frameworks, and operational checklists to drive clarity and results under even the most aggressive timelines.
+ </p>
+ <p style="font-weight: 600; color: #020617; margin-top: 1.5rem;">
+ AAA is where strategy meets speed—maintaining analytical rigor while enabling rapid insight, collaboration, and decision-making.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- HOW AAA WORKS -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">⚙️ How AAA Works</h2>
+ </div>
+
+ <div class="how-it-works">
+ <h3>Agile-Style Execution Rhythm</h3>
+ <p>
+ AAA translates O-RAM's methodological depth into an Agile-style execution rhythm. By working in short, focused sprints across parallel workstreams, our consultants capture insights, validate data, and align stakeholders in real time.
+ </p>
+ <p>This structure allows for:</p>
+ <ul>
+ <li>Rapid discovery and data collection</li>
+ <li>Ongoing validation and feedback loops</li>
+ <li>Continuous synthesis and adjustment of recommendations</li>
+ </ul>
+ <p style="font-weight: 600; margin-top: 1.5rem; color: #020617;">
+ The result is a faster, smarter path from assessment to action—without compromising quality or stakeholder engagement.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- THE THREE PHASES -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title"> The Three Phases of AAA</h2>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ Each AAA engagement moves through three integrated, iterative phases that transform data into decisions and decisions into results.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+
+ <div class="phase-grid">
+ <!-- ASSESS PHASE -->
+ <div class="phase-box">
+ <div class="phase-number">1</div>
+ <h4>Assess</h4>
+ <p style="font-size: 0.95rem; color: #666;"><strong>Data-Driven Baseline and Diagnostic</strong></p>
+ <p>Every transformation begins with facts. 3N establishes a transparent, data-driven baseline that defines how work truly gets done.</p>
+ 
+ <p style="font-weight: 600; margin-top: 1rem; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; font-size: 0.9rem; color: #020617;">Activities Include:</p>
+ <ul>
+ <li>Process mapping and workload modeling</li>
+ <li>Cost and efficiency benchmarking</li>
+ <li>Evaluation of span-of-control ratios and technology utilization</li>
+ <li>Peer organization benchmarking</li>
+ </ul>
+
+ <div class="outcome-badge">
+ <strong>Outcome</strong>
+ <p>A clear operational baseline that quantifies inefficiencies and prioritizes opportunities for change.</p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+
+ <!-- ALIGN PHASE -->
+ <div class="phase-box">
+ <div class="phase-number">2</div>
+ <h4>Align</h4>
+ <p style="font-size: 0.95rem; color: #666;"><strong>Organizational and Workforce Optimization</strong></p>
+ <p>Once insights are gathered, 3N translates data into design. We assess how organizational structures, reporting relationships, and staffing models align with mission and service expectations.</p>
+ 
+ <p style="font-weight: 600; margin-top: 1rem; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; font-size: 0.9rem; color: #020617;">Activities Include:</p>
+ <ul>
+ <li>Role alignment and workload balancing</li>
+ <li>Skill-mix and resource optimization</li>
+ <li>Governance structure and collaboration redesign</li>
+ </ul>
+
+ <div class="outcome-badge">
+ <strong>Outcome</strong>
+ <p>A future-state operating model that reduces duplication, clarifies accountability, and improves cross-functional coordination.</p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+
+ <!-- ACCELERATE PHASE -->
+ <div class="phase-box">
+ <div class="phase-number">3</div>
+ <h4>Accelerate</h4>
+ <p style="font-size: 0.95rem; color: #666;"><strong>Implementation and Continuous Improvement</strong></p>
+ <p>Efficiency gains must endure. In this phase, we turn recommendations into actionable, measurable, and sustainable improvements.</p>
+ 
+ <p style="font-weight: 600; margin-top: 1rem; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; font-size: 0.9rem; color: #020617;">Activities Include:</p>
+ <ul>
+ <li>Development of implementation roadmaps with milestones and cost-benefit projections</li>
+ <li>Creation of KPI dashboards and process templates</li>
+ <li>Embedding continuous improvement tools within daily operations</li>
+ </ul>
+
+ <div class="outcome-badge">
+ <strong>Outcome</strong>
+ <p>Enduring efficiency, measurable results, and a culture of continuous improvement.</p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- SPEED WITH SUBSTANCE -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title"> Speed with Substance</h2>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ 3N's AAA Enabler harmonizes O-RAM's strategic rigor with execution velocity—helping clients move from analysis to action with confidence.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+
+ <div class="benefits-grid">
+ <div class="benefit-card">
+ <p>Rapid, Data-Driven Diagnostics</p>
+ </div>
+ <div class="benefit-card">
+ <p>Aligned Organizational & Workforce Designs</p>
+ </div>
+ <div class="benefit-card">
+ <p>Implementation Roadmaps Backed by Metrics</p>
+ </div>
+ <div class="benefit-card">
+ <p>Accelerated Delivery Without Compromise</p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+
+ <div class="highlight-box">
+ <p style="margin: 0; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.8; color: #4b5563;">
+ Whether serving a Fortune 500 firm, portfolio of a private equity investment, state agency, higher-education institution, or K–12 district, 3N's Assess–Align–Accelerate model empowers leaders to act decisively—turning insight into impact faster than ever before.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- CTA SECTION -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="cta-section">
+ <h3 style="font-size: 1.3rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;">Ready to Accelerate Your Transformation?</h3>
+ <p style="margin-bottom: 1.5rem; color: #4b5563;">Let's discuss how AAA can deliver rapid, measurable results for your organization.</p>
+ <a href="contact.html" class="btn btn-primary">Start Your AAA Engagement →</a>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+ </main>
+
+ <footer class="site-footer">
+ <div class="footer-inner">
+ <div style="flex: 1; min-width: 200px;">
+ <div style="font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">3N Consulting</div>
+ <p style="color: #6b7280;">Results. Delivered.</p>
+ </div>
+ <div class="footer-links">
+ <a href="index.html">Home</a>
+ <a href="about.html">About</a>
+ <a href="services.html">Services</a>
+ <a href="contact.html">Contact</a>
+ <a href="thought-leadership.html">Meet Our Team</a>
+ <a href="toolkit.html">Our Toolkit</a>
+ <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ <div style="text-align: center; margin-top: 1.5rem; padding-top: 1.5rem; border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb; color: #9ca3af;">
+ <p>© 2024 3N Consulting. All rights reserved.</p>
+ </div>
+ </footer>
+</div>
+
+<script src="script.js"></script>
+</body>
+</html>","refToolCallId":"toolu_014hHk3m6x51JvTw7eX8bPVy"},{"type":"text","text":"Perfect! ✅ I've successfully created both toolkit pages and linked them. Here's what's now in place:
