 - Six integrated dimensions displayed in an organized grid
 - Clear sections on value delivery and proven track record
 - Professional styling consistent with your site

2. **Created AAA page** (`aaa.html`)
 - Clean visual presentation of the three phases (Assess → Align → Accelerate)
 - Phase cards with numbered circles and outcome badges
 - Benefits grid highlighting key AAA advantages
 - Agile-style execution explained clearly

3. **Updated toolkit.html**
 - O-RAM card now links to `o-ram.html`
 - AAA card now links to `aaa.html`
 - Both cards remain clickable and maintain their visual styling

Both pages feature:
- Consistent navigation and branding
- Mobile-responsive design
- Professional color scheme (cyan/blue accents matching your brand)
- Clear CTAs to "Contact Us" or "Schedule Assessment"
- Footer with navigation

The toolkit section is now fully functional with both methodology pages linked and accessible!"},{"type":"codePatch","diffs":[{"path":"aaa.html","patch":"@@ -0,0 +1,19376 @@

<html lang="en">
<head>
 <meta charset="UTF-8">
 <title>3N Consulting | Results. Delivered.</title>
 <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
 <style>
 /* Inline CSS so this preview actually renders with layout */
 *, *::before, *::after { box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
 html, body {
 font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
 color: #111827;
 background-color: #f9fafb;
 line-height: 1.6;
 }
 img, video { max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; }
 .site-wrapper { min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; }
 .main { flex: 1; }

 .site-header {
 background: #020617;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 border-bottom: 1px solid #1f2937;
 position: sticky;
 top: 0;
 z-index: 10;
 }
 .nav-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
 display: flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: space-between;
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 .brand-title {
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: 0.08em;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 font-size: 0.9rem;
 }
 .brand-tagline { font-size: 0.75rem; color: #9ca3af; }
 .brand-logo { height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px; }
 .nav-links { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; }
 .nav-links a {
 color: #e5e7eb;
 text-decoration: none;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 padding: 0.35rem 0.7rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
 }
 .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }
 .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
 .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }

 @media (max-width: 768px) {
 .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
 .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
 .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
 .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
 }

 .hero {
 padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .hero-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 3fr) minmax(0, 2fr);
 gap: 3rem;
 align-items: center;
 }
 .hero-eyebrow {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.13em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
 }
 .hero-title {
 font-size: clamp(2.1rem, 3vw, 2.7rem);
 font-weight: 750;
 letter-spacing: -0.03em;
 margin-bottom: 1rem;
 }
 .hero-highlight { color: #38bdf8; }
 .hero-body {
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 color: #d1d5db;
 max-width: 32rem;
 margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
 }
 .hero-meta {
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1.25rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 2rem;
 }
 .chip {
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.7);
 }
 .hero-media {
 border-radius: 1.2rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, rgba(56,189,248,0.12), transparent 50%),
 radial-gradient(circle at bottom right, rgba(52,211,153,0.12), transparent 55%);
 padding: 1rem;
 display: flex;
 flex-direction: column;
 gap: 0.75rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .badge-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.5rem; align-items: center; }
 .badge {
 border-radius: 999px;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.7rem;
 font-size: 0.7rem;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.12em;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.8);
 white-space: nowrap;
 }
 .badge-outline { background: transparent; }
 .logo-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; align-items: center; }
 .logo-row img { max-height: 40px; width: auto; }
 .caps-label {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.16em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 }

 .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }
 .section-alt { background: #f3f4f6; }
 .section-inner { max-width: 1120px; margin: 0 auto; }
 .section-header { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; }
 .section-kicker {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.15em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 color: #6b7280;
 margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
 }
 .section-title {
 font-size: 1.8rem;
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: -0.02em;
 margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
 }
 .section-subtitle {
 color: #4b5563;
 max-width: 40rem;
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 }

 .grid-3 {
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0,1fr));
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 @media (max-width: 900px) {
 .hero-inner { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0,1fr)); }
 }
 @media (max-width: 640px) {
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 }

 .card {
 border-radius: 1rem;
 border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 background: #ffffff;
 padding: 1.1rem 1.1rem 1.25rem;
 box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(15,23,42,0.04);
 }
 .card-title {
 font-size: 1rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 margin-bottom: 0.4rem;
 }
 .card-body { font-size: 0.9rem; color: #4b5563; }

 .testimonial-quote { font-style: italic; margin-bottom: 0.4rem; }
 .testimonial-client { font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.2rem; }
 .testimonial-ratings { font-size: 0.8rem; color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.4; }

 .btn {
 display: inline-flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: center;
 gap: 0.4rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.55rem 1.2rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;

 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease, border-color 0.15s ease, transform 0.08s ease;
 }

- <!-- About Content -->
- <section class="about-section">
- <div class="container">
- <div class="about-content">
- <h2>Our Mission</h2>
- <p>3N Consulting is dedicated to delivering measurable results through execution-focused consulting. We build long-term partnerships with our clients, take ownership of outcomes, and practice frugality to ensure savings flow directly to our clients.</p>
-
- <h2>Our Values</h2>
- <div class="values-grid">
- <div class="value-box">
- <h3>Integrity</h3>
- <p>We maintain the highest standards of integrity in all our dealings, ensuring transparency and honesty in every engagement.</p>
- </div>
- <div class="value-box">
- <h3>Client-Centric</h3>
- <p>Our clients are at the heart of everything we do. We invest in understanding their challenges and delivering tailored solutions.</p>
- </div>
- <div class="value-box">
- <h3>Results-Oriented</h3>
- <p>We are committed to delivering tangible, measurable results that drive real business impact.</p>
- </div>
- <div class="value-box">
- <h3>Ownership</h3>
- <p>We don't just staff projects—we own the results and keep our commitments, every time.</p>
- </div>
- </div>
-
- <h2>Who We Are</h2>
- <p>3N Consulting is a Maryland-based certified Minority Business Enterprise (MBE) in the Small Business Reserve (SBR) program and an NMSDC certified MBE. + /* Inline CSS so this preview actually renders with layout */

+ color: #111827;
+ background-color: #f9fafb;
+ line-height: 1.6;
+ }
+ img, video { max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; }
+ .site-wrapper { min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; }
+ .main { flex: 1; }
+
+ .site-header {
+ background: #020617;
+ color: #e5e7eb;
+ border-bottom: 1px solid #1f2937;
+ position: sticky;
+ top: 0;
+ z-index: 10;
+ }
+ .nav-inner {
+ max-width: 1120px;
+ margin: 0 auto;
+ padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
+ display: flex;
+ align-items: center;
+ justify-content: space-between;
+ gap: 1.5rem;
+ }
+ .brand-title {
+ font-weight: 700;
+ letter-spacing: 0.08em;
+ text-transform: uppercase;
+ font-size: 0.9rem;
+ }
+ .brand-tagline { font-size: 0.75rem; color: #9ca3af; }
+ .brand-logo { height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px; }
+ .nav-links { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; }
+ .nav-links a {
+ color: #e5e7eb;
+ text-decoration: none;
+ font-size: 0.85rem;
+ padding: 0.35rem 0.7rem;
+ border-radius: 999px;
+ transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
+ }
+ .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }
+ .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
+ .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }
+
+ @media (max-width: 768px) {
+ .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
+ .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
+ .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
+ .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
+ }
+
+ .hero {
+ padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
+ background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
+ color: #e5e7eb;
+ }
+ .hero-inner {
+ max-width: 1120px;
+ margin: 0 auto;
+ display: grid;
+ grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 1fr);
+ gap: 3rem;
+ align-items: center;
+ }
+ .hero-eyebrow {
+ text-transform: uppercase;
+ letter-spacing: 0.13em;
+ font-size: 0.75rem;
+ color: #9ca3af;
+ margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
+ }
+ .hero-title {
+ font-size: clamp(2.1rem, 3vw, 2.7rem);
+ font-weight: 750;
+ letter-spacing: -0.03em;
+ margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
+ }
+ .hero-body {
+ font-size: 0.98rem;
+ color: #d1d5db;
+ max-width: 48rem;
+ margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
+ }
+
+ .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }
+ .section-alt { background: #f3f4f6; }
+ .section-inner { max-width: 1120px; margin: 0 auto; }
+ .section-header { margin-bottom: 2rem; }
+ .section-kicker {
+ text-transform: uppercase;
+ letter-spacing: 0.15em;
+ font-size: 0.75rem;
+ font-weight: 600;
+ color: #6b7280;
+ margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
+ }
+ .section-title {
+ font-size: 1.8rem;
+ font-weight: 700;
+ letter-spacing: -0.02em;
+ margin-bottom: 1rem;
+ }
+ .section-subtitle {
+ color: #4b5563;
+ max-width: 48rem;
+ font-size: 0.98rem;
+ line-height: 1.8;
+ margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
+ }
+
+ .content-block {
+ color: #4b5563;
+ font-size: 0.98rem;
+ line-height: 1.8;
+ margin-bottom: 2rem;
+ }
+
+ .content-block h3 {
+ font-size: 1.3rem;
+ font-weight: 700;
+ color: #111827;
+ margin-bottom: 1rem;
+ margin-top: 1.5rem;
+ }
+
+ .content-block ul {
+ list-style: none;
+ padding: 0;
+ margin: 1.5rem 0;
+ }
+
+ .content-block li {
+ padding: 0.5rem 0 0.5rem 1.8rem;
+ position: relative;
+ }
+
+ .content-block li::before {
+ content: '→';
+ position: absolute;
+ left: 0;
+ color: #38bdf8;
+ font-weight: 600;
+ }
+
+ .highlight-box {
+ background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f0f9ff 0%, #e0f2fe 100%);
+ border: 1px solid #38bdf8;
+ border-radius: 1rem;
+ padding: 1.5rem;
+ margin: 1.5rem 0;
+ }
+
+ .highlight-box p {
+ font-size: 0.95rem;
+ color: #4b5563;
+ line-height: 1.8;
+ }
+
+ .email-link {
+ color: #38bdf8;
+ text-decoration: none;
+ font-weight: 600;
+ }
+
+ .email-link:hover {
+ text-decoration: underline;
+ }
+
+ .cta-section {
+ text-align: center;
+ padding: 2rem;
+ background: #f3f4f6;
+ border-radius: 1rem;
+ margin-top: 3rem;
+ }
+
+ .btn {
+ display: inline-flex;
+ align-items: center;
+ justify-content: center;
+ gap: 0.4rem;
+ border-radius: 999px;
+ padding: 0.55rem 1.2rem;
+ font-size: 0.85rem;
+ font-weight: 600;
+ text-decoration: none;
+ border: 1px solid transparent;
+ cursor: pointer;
+ transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease, border-color 0.15s ease, transform 0.08s ease;
+ }
+ .btn-primary { background: #38bdf8; color: #020617; border-color: #0ea5e9; }
+ .btn-primary:hover { background: #0ea5e9; transform: translateY(-1px); }
+
+ .site-footer {
+ border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
+ padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 2rem;
+ font-size: 0.8rem;
+ color: #6b7280;
+ background: #f9fafb;
+ margin-top: 2rem;
+ }
+ .footer-inner {
+ max-width: 1120px;
+ margin: 0 auto;
+ display: flex;
+ flex-wrap: wrap;
+ gap: 1rem;
+ justify-content: space-between;
+ }
+ .footer-links {
+ display: flex;
+ gap: 0.9rem;
+ flex-wrap: wrap;
+ }
+ .footer-links a {
+ color: #6b7280;
+ text-decoration: none;
+ }
+ .footer-links a:hover { text-decoration: underline; }
+
+ @media (max-width: 768px) {
+ .hero { padding: 3rem 1.5rem 2rem; }
+ .section { padding: 2rem 1.5rem; }

+ </style>

+

## Updated Pages:
✅ **About Us** (about.html) 
✅ **Service Lines** (services.html) 
✅ **Careers** (careers.html) 
✅ **Contact Us** (contact.html) 
✅ **Meet Our Team** (thought-leadership.html) 
✅ **Disclaimers** (disclaimers.html)

## What Changed:
All pages now feature:
- **Modern header** with dark background (#020617) and sticky positioning
- **Updated navigation** with responsive mobile toggle button (☰)
- **Consistent color scheme** with cyan accents (#38bdf8)
- **Inline CSS** matching the Home and Toolkit pages
- **Professional typography** and spacing
- **Modern footer** with the same structure
- **Active link indicators** for current page
- **Proper mobile responsiveness**

All pages now have a cohesive, professional design throughout your entire website.  *, *::before, *::after { box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
 html, body {

 color: #111827;
 background-color: #f9fafb;
 line-height: 1.6;
 }
 img, video { max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; }
 .site-wrapper { min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; }
 .main { flex: 1; }

 .site-header {
 background: #020617;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 border-bottom: 1px solid #1f2937;
 position: sticky;
 top: 0;
 z-index: 10;
 }
 .nav-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
 display: flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: space-between;
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 .brand-title {
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: 0.08em;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 font-size: 0.9rem;
 }
 .brand-tagline { font-size: 0.75rem; color: #9ca3af; }
 .brand-logo { height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px; }
 .nav-links { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; }
 .nav-links a {
 color: #e5e7eb;
 text-decoration: none;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 padding: 0.35rem 0.7rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
 }
 .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }
 .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
 .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }

 @media (max-width: 768px) {
 .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
 .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
 .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
 .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
 }

 .hero {
 padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .hero-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 3fr) minmax(0, 2fr);
 gap: 3rem;
 align-items: center;
 }
 .hero-eyebrow {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.13em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
 }
 .hero-title {
 font-size: clamp(2.1rem, 3vw, 2.7rem);
 font-weight: 750;
 letter-spacing: -0.03em;
 margin-bottom: 1rem;
 }
 .hero-highlight { color: #38bdf8; }
 .hero-body {
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 color: #d1d5db;
 max-width: 32rem;
 margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
 }
 .hero-meta {
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1.25rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 2rem;
 }
 .chip {
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.7);
 }
 .hero-media {
 border-radius: 1.2rem;

 radial-gradient(circle at bottom right, rgba(52,211,153,0.12), transparent 55%);

 gap: 0.75rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .badge-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.5rem; align-items: center; }
 .badge {
 border-radius: 999px;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.7rem;
 font-size: 0.7rem;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.12em;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.8);
 white-space: nowrap;
 }
 .badge-outline { background: transparent; }
 .logo-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; align-items: center; }
 .logo-row img { max-height: 40px; width: auto; }
 .caps-label {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.16em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 }

 .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }
 .section-alt { background: #f3f4f6; }
 .section-inner { max-width: 1120px; margin: 0 auto; }
 .section-header { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; }
 .section-kicker {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.15em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;

 }
 .section-title {

 font-weight: 700;

 margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
 }
 .section-subtitle {
 color: #4b5563;

 font-size: 0.98rem;
 }

 .grid-3 {
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0,1fr));
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 @media (max-width: 900px) {
 .hero-inner { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0,1fr)); }
 }
 @media (max-width: 640px) {
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 }

 .card {
 border-radius: 1rem;
 border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 background: #ffffff;
 padding: 1.1rem 1.1rem 1.25rem;

 }

 .testimonial-quote { font-style: italic; margin-bottom: 0.4rem; }

 .btn {

 align-items: center;

 gap: 0.4rem;

 padding: 0.55rem 1.2rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;

 text-decoration: none;

 cursor: pointer;

 }
 .btn-primary { background: #38bdf8; color: #020617; border-color: #0ea5e9; }

 .btn-ghost { background: transparent; color: #111827; border-color: #d1d5db; }

 .site-footer {

 .footer-inner {

 }

 }

 }

 .footer-image { max-width: 150px; height: auto; }

<div class="site-wrapper">
 <header class="site-header">

 <main class="main">
 <!-- HERO -->
 <section class="hero">
 <div class="hero-inner">
 <div>
 <div class="hero-eyebrow">Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes</div>
 <h1 class="hero-title">
 Results. <span class="hero-highlight">Delivered.</span>
 </h1>
 <p class="hero-body">
 3N Consulting is a Maryland-based management consulting firm that
 builds long-term partnerships, takes ownership of outcomes, and
 practices frugality so savings flow to clients.
 </p>
 <div class="hero-meta">
 <span class="chip">Certified MD Minority Business Enterprise (MBE)</span>
 <span class="chip">Small Business Reserve (SBR) Program</span>
 <span class="chip">NMSDC Certified MBE</span>
 </div>

 <a href="case-studies.html" class="btn btn-ghost">View recent case studies</a>
 </div>
 </div>

 <aside class="hero-media">
 <div class="caps-label">Our work in motion</div>
 <div style="background:#020617;border-radius:0.9rem;padding:1.5rem;text-align:center;font-size:0.85rem;color:#9ca3af;">
 Video / animation placeholder
 </div>
 <div class="badge-row">
 <span class="badge">MD MBE • SBR</span>
 <span class="badge badge-outline">NMSDC Certified MBE</span>
 </div>
 <div class="logo-row">
 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">MD MBE</div>
 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">NMSDC</div>
 </div>
 <p style="font-size:0.8rem; color:#9ca3af;">
 Proud to support Maryland's public agencies, colleges, and communities.
 </p>
 </aside>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- WHY 3N -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Why 3N Consulting?</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">
 Because we maintain integrity. Because we value clients. And because we deliver results.
 </h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our model is built for outcome-based partnerships, true ownership of commitments,
 and a cost structure that puts client value first.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Vested in client success</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Vested in Client Success:</strong> Outcome-based partnerships and long-term relationships.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Ownership</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Ownership:</strong> We don't "staff"—we own results and keep our commitments.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Cost structure</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Cost Structure:</strong> Frugal by design—invest in talent, minimize overhead, pass savings on.
 </p>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- CAPABILITIES -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Capabilities</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">Core areas where we deliver results</h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">

 proven methods like O-RAM and AAA.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <a href="organizational-redesign.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Organizational Redesign</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 Align structure, people, and processes for resilience and agility.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <a href="strategy-operations.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Strategy & Operations</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 Corporate strategy. Interim management. Lean improvements that minimize waste and maximize efficiency.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <a href="data-analytics.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Data Analytics</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 Frameworks & dashboards that uncover patterns and predict trends.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <a href="digital-transformation.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Digital Transformation</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 From legacy modernization to AI—reduce the ~70% failure risk with alignment.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <a href="human-capital.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Human Capital & Change Management</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 Strengthen engagement, accelerate adoption, and lead with purpose.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- SOLUTIONS -->
 <section class="section">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Productized solution offerings</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">Solutions we can rapidly deploy</h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Solutions we can rapidly deploy through assets developed over years of
 knowledge and experience—in procurement, manufacturing, and technology.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title"><a href="manufacturing.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">Manufacturing</a></h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 Planning, operations, and process redesign for manufacturers seeking to
 scale while maintaining service and quality.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title"><a href="cio-services.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">CIO Services</a></h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 Portfolio rationalization, IT strategy, and value-focused technology
 investment for public sector and mid-market organizations.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title"><a href="procurement.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">Procurement</a></h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 A structured procurement solution to unlock savings, improve compliance,
 and turn purchasing into a strategic advantage.
 </p>
 </article>

Here is the information for Nick Sickler's page: Nick Sickler, CPA"},{"type":"text","text":"Advisory Board Member and Interim Chief Financial Officer"},{"type":"text","text":"Nick Sickler serves as 3N Consulting’s Interim Chief Financial Officer and Advisory Board Member, bringing more than two decades of accounting and financial leadership experience. Nick currently serves as Chief Financial Officer at Great Point Capital, where he oversees finance operations and leads the firm’s accounting department. A Certified Public Accountant, Nick’s career spans over 24 years in public accounting, working with privately held businesses and high-net-worth individuals to help them achieve their financial goals through sound audit, tax, and trust planning practices."},{"type":"text","text":"Before joining Great Point Capital, Nick spent nearly 25 years at John R. Waters & Company, a respected Chicago-based public accounting firm, where he advanced to Attestation Manager and earned a reputation for delivering high-quality client service. Deeply engaged in professional and civic life, he has held leadership roles with the Purdue Club of Chicago, the Purdue Alumni Association, and the Risk Management Association’s Chicago Chapter, where he served as both President and Treasurer."},{"type":"text","text":"Nick holds a Bachelor of Science in Accounting from Purdue University and is an active member of both the American Institute of CPAs (AICPA) and the Illinois CPA Society. His hands-on leadership, financial acumen, and long-standing dedication to integrity and excellence strengthen 3N Consulting’s fiscal strategy and governance as the firm continues its growth across Maryland and beyond."}],"context":{"currentFile":{"path":"index.html","fsPath":"/Users/anupeesay/PycharmProjects/3NWebsite2/index.html","sources":["opened_tab"],"content":"<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<div class="site-wrapper">

 <!-- HERO -->
 <section class="hero">

 <h1 class="hero-title">
 Results. <span class="hero-highlight">Delivered.</span>
 </h1>

 3N Consulting is a Maryland-based management consulting firm that
 builds long-term partnerships, takes ownership of outcomes, and
 practices frugality so savings flow to clients.
 </p>

 <aside class="hero-media">
 <div class="caps-label">Our work in motion</div>
 <div style="background:#020617;border-radius:0.9rem;padding:1.5rem;text-align:center;font-size:0.85rem;color:#9ca3af;">

 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">NMSDC</div>
 </div>
 <p style="font-size:0.8rem; color:#9ca3af;">
 Proud to support Maryland's public agencies, colleges, and communities.
 </p>

 <!-- WHY 3N -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Why 3N Consulting?</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">
 Because we maintain integrity. Because we value clients. And because we deliver results.
 </h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our model is built for outcome-based partnerships, true ownership of commitments,
 and a cost structure that puts client value first.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Vested in client success</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Vested in Client Success:</strong> Outcome-based partnerships and long-term relationships.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Ownership</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Ownership:</strong> We don't "staff"—we own results and keep our commitments.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Cost structure</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Cost Structure:</strong> Frugal by design—invest in talent, minimize overhead, pass savings on.
 </p>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- TESTIMONIALS -->

 </p>

 <article class="card">

Here is the information for Nick Sickler's page: Nick Sickler, CPA"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Advisory Board Member and Interim Chief Financial Officer"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Nick Sickler serves as 3N Consulting’s Interim Chief Financial Officer and Advisory Board Member, bringing more than two decades of accounting and financial leadership experience. Nick currently serves as Chief Financial Officer at Great Point Capital, where he oversees finance operations and leads the firm’s accounting department. A Certified Public Accountant, Nick’s career spans over 24 years in public accounting, working with privately held businesses and high-net-worth individuals to help them achieve their financial goals through sound audit, tax, and trust planning practices."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Before joining Great Point Capital, Nick spent nearly 25 years at John R. Waters & Company, a respected Chicago-based public accounting firm, where he advanced to Attestation Manager and earned a reputation for delivering high-quality client service. Deeply engaged in professional and civic life, he has held leadership roles with the Purdue Club of Chicago, the Purdue Alumni Association, and the Risk Management Association’s Chicago Chapter, where he served as both President and Treasurer."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Nick holds a Bachelor of Science in Accounting from Purdue University and is an active member of both the American Institute of CPAs (AICPA) and the Illinois CPA Society.  }

 .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
 .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }

 @media (max-width: 768px) {
 .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
 .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
 .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
 .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
 }

 .hero {
 padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .hero-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 3fr) minmax(0, 2fr);
 gap: 3rem;
 align-items: center;
 }
 .hero-eyebrow {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.13em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
 }
 .hero-title {
 font-size: clamp(2.1rem, 3vw, 2.7rem);
 font-weight: 750;
 letter-spacing: -0.03em;
 margin-bottom: 1rem;
 }
 .hero-highlight { color: #38bdf8; }
 .hero-body {
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 color: #d1d5db;
 max-width: 32rem;
 margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
 }
 .hero-meta {
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1.25rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 2rem;
 }
 .chip {
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.7);
 }
 .hero-media {
 border-radius: 1.2rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, rgba(56,189,248,0.12), transparent 50%),
 radial-gradient(circle at bottom right, rgba(52,211,153,0.12), transparent 55%);
 padding: 1rem;
 display: flex;
 flex-direction: column;
 gap: 0.75rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .badge-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.5rem; align-items: center; }
 .badge {
 border-radius: 999px;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.7rem;
 font-size: 0.7rem;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.12em;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.8);
 white-space: nowrap;
 }
 .badge-outline { background: transparent; }
 .logo-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; align-items: center; }
 .logo-row img { max-height: 40px; width: auto; }
 .caps-label {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.16em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 }

 .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }
 .section-alt { background: #f3f4f6; }
 .section-inner { max-width: 1120px; margin: 0 auto; }
 .section-header { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; }
 .section-kicker {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.15em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 font-weight: 600;

 margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
 }

 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: -0.02em;
 margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
 }
 .section-subtitle {
 color: #4b5563;
 max-width: 40rem;
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 }

 .grid-3 {
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0,1fr));
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 @media (max-width: 900px) {
 .hero-inner { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0,1fr)); }
 }
 @media (max-width: 640px) {
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 }

 .card {
 border-radius: 1rem;
 border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 background: #ffffff;
 padding: 1.1rem 1.1rem 1.25rem;
 box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(15,23,42,0.04);
 }

 font-size: 1rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 margin-bottom: 0.4rem;
 }

 .testimonial-quote { font-style: italic; margin-bottom: 0.4rem; }

 .testimonial-ratings { font-size: 0.8rem; color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.4; }

 .btn {
 display: inline-flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: center;
 gap: 0.4rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.55rem 1.2rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;

 text-decoration: none;
 border: 1px solid transparent;
 cursor: pointer;

 }
 .btn-primary { background: #38bdf8; color: #020617; border-color: #0ea5e9; }

 .btn-ghost:hover { background: #e5e7eb; }

 margin: 0 auto;

 }

 gap: 0.9rem;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 }

 text-decoration: none;
 }

 .footer-image { max-width: 150px; height: auto; }

<body>
<div class="site-wrapper">
 <header class="site-header">
 <div class="nav-inner">

 <main class="main">
 <!-- HERO -->
 <section class="hero">
 <div class="hero-inner">
 <div>
 <div class="hero-eyebrow">Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes</div>
 <h1 class="hero-title">
 Results. <span class="hero-highlight">Delivered.</span>
 </h1>
 <p class="hero-body">
 3N Consulting is a Maryland-based management consulting firm that
 builds long-term partnerships, takes ownership of outcomes, and
 practices frugality so savings flow to clients.
 </p>
 <div class="hero-meta">
 <span class="chip">Certified MD Minority Business Enterprise (MBE)</span>
 <span class="chip">Small Business Reserve (SBR) Program</span>
 <span class="chip">NMSDC Certified MBE</span>
 </div>
 <div class="hero-cta">
 <a href="#" class="btn btn-primary">Discuss your initiative →</a>
 <a href="case-studies.html" class="btn btn-ghost">View recent case studies</a>
 </div>
 </div>

 <aside class="hero-media">
 <div class="caps-label">Our work in motion</div>
 <div style="background:#020617;border-radius:0.9rem;padding:1.5rem;text-align:center;font-size:0.85rem;color:#9ca3af;">
 Video / animation placeholder
 </div>
 <div class="badge-row">
 <span class="badge">MD MBE • SBR</span>
 <span class="badge badge-outline">NMSDC Certified MBE</span>
 </div>
 <div class="logo-row">
 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">MD MBE</div>
 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">NMSDC</div>
 </div>
 <p style="font-size:0.8rem; color:#9ca3af;">
 Proud to support Maryland's public agencies, colleges, and communities.
 </p>
 </aside>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- WHY 3N -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Why 3N Consulting?</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">
 Because we maintain integrity. Because we value clients. And because we deliver results.
 </h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our model is built for outcome-based partnerships, true ownership of commitments,
 and a cost structure that puts client value first.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Vested in client success</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Vested in Client Success:</strong> Outcome-based partnerships and long-term relationships.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Ownership</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Ownership:</strong> We don't "staff"—we own results and keep our commitments.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Cost structure</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Cost Structure:</strong> Frugal by design—invest in talent, minimize overhead, pass savings on.
 </p>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- TESTIMONIALS -->
 <section class="section">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header" style="display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:baseline;gap:0.75rem;flex-wrap:wrap;">
 <div>

 </p>

 <div class="grid-3">

 </article>

 <article class="card">

 <div class="testimonial-ratings">

 Management Team: "Exceptional"<br>
 Cost Control: "Exceptional"<br>
 Schedule Management: "Exceptional"
 </div>
 </article>

 <article class="card">

 CEO, Cosmetics, Health and Beauty Products Manufacturing firm
 </div>
 <p class="testimonial-quote">
 "We would highly recommend them to others"
 </p>
 <div class="testimonial-ratings">
 <strong>Client Satisfaction Survey Rating:</strong><br>
 Quality of Work: "Exceptional"<br>
 Management Team: "Very Good"<br>
 Cost Control: "Exceptional"<br>
 Schedule Management: "Exceptional"
 </div>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- CAPABILITIES -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Capabilities</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">Core areas where we deliver results</h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 These capability areas link into your service lines and toolkits, supported by
 proven methods like O-RAM and AAA.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <a href="organizational-redesign.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Organizational Redesign</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 Align structure, people, and processes for resilience and agility.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <a href="strategy-operations.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Strategy & Operations</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 Corporate strategy. Interim management. Lean improvements that minimize waste and maximize efficiency.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <a href="data-analytics.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Data Analytics</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 Frameworks & dashboards that uncover patterns and predict trends.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <a href="digital-transformation.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Digital Transformation</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 From legacy modernization to AI—reduce the ~70% failure risk with alignment.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <a href="human-capital.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Human Capital & Change Management</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 Strengthen engagement, accelerate adoption, and lead with purpose.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- SOLUTIONS -->
 <section class="section">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Productized solution offerings</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">Solutions we can rapidly deploy</h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Solutions we can rapidly deploy through assets developed over years of
 knowledge and experience—in procurement, manufacturing, and technology.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title"><a href="manufacturing.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">Manufacturing</a></h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 Planning, operations, and process redesign for manufacturers seeking to
 scale while maintaining service and quality.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title"><a href="cio-services.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">CIO Services</a></h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 Portfolio rationalization, IT strategy, and value-focused technology
 investment for public sector and mid-market organizations.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title"><a href="procurement.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">Procurement</a></h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 A structured procurement solution to unlock savings, improve compliance,
 and turn purchasing into a strategic advantage.
 </p>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>
 </main>

 <footer class="site-footer">
 <div class="footer-inner">
 <div>
 <div><strong>Results. Delivered.</strong> Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes.</div>
 <div style="margin-top:0.4rem; font-size:0.85rem;">
 We build long-term partnerships, take ownership of outcomes, and practice frugality so savings flow to clients.
 </div>
 <div style="margin-top:0.75rem; font-size:0.85rem;">
 <strong>Phone:</strong> (301) 723-7057<br>
 <strong>Address:</strong> 6710A Rockledge Drive, Bethesda, MD 20817
 </div>
 </div>

</div>

In addition to client work across a diverse portfolio of industries (Automotive, Consumer Products and Retail, Energy & Process Industries, Financial Institutions, and Healthcare) Marc most recently served as Chief Operating Officer of Kearney Digital & Analytics. Prior to taking on that role, he co-founded and co-led Kearney Analytics and was President of Cervello, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Kearney that serves as a trusted advisor to blue-chip clients, earning a stellar reputation as a market leader in agile analytics, CRM, enterprise performance management, data management, and business intelligence. "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Before being named President of Cervello, Marc served as Chief Operating Officer for A.T. Kearney Solutions, was a member of the Americas Leadership Team, and led the firm’s global Staffing & Operations function. Additionally, Marc chaired the firm’s US Investment Committees for over a decade."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Prior joining A.T. Kearney, Marc spent 12 years working for Air Products & Chemicals and American Cyanamid where he held positions in cost engineering, applied research & development, energy management, finance, and procurement."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Marc holds a B.S. in Chemical Engineering and M.S. in Management (Strategy and Finance), both from Purdue University. He served as President of the Krannert School Board of Directors from 2013-2019, was a member of the Dean’s Advisory Council from 2020-2025, and is a member of Purdue’s President’s Council."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]}]}},{"id":"5810206d-5652-4a10-8433-a00614fb211d","role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"toolCall","toolCallId":"toolu_017Lz42arYnEiETnFuN2sCKS","statusText":"Collecting requirements...","status":"SUCCESS","isHidden":false},{"type":"text","text":"1. I have Nick Sickler's and Marc Hochman's information. Please provide David Mann's information including his title/role and biography."}],"context":{"author":"Coding Agent","operationId":"ce358f90-08be-4554-9018-e5be72bbd95a"},"createdAt":1764362685536,"isInternal":false},{"id":"663c5253-0529-4710-b243-f42238d6a447","role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Here is David Mann's information: David O. Mann — Advisory Board Member"},{"type":"text","text":"David Mann is an entrepreneurship and growth strategy leader with 25+ years across venture capital, private equity, company-building, and executive education. He serves as Chairman of the Entrepreneurial Operating System (EOS) and is Managing Partner & Co-Founder of both The Firefly Group and Spring Mill Venture Partners. David has sourced, structured, and guided dozens of investments across technology, life sciences, and services, serving on boards and coaching CEOs to translate strategy into repeatable revenue, operating discipline, and measurable results."},{"type":"text","text":"A former U.S. Navy Supply Corps Officer and White House Liaison to the Secretary of the Navy, David brings operational rigor and mission focus to every engagement. For nearly two decades, he taught in Indiana University’s Kelley School of Business MBA program, where he designed and led the Venture Capital & Entrepreneurial Finance course, and he has guest-lectured at Purdue and Notre Dame. He holds an MBA from Harvard Business School (with additional coursework at the Kennedy School) and a B.S. from the U.S. Naval Academy, where he served as Company Commander and on the Brigade Honor Committee."},{"type":"text","text":"At 3N Consulting, David advises the leadership team on sales strategy, capital readiness, and EOS-driven execution—equipping the team with practical tools, investor-grade narratives, and the operating habits needed to scale responsibly and sustain growth."}],"context":{"currentFile":{"path":"index.html","fsPath":"/Users/anupeesay/PycharmProjects/3NWebsite2/index.html","sources":["opened_tab"],"content":"<!DOCTYPE html>

 color: #9ca3af;

 font-size: 0.98rem;

 .grid-3 {
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0,1fr));
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 @media (max-width: 900px) {
 .hero-inner { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0,1fr)); }
 }
 @media (max-width: 640px) {
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 }

 .card {
 border-radius: 1rem;
 border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 background: #ffffff;
 padding: 1.1rem 1.1rem 1.25rem;
 box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(15,23,42,0.04);
 }
 .card-title {
 font-size: 1rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 margin-bottom: 0.4rem;
 }
 .card-body { font-size: 0.9rem; color: #4b5563; }

 .testimonial-ratings { font-size: 0.8rem; color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.4; }

 .btn {
 display: inline-flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: center;
 gap: 0.4rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.55rem 1.2rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;

 text-decoration: none;
 border: 1px solid transparent;
 cursor: pointer;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease, border-color 0.15s ease, transform 0.08s ease;
 }
 .btn-primary { background: #38bdf8; color: #020617; border-color: #0ea5e9; }

 .btn-ghost { background: transparent; color: #111827; border-color: #d1d5db; }
 .btn-ghost:hover { background: #e5e7eb; }

 .site-footer {
 border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 2rem;

 color: #6b7280;
 background: #f9fafb;

 .footer-inner {

 margin: 0 auto;
 display: flex;

 }

Mann — Advisory Board Member"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"David Mann is an entrepreneurship and growth strategy leader with 25+ years across venture capital, private equity, company-building, and executive education. He serves as Chairman of the Entrepreneurial Operating System (EOS) and is Managing Partner & Co-Founder of both The Firefly Group and Spring Mill Venture Partners. David has sourced, structured, and guided dozens of investments across technology, life sciences, and services, serving on boards and coaching CEOs to translate strategy into repeatable revenue, operating discipline, and measurable results."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A former U.S. Navy Supply Corps Officer and White House Liaison to the Secretary of the Navy, David brings operational rigor and mission focus to every engagement. For nearly two decades, he taught in Indiana University’s Kelley School of Business MBA program, where he designed and led the Venture Capital & Entrepreneurial Finance course, and he has guest-lectured at Purdue and Notre Dame. He holds an MBA from Harvard Business School (with additional coursework at the Kennedy School) and a B.S. from the U.S. Naval Academy, where he served as Company Commander and on the Brigade Honor Committee."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"At 3N Consulting, David advises the leadership team on sales strategy, capital readiness, and EOS-driven execution—equipping the team with practical tools, investor-grade narratives, and the operating habits needed to scale responsibly and sustain growth."}]}]}},{"id":"e8486d5d-1304-487c-a3fd-7426b92fc8c8","role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Perfect! + <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Biography</h2>
+ </div>
+ <div class="bio-section">
+ <p>
+ Nick Sickler serves as 3N Consulting's Interim Chief Financial Officer and Advisory Board Member, bringing more than two decades of accounting and financial leadership experience. Nick currently serves as Chief Financial Officer at Great Point Capital, where he oversees finance operations and leads the firm's accounting department. A Certified Public Accountant, Nick's career spans over 24 years in public accounting, working with privately held businesses and high-net-worth individuals to help them achieve their financial goals through sound audit, tax, and trust planning practices.
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ Before joining Great Point Capital, Nick spent nearly 25 years at John R. Waters & Company, a respected Chicago-based public accounting firm, where he advanced to Attestation Manager and earned a reputation for delivering high-quality client service. Deeply engaged in professional and civic life, he has held leadership roles with the Purdue Club of Chicago, the Purdue Alumni Association, and the Risk Management Association's Chicago Chapter, where he served as both President and Treasurer.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- EDUCATION & BACKGROUND SECTION -->

+ </div>
+ <div class="bio-section">
+ <p>
+ Nick holds a <strong>Bachelor of Science in Accounting from Purdue University</strong> and is an active member of both the <strong>American Institute of CPAs (AICPA)</strong> and the <strong>Illinois CPA Society</strong>. His hands-on leadership, financial acumen, and long-standing dedication to integrity and excellence strengthen 3N Consulting's fiscal strategy and governance as the firm continues its growth across Maryland and beyond.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>

+ <h1 class="hero-title">Marc Hochman</h1>
+ <div class="hero-subtitle">Advisory Board Chair</div>
+ <p class="hero-body">
+ Partner Emeritus at A.T. Kearney | 24+ Years of Leadership | Digital Analytics & Operations Expert
+ </p>

+
+ <!-- BIOGRAPHY SECTION -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Biography</h2>
+ </div>
+ <div class="bio-section">
+ <p>
+ Marc Hochman was appointed Partner Emeritus with A.T. Kearney after spending more than 24 years with the firm in a variety of leadership roles. In addition to client work across a diverse portfolio of industries (Automotive, Consumer Products and Retail, Energy & Process Industries, Financial Institutions, and Healthcare), Marc most recently served as Chief Operating Officer of Kearney Digital & Analytics. Prior to taking on that role, he co-founded and co-led Kearney Analytics and was President of Cervello, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Kearney that serves as a trusted advisor to blue-chip clients, earning a stellar reputation as a market leader in agile analytics, CRM, enterprise performance management, data management, and business intelligence.
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ Before being named President of Cervello, Marc served as Chief Operating Officer for A.T. Kearney Solutions, was a member of the Americas Leadership Team, and led the firm's global Staffing & Operations function. Additionally, Marc chaired the firm's US Investment Committees for over a decade. Prior joining A.T. Kearney, Marc spent 12 years working for Air Products & Chemicals and American Cyanamid where he held positions in cost engineering, applied research & development, energy management, finance, and procurement.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- EDUCATION & BACKGROUND SECTION -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Education & Professional Leadership</h2>
+ </div>
+ <div class="bio-section">
+ <p>
+ Marc holds a <strong>B.S. in Chemical Engineering and M.S. in Management (Strategy and Finance), both from Purdue University</strong>. He served as President of the Krannert School Board of Directors from 2013-2019, was a member of the Dean's Advisory Council from 2020-2025, and is a member of Purdue's President's Council. His extensive background in operations, analytics, and strategic leadership brings invaluable perspective to 3N Consulting's governance and strategic direction.
+ </p>
+ </div>

+ <!-- BIOGRAPHY SECTION -->

+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Biography</h2>
+ </div>
+ <div class="bio-section">
+ <p>
+ David Mann is an entrepreneurship and growth strategy leader with 25+ years across venture capital, private equity, company-building, and executive education. He serves as Chairman of the Entrepreneurial Operating System (EOS) and is Managing Partner & Co-Founder of both The Firefly Group and Spring Mill Venture Partners. David has sourced, structured, and guided dozens of investments across technology, life sciences, and services, serving on boards and coaching CEOs to translate strategy into repeatable revenue, operating discipline, and measurable results.
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ A former U.S. Navy Supply Corps Officer and White House Liaison to the Secretary of the Navy, David brings operational rigor and mission focus to every engagement. For nearly two decades, he taught in Indiana University's Kelley School of Business MBA program, where he designed and led the Venture Capital & Entrepreneurial Finance course, and he has guest-lectured at Purdue and Notre Dame.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- EDUCATION & BACKGROUND SECTION -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Education & Background</h2>
+ </div>
+ <div class="bio-section">
+ <p>
+ David holds an <strong>MBA from Harvard Business School (with additional coursework at the Kennedy School) and a B.S. from the U.S. Naval Academy</strong>, where he served as Company Commander and on the Brigade Honor Committee. At 3N Consulting, David advises the leadership team on sales strategy, capital readiness, and EOS-driven execution—equipping the team with practical tools, investor-grade narratives, and the operating habits needed to scale responsibly and sustain growth.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- CTA SECTION -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="cta-section">
+ <h3 style="font-size: 1.3rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;">Ready to Work with 3N Consulting?</h3>
+ <p style="margin-bottom: 1.5rem; color: #4b5563;">Let's discuss how we can help your organization achieve transformational results.</p>
+ <a href="contact.html" class="btn btn-primary">Contact Us →</a>
+ </div>

Kearney %7C 24+ Years of Leadership %7C Digital Analytics & Operations Expert%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- BIOGRAPHY SECTION --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section section-alt%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-header%22%3E%0A %3Ch2 class=%22section-title%22%3EBiography%3C/h2%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22bio-section%22%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A Marc Hochman was appointed Partner Emeritus with A.T. Kearney after spending more than 24 years with the firm in a variety of leadership roles. In addition to client work across a diverse portfolio of industries (Automotive, Consumer Products and Retail, Energy & Process Industries, Financial Institutions, and Healthcare), Marc most recently served as Chief Operating Officer of Kearney Digital & Analytics. Prior to taking on that role, he co-founded and co-led Kearney Analytics and was President of Cervello, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Kearney that serves as a trusted advisor to blue-chip clients, earning a stellar reputation as a market leader in agile analytics, CRM, enterprise performance management, data management, and business intelligence.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A Before being named President of Cervello, Marc served as Chief Operating Officer for A.T. Kearney Solutions, was a member of the Americas Leadership Team, and led the firm's global Staffing & Operations function. Additionally, Marc chaired the firm's US Investment Committees for over a decade. Prior joining A.T. Kearney, Marc spent 12 years working for Air Products & Chemicals and American Cyanamid where he held positions in cost engineering, applied research & development, energy management, finance, and procurement.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- EDUCATION & BACKGROUND SECTION --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-header%22%3E%0A %3Ch2 class=%22section-title%22%3EEducation & Professional Leadership%3C/h2%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22bio-section%22%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A Marc holds a %3Cstrong%3EB.S. in Chemical Engineering and M.S. in Management (Strategy and Finance), both from Purdue University%3C/strong%3E. He served as President of the Krannert School Board of Directors from 2013-2019, was a member of the Dean's Advisory Council from 2020-2025, and is a member of Purdue's President's Council. His extensive background in operations, analytics, and strategic leadership brings invaluable perspective to 3N Consulting's governance and strategic direction.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- CTA SECTION --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22cta-section%22%3E%0A %3Ch3 style=%22font-size: 1.3rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;%22%3EReady to Work with 3N Consulting?%3C/h3%3E%0A %3Cp style=%22margin-bottom: 1.5rem; color: #4b5563;%22%3ELet's discuss how we can help your organization achieve transformational results.%3C/p%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22contact.html%22 class=%22btn btn-primary%22%3EContact Us %E2%86%92%3C/a%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A %3C/main%3E%0A%0A %3Cfooter class=%22site-footer%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22footer-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv style=%22flex: 1; min-width: 200px;%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv style=%22font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;%22%3E3N Consulting%3C/div%3E%0A %3Cp style=%22color: #6b7280;%22%3EResults. Nick currently serves as Chief Financial Officer at Great Point Capital, where he oversees finance operations and leads the firm's accounting department. A Certified Public Accountant, Nick's career spans over 24 years in public accounting, working with privately held businesses and high-net-worth individuals to help them achieve their financial goals through sound audit, tax, and trust planning practices.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A Before joining Great Point Capital, Nick spent nearly 25 years at John R. Waters & Company, a respected Chicago-based public accounting firm, where he advanced to Attestation Manager and earned a reputation for delivering high-quality client service. Deeply engaged in professional and civic life, he has held leadership roles with the Purdue Club of Chicago, the Purdue Alumni Association, and the Risk Management Association's Chicago Chapter, where he served as both President and Treasurer.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- EDUCATION & BACKGROUND SECTION --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-header%22%3E%0A %3Ch2 class=%22section-title%22%3EEducation & Professional Credentials%3C/h2%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22bio-section%22%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A Nick holds a %3Cstrong%3EBachelor of Science in Accounting from Purdue University%3C/strong%3E and is an active member of both the %3Cstrong%3EAmerican Institute of CPAs (AICPA)%3C/strong%3E and the %3Cstrong%3EIllinois CPA Society%3C/strong%3E. His hands-on leadership, financial acumen, and long-standing dedication to integrity and excellence strengthen 3N Consulting's fiscal strategy and governance as the firm continues its growth across Maryland and beyond.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- CTA SECTION --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22cta-section%22%3E%0A %3Ch3 style=%22font-size: 1.3rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;%22%3EReady to Work with 3N Consulting?%3C/h3%3E%0A %3Cp style=%22margin-bottom: 1.5rem; color: #4b5563;%22%3ELet's discuss how we can help your organization achieve transformational results.%3C/p%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22contact.html%22 class=%22btn btn-primary%22%3EContact Us %E2%86%92%3C/a%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A %3C/main%3E%0A%0A %3Cfooter class=%22site-footer%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22footer-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv style=%22flex: 1; min-width: 200px;%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv style=%22font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;%22%3E3N Consulting%3C/div%3E%0A %3Cp style=%22color: #6b7280;%22%3EResults. Mann%3C/h1%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22hero-subtitle%22%3EAdvisory Board Member%3C/div%3E%0A %3Cp class=%22hero-body%22%3E%0A EOS Chairman %7C Venture Capital & Private Equity Leader %7C Entrepreneurial Strategy Expert %7C Former U.S. Navy Officer%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- BIOGRAPHY SECTION --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section section-alt%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-header%22%3E%0A %3Ch2 class=%22section-title%22%3EBiography%3C/h2%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22bio-section%22%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A David Mann is an entrepreneurship and growth strategy leader with 25+ years across venture capital, private equity, company-building, and executive education. He serves as Chairman of the Entrepreneurial Operating System (EOS) and is Managing Partner & Co-Founder of both The Firefly Group and Spring Mill Venture Partners. David has sourced, structured, and guided dozens of investments across technology, life sciences, and services, serving on boards and coaching CEOs to translate strategy into repeatable revenue, operating discipline, and measurable results.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A A former U.S. Navy Supply Corps Officer and White House Liaison to the Secretary of the Navy, David brings operational rigor and mission focus to every engagement. For nearly two decades, he taught in Indiana University's Kelley School of Business MBA program, where he designed and led the Venture Capital & Entrepreneurial Finance course, and he has guest-lectured at Purdue and Notre Dame.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- EDUCATION & BACKGROUND SECTION --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-header%22%3E%0A %3Ch2 class=%22section-title%22%3EEducation & Background%3C/h2%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22bio-section%22%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A David holds an %3Cstrong%3EMBA from Harvard Business School (with additional coursework at the Kennedy School) and a B.S. from the U.S. Naval Academy%3C/strong%3E, where he served as Company Commander and on the Brigade Honor Committee. At 3N Consulting, David advises the leadership team on sales strategy, capital readiness, and EOS-driven execution%E2%80%94equipping the team with practical tools, investor-grade narratives, and the operating habits needed to scale responsibly and sustain growth.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- CTA SECTION --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22cta-section%22%3E%0A %3Ch3 style=%22font-size: 1.3rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;%22%3EReady to Work with 3N Consulting?%3C/h3%3E%0A %3Cp style=%22margin-bottom: 1.5rem; color: #4b5563;%22%3ELet's discuss how we can help your organization achieve transformational results.%3C/p%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22contact.html%22 class=%22btn btn-primary%22%3EContact Us %E2%86%92%3C/a%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A %3C/main%3E%0A%0A %3Cfooter class=%22site-footer%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22footer-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv style=%22flex: 1; min-width: 200px;%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv style=%22font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;%22%3E3N Consulting%3C/div%3E%0A %3Cp style=%22color: #6b7280;%22%3EResults. <html lang="en">
<head>
 <meta charset="UTF-8">
 <title>3N Consulting | Results. Delivered.</title>

 <style>
 /* Inline CSS so this preview actually renders with layout */
 *, *::before, *::after { box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
 html, body {
 font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
 color: #111827;
 background-color: #f9fafb;
 line-height: 1.6;
 }
 img, video { max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; }
 .site-wrapper { min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; }
 .main { flex: 1; }

 .site-header {
 background: #020617;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 border-bottom: 1px solid #1f2937;
 position: sticky;
 top: 0;
 z-index: 10;
 }
 .nav-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
 display: flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: space-between;
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 .brand-title {
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: 0.08em;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 font-size: 0.9rem;
 }
 .brand-tagline { font-size: 0.75rem; color: #9ca3af; }
 .brand-logo { height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px; }
 .nav-links { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; }
 .nav-links a {
 color: #e5e7eb;
 text-decoration: none;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 padding: 0.35rem 0.7rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
 }
 .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }
 .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
 .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }

 @media (max-width: 768px) {
 .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
 .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
 .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
 .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
 }

 .hero {
 padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .hero-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 3fr) minmax(0, 2fr);
 gap: 3rem;
 align-items: center;
 }
 .hero-eyebrow {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.13em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
 }
 .hero-title {
 font-size: clamp(2.1rem, 3vw, 2.7rem);
 font-weight: 750;
 letter-spacing: -0.03em;
 margin-bottom: 1rem;
 }
 .hero-highlight { color: #38bdf8; }
 .hero-body {
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 color: #d1d5db;
 max-width: 32rem;
 margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
 }
 .hero-meta {
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1.25rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 2rem;
 }
 .chip {
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.7);
 }
 .hero-media {
 border-radius: 1.2rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, rgba(56,189,248,0.12), transparent 50%),
 radial-gradient(circle at bottom right, rgba(52,211,153,0.12), transparent 55%);
 padding: 1rem;
 display: flex;
 flex-direction: column;
 gap: 0.75rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .badge-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.5rem; align-items: center; }
 .badge {
 border-radius: 999px;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.7rem;
 font-size: 0.7rem;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.12em;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.8);
 white-space: nowrap;
 }
 .badge-outline { background: transparent; }
 .logo-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; align-items: center; }
 .logo-row img { max-height: 40px; width: auto; }
 .caps-label {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.16em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 }

 .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }
 .section-alt { background: #f3f4f6; }
 .section-inner { max-width: 1120px; margin: 0 auto; }
 .section-header { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; }
 .section-kicker {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.15em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 color: #6b7280;
 margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
 }
 .section-title {
 font-size: 1.8rem;
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: -0.02em;
 margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
 }
 .section-subtitle {
 color: #4b5563;
 max-width: 40rem;
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 }

 .grid-3 {
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0,1fr));
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 @media (max-width: 900px) {
 .hero-inner { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0,1fr)); }
 }
 @media (max-width: 640px) {
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 }

 .card {
 border-radius: 1rem;
 border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 background: #ffffff;
 padding: 1.1rem 1.1rem 1.25rem;
 box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(15,23,42,0.04);
 }
 .card-title {
 font-size: 1rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 margin-bottom: 0.4rem;
 }
 .card-body { font-size: 0.9rem; color: #4b5563; }

 .testimonial-quote { font-style: italic; margin-bottom: 0.4rem; }
 .testimonial-client { font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.2rem; }
 .testimonial-ratings { font-size: 0.8rem; color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.4; }

 .btn {
 display: inline-flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: center;
 gap: 0.4rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.55rem 1.2rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 text-decoration: none;
 border: 1px solid transparent;
 cursor: pointer;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease, border-color 0.15s ease, transform 0.08s ease;
 }
 .btn-primary { background: #38bdf8; color: #020617; border-color: #0ea5e9; }
 .btn-primary:hover { background: #0ea5e9; transform: translateY(-1px); }
 .btn-ghost { background: transparent; color: #111827; border-color: #d1d5db; }
 .btn-ghost:hover { background: #e5e7eb; }

 .site-footer {
 border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 2rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #6b7280;
 background: #f9fafb;
 }
 .footer-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1rem;
 justify-content: space-between;
 }
 .footer-links {
 display: flex;
 gap: 0.9rem;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 }
 .footer-links a {
 color: #6b7280;
 text-decoration: none;
 }
 .footer-links a:hover { text-decoration: underline; }
 .footer-image { max-width: 150px; height: auto; }
 </style>
</head>

 <section class="hero">

 <h1 class="hero-title">
 Results. <span class="hero-highlight">Delivered.</span>

 <p class="hero-body">
 3N Consulting is a Maryland-based management consulting firm that
 builds long-term partnerships, takes ownership of outcomes, and
 practices frugality so savings flow to clients.
 </p>
 <div class="hero-meta">

 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">NMSDC</div>

 <!-- WHY 3N -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">

 <h2 class="section-title">
 Because we maintain integrity. Because we value clients. And because we deliver results.
 </h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our model is built for outcome-based partnerships, true ownership of commitments,
 and a cost structure that puts client value first.
 </p>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Vested in client success</h3>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Ownership</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Ownership:</strong> We don't "staff"—we own results and keep our commitments.
 </p>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Cost structure</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Cost Structure:</strong> Frugal by design—invest in talent, minimize overhead, pass savings on.
 </p>

Despite strong institutional values, the college lacked a unified structure to manage over $30 million in annual purchasing efficiently and compliantly. Stakeholder feedback revealed: 35% rated procurement efficiency as below average or very inefficient. 82% believed policies and procedures required revision. 45% of purchases bypassed purchase orders, heightening compliance risk. Nearly half of the stakeholders surveyed reported little or no procurement training. The college sought a consulting partner capable of evaluating readiness for change and designing a realistic transformation roadmap grounded in policy compliance and operational data.”"},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"“3N Approach and Solution — Guided by O-RAM"},{"type":"text","text":"3N deployed its Organizational Readiness Assessment Methodology (O-RAM) to evaluate institutional capacity, identify change barriers, and structure a transformation that could succeed within the existing culture and resources."},{"type":"text","text":"O-RAM Readiness Dimensions Applied:"},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"Dimension"},{"type":"text","text":"Focus"},{"type":"text","text":"Key Findings"},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"Leadership Alignment"},{"type":"text","text":"Executive buy-in and strategic goals"},{"type":"text","text":"Clear mission alignment with student success but limited cross-departmental governance."},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"Governance & Controls"},{"type":"text","text":"Policy maturity and compliance"},{"type":"text","text":"39 policy areas assessed; 25 lacked definition, exposing audit risks."},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"People & Capability"},{"type":"text","text":"Organizational structure and training"},{"type":"text","text":"Roles overlapped; 41% had no formal procurement training."},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"Technology & Data"},{"type":"text","text":"System automation and analytics"},{"type":"text","text":"ERP underutilized; manual workarounds caused delays and inconsistency."},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"Process & Performance"},{"type":"text","text":"Efficiency, accountability, and measurement"},{"type":"text","text":"Fragmented workflows and absence of standard KPIs."},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"3N analyzed annual average spend in various dimensions:"},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"Transformation Framework and Execution"},{"type":"text","text":"1. Diagnostic Analysis"},{"type":"text","text":"Reviewed 33.5 months of spend and procurement transactions."},{"type":"text","text":"Conducted 30 stakeholder interviews and 34 surveys."},{"type":"text","text":"Identified over $1.8M in split-purchase activity and $609K in mis-grouped spend."},{"type":"text","text":"2. Organizational Readiness Mapping Each department was evaluated across the five O-RAM pillars to determine maturity, adoption risk, and support requirements."},{"type":"text","text":"3. Targeted Recommendations 3N created a roadmap that included:"},{"type":"text","text":"Centralized procurement structure phased in over 24 months."},{"type":"text","text":"Implementation of an eProcurement system (Jaggaer or PeopleSoft SRM)."},{"type":"text","text":"132 automated controls within ERP workflows."},{"type":"text","text":"A complete rewrite of policies for COMAR compliance."},{"type":"text","text":"4. Change Enablement and Capability Building 3N embedded training, communication, and performance metrics to ensure readiness and sustainability."},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"Results Delivered"},{"type":"text","text":"Through 3N Consulting’s Organizational Readiness Assessment Methodology (O-RAM), the college achieved a profound shift from fragmented processes to a fully aligned, data-driven procurement function. The initiative advanced procurement maturity from Level 1 (Ad Hoc) to Level 3 (Standardized) with a clear path toward Level 5 (Center of Excellence). In the process, 3N identified $1.2 – $3.7 million in annual savings through vendor consolidation, automation, and policy modernization, while establishing 39 COMAR-aligned policies and a comprehensive eProcurement roadmap for end-to-end digital integration."},{"type":"text","text":"These structural and technological changes directly improved core financial and operational metrics, including days cash on hand, operating margin, net tuition per FTE, purchase-order cycle time, and compliance with state and college regulations. Staff and stakeholder engagement rose sharply as transparency, training, and accountability became embedded in daily operations."},{"type":"text","text":"Crucially, the realized savings are being reinvested to expand student opportunity—lowering tuition costs and growing the work-study program by over 40 percent, providing more paid, hands-on learning experiences. Building on this momentum, 3N partnered with the college to scale its Procurement Center of Excellence into a fee-based shared-services model for peer institutions. The initiative is projected to generate six-figure annual revenue and achieve self-funding within 12 months, while offering students ongoing real-world employment pathways."},{"type":"text","text":"For 3N Consulting, this engagement has evolved into a multi-year strategic partnership and a replicable transformation model for other institutions—demonstrating measurable, sustainable impact for both the client and the firm."},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------"},{"type":"text","text":"3N Consulting’s Organizational Readiness Assessment Methodology (O-RAM) ensures every engagement translates vision into achievable transformation. Through rigorous analysis, stakeholder partnership, and disciplined execution, 3N consistently delivers exceptional, sustainable results — on time and with measurable impact.”"}],"context":{"attachedFiles":[{"path":"index.html","fsPath":"/Users/anupeesay/PycharmProjects/3NWebsite2/index.html","sources":["opened_tab"],"content":"<!DOCTYPE html>

 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">NMSDC</div>

 Proud to support Maryland's public agencies, colleges, and communities.

 <!-- WHY 3N -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Why 3N Consulting?</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">
 Because we maintain integrity. Because we value clients. And because we deliver results.
 </h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our model is built for outcome-based partnerships, true ownership of commitments,
 and a cost structure that puts client value first.

 <div class="grid-3">
