 <!-- SOLUTIONS -->
 <section class="section">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Productized solution offerings</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">Solutions we can rapidly deploy</h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Solutions we can rapidly deploy through assets developed over years of
 knowledge and experience—in procurement, manufacturing, and technology.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title"><a href="manufacturing.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">Manufacturing</a></h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 Planning, operations, and process redesign for manufacturers seeking to
 scale while maintaining service and quality.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title"><a href="cio-services.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">CIO Services</a></h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 Portfolio rationalization, IT strategy, and value-focused technology
 investment for public sector and mid-market organizations.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title"><a href="procurement.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">Procurement</a></h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 A structured procurement solution to unlock savings, improve compliance,
 and turn purchasing into a strategic advantage.
 </p>
 </article>
 </div>

<div class="site-wrapper">
 <header class="site-header">
 <div class="nav-inner">
 <div class="brand">
 <img src="images/3nlogo.png" alt="3N Consulting Logo" style="height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px;">

 <button class="nav-toggle" aria-label="Toggle navigation">☰</button>
 <nav class="nav-links">

 <a href="contact.html">Contact Us</a>
 <a href="thought-leadership.html">Meet Our Team</a>
 <a href="toolkit.html">Our Toolkit</a>
 <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
 </nav>
 </div>
 </header>

 <main class="main">
 <!-- HERO -->
 <section class="hero">
 <div class="hero-inner">
 <div>
 <div class="hero-eyebrow">Strategic Assessment Methodology</div>
 <h1 class="hero-title">Organizational Readiness & Alignment Model (O-RAM)</h1>
 <p class="hero-body">
 Transforming Insight into Actionable, Measurable Change
 </p>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- OVERVIEW SECTION -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <h2 class="section-title">What is O-RAM?</h2>
 </div>
 <div class="content-block">
 <p>
 At 3N Consulting, we believe that true transformation doesn't begin with technology or structure — it begins with clarity. The Organizational Readiness & Alignment Model (O-RAM) is our proprietary assessment framework designed to help organizations understand how well their people, processes, and systems are aligned to their mission, and to identify the levers that unlock measurable performance gains.
 </p>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- THE SIX DIMENSIONS SECTION -->
 <section class="section">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <h2 class="section-title">The Six Integrated Dimensions</h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 O-RAM assesses organizational health across six key areas, each evaluated against your strategic objectives to determine readiness for change and alignment with long-term goals.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="dimensions-grid">
 <div class="dimension-box">
 <h4>Leadership</h4>
 <p>Vision clarity, decision-making authority, and strategic alignment at all levels.</p>
 </div>
 <div class="dimension-box">
 <h4>Structure</h4>
 <p>Organizational design, reporting relationships, and accountability frameworks.</p>
 </div>
 <div class="dimension-box">
 <h4>Metrics & Rewards</h4>
 <p>Performance indicators, compensation alignment, and incentive structures.</p>
 </div>
 <div class="dimension-box">
 <h4>Governance & Processes</h4>
 <p>Decision frameworks, workflows, and operational efficiency.</p>
 </div>
 <div class="dimension-box">
 <h4>Technology/Systems</h4>
 <p>System capabilities, integration, and technical readiness for initiatives.</p>
 </div>
 <div class="dimension-box">
 <h4>Culture & Communication</h4>
 <p>Organizational values, engagement levels, and information flow.</p>
 </div>
 </div>

 <div class="content-block">
 <p>
 The result is a 360-degree diagnostic that translates qualitative insights into quantitative indicators of performance maturity.
 </p>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- INSIGHTS SECTION -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <h2 class="section-title">What O-RAM Reveals</h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 By applying O-RAM, organizations gain a clear, data-driven understanding of where strengths exist and where misalignments may be holding back results.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="content-block">
 <p>
 Leadership teams receive an actionable roadmap that prioritizes initiatives based on impact, risk, and readiness — enabling them to focus resources where they will drive the greatest value.
 </p>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- VALUE DELIVERY SECTION -->
 <section class="section">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <h2 class="section-title">Three Key Value Drivers</h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 O-RAM delivers measurable value across your organization:
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="value-box">
 <h4>Strategic Alignment</h4>
 <p>Ensures leadership vision is translated into operational behavior and measurable outcomes.</p>
 </div>

 <div class="value-box">
 <h4>Organizational Efficiency</h4>
 <p>Identifies duplications, gaps, and process inefficiencies, creating a foundation for streamlined operations and improved service delivery.</p>
 </div>

 <div class="value-box">
 <h4>Change Readiness</h4>
 <p>Equips leaders with an objective, evidence-based view of how prepared the workforce, systems, and culture are for transformation.</p>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- IMPACT SECTION -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <h2 class="section-title">Proven Track Record Across Sectors</h2>
 </div>

 <div class="content-block">
 <p>
 Deployed across sectors — from higher education to public agencies and private enterprises — O-RAM has become a cornerstone of 3N Consulting's performance improvement work. It empowers decision-makers with clarity, structure, and confidence to execute transformation that endures.
 </p>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- CTA SECTION -->
 <section class="section">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="cta-section">
 <h3 style="font-size: 1.3rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;">Ready to Assess Your Organization?</h3>
 <p style="margin-bottom: 1.5rem; color: #4b5563;">Let's discuss how O-RAM can provide the clarity and insight your organization needs to drive transformation.</p>
 <a href="contact.html" class="btn btn-primary">Schedule Your O-RAM Assessment →</a>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>
 </main>

 <footer class="site-footer">
 <div class="footer-inner">
 <div style="flex: 1; min-width: 200px;">
 <div style="font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">3N Consulting</div>
 <p style="color: #6b7280;">Results. Delivered.</p>
 </div>
 <div class="footer-links">
 <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/3n-consulting-group/posts/?feedView=all" target="_blank"> LinkedIn</a>

 <a href="about.html">About</a>
 <a href="services.html">Services</a>
 <a href="contact.html">Contact</a>
 <a href="thought-leadership.html">Meet Our Team</a>
 <a href="toolkit.html">Our Toolkit</a>
 <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
 </div>
 </div>
 <div style="text-align: center; margin-top: 1.5rem; padding-top: 1.5rem; border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb; color: #9ca3af;">
 <p>© 2024 3N Consulting. All rights reserved.</p>
 </div>
 </footer>
</div>

Despite strong institutional values, the college lacked a unified structure to manage over $30 million in annual purchasing efficiently and compliantly. Stakeholder feedback revealed: 35% rated procurement efficiency as below average or very inefficient. 82% believed policies and procedures required revision. 45% of purchases bypassed purchase orders, heightening compliance risk. Nearly half of the stakeholders surveyed reported little or no procurement training. The college sought a consulting partner capable of evaluating readiness for change and designing a realistic transformation roadmap grounded in policy compliance and operational data.”"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"“3N Approach and Solution — Guided by O-RAM"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3N deployed its Organizational Readiness Assessment Methodology (O-RAM) to evaluate institutional capacity, identify change barriers, and structure a transformation that could succeed within the existing culture and resources."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"O-RAM Readiness Dimensions Applied:"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Dimension"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Focus"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Key Findings"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Leadership Alignment"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Executive buy-in and strategic goals"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Clear mission alignment with student success but limited cross-departmental governance."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Governance & Controls"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Policy maturity and compliance"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"39 policy areas assessed; 25 lacked definition, exposing audit risks."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"People & Capability"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Organizational structure and training"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Roles overlapped; 41% had no formal procurement training."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Technology & Data"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"System automation and analytics"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"ERP underutilized; manual workarounds caused delays and inconsistency."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Process & Performance"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Efficiency, accountability, and measurement"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Fragmented workflows and absence of standard KPIs."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3N analyzed annual average spend in various dimensions:"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Transformation Framework and Execution"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1. Diagnostic Analysis"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Reviewed 33.5 months of spend and procurement transactions."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Conducted 30 stakeholder interviews and 34 surveys."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Identified over $1.8M in split-purchase activity and $609K in mis-grouped spend."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2. Organizational Readiness Mapping Each department was evaluated across the five O-RAM pillars to determine maturity, adoption risk, and support requirements."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3. Targeted Recommendations 3N created a roadmap that included:"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Centralized procurement structure phased in over 24 months."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Implementation of an eProcurement system (Jaggaer or PeopleSoft SRM)."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"132 automated controls within ERP workflows."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A complete rewrite of policies for COMAR compliance."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"4. Change Enablement and Capability Building 3N embedded training, communication, and performance metrics to ensure readiness and sustainability."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Results Delivered"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Through 3N Consulting’s Organizational Readiness Assessment Methodology (O-RAM), the college achieved a profound shift from fragmented processes to a fully aligned, data-driven procurement function. The initiative advanced procurement maturity from Level 1 (Ad Hoc) to Level 3 (Standardized) with a clear path toward Level 5 (Center of Excellence). In the process, 3N identified $1.2 – $3.7 million in annual savings through vendor consolidation, automation, and policy modernization, while establishing 39 COMAR-aligned policies and a comprehensive eProcurement roadmap for end-to-end digital integration."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"These structural and technological changes directly improved core financial and operational metrics, including days cash on hand, operating margin, net tuition per FTE, purchase-order cycle time, and compliance with state and college regulations. Staff and stakeholder engagement rose sharply as transparency, training, and accountability became embedded in daily operations."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Crucially, the realized savings are being reinvested to expand student opportunity—lowering tuition costs and growing the work-study program by over 40 percent, providing more paid, hands-on learning experiences. Building on this momentum, 3N partnered with the college to scale its Procurement Center of Excellence into a fee-based shared-services model for peer institutions. The initiative is projected to generate six-figure annual revenue and achieve self-funding within 12 months, while offering students ongoing real-world employment pathways."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"For 3N Consulting, this engagement has evolved into a multi-year strategic partnership and a replicable transformation model for other institutions—demonstrating measurable, sustainable impact for both the client and the firm."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3N Consulting’s Organizational Readiness Assessment Methodology (O-RAM) ensures every engagement translates vision into achievable transformation. Through rigorous analysis, stakeholder partnership, and disciplined execution, 3N consistently delivers exceptional, sustainable results — on time and with measurable impact.”"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]}]}}],"isAgent":true,"isCustomAgent":false,"isUnitTestsAgent":false,"isE2EAgent":false,"autoApply":false},"7d20dce9-5c5c-4e6c-b850-e93552125dcf":{"id":"7d20dce9-5c5c-4e6c-b850-e93552125dcf","createdAt":1764356763385,"updatedAt":1764358155702,"title":"Add Disclaimers to Navigation Menu","messages":[{"id":"0d3e39bb-6395-44c7-a4cb-2bc442967729","role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The "Disclaimers" does not show up on the menu at the top when I am in pages such as the "About Us", "Service Lines", "Careers", "Contact Us", or the "Thought Leadership" pages.  position: sticky;
 top: 0;
 z-index: 10;
 }
 .nav-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
 display: flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: space-between;
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 .brand-title {
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: 0.08em;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 font-size: 0.9rem;
 }
 .brand-tagline { font-size: 0.75rem; color: #9ca3af; }
 .brand-logo { height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px; }
 .nav-links { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; }
 .nav-links a {
 color: #e5e7eb;
 text-decoration: none;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 padding: 0.35rem 0.7rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
 }
 .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }
 .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
 .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }

 @media (max-width: 768px) {
 .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
 .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
 .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
 .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
 }

 .hero {
 padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .hero-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 3fr) minmax(0, 2fr);
 gap: 3rem;
 align-items: center;
 }
 .hero-eyebrow {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.13em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
 }
 .hero-title {
 font-size: clamp(2.1rem, 3vw, 2.7rem);
 font-weight: 750;
 letter-spacing: -0.03em;
 margin-bottom: 1rem;
 }
 .hero-highlight { color: #38bdf8; }
 .hero-body {
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 color: #d1d5db;
 max-width: 32rem;
 margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
 }
 .hero-meta {
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1.25rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 2rem;
 }
 .chip {
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.7);
 }
 .hero-media {
 border-radius: 1.2rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, rgba(56,189,248,0.12), transparent 50%),
 radial-gradient(circle at bottom right, rgba(52,211,153,0.12), transparent 55%);
 padding: 1rem;
 display: flex;
 flex-direction: column;
 gap: 0.75rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .badge-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.5rem; align-items: center; }
 .badge {
 border-radius: 999px;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.7rem;
 font-size: 0.7rem;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.12em;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.8);
 white-space: nowrap;
 }
 .badge-outline { background: transparent; }
 .logo-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; align-items: center; }
 .logo-row img { max-height: 40px; width: auto; }
 .caps-label {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.16em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 }

 .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }
 .section-alt { background: #f3f4f6; }
 .section-inner { max-width: 1120px; margin: 0 auto; }
 .section-header { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; }
 .section-kicker {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.15em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 color: #6b7280;
 margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
 }
 .section-title {

 font-weight: 700;

 margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
 }
 .section-subtitle {
 color: #4b5563;
 max-width: 40rem;
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 }

 .grid-3 {
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0,1fr));
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 @media (max-width: 900px) {
 .hero-inner { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0,1fr)); }
 }
 @media (max-width: 640px) {
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 }

 .card {
 border-radius: 1rem;
 border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 background: #ffffff;
 padding: 1.1rem 1.1rem 1.25rem;
 box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(15,23,42,0.04);
 }
 .card-title {
 font-size: 1rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 margin-bottom: 0.4rem;
 }
 .card-body { font-size: 0.9rem; color: #4b5563; }

 .testimonial-quote { font-style: italic; margin-bottom: 0.4rem; }
 .testimonial-client { font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.2rem; }
 .testimonial-ratings { font-size: 0.8rem; color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.4; }

 .btn {
 display: inline-flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: center;
 gap: 0.4rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.55rem 1.2rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 text-decoration: none;
 border: 1px solid transparent;
 cursor: pointer;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease, border-color 0.15s ease, transform 0.08s ease;
 }
 .btn-primary { background: #38bdf8; color: #020617; border-color: #0ea5e9; }
 .btn-primary:hover { background: #0ea5e9; transform: translateY(-1px); }
 .btn-ghost { background: transparent; color: #111827; border-color: #d1d5db; }
 .btn-ghost:hover { background: #e5e7eb; }

 .site-footer {
 border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 2rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #6b7280;
 background: #f9fafb;
 }
 .footer-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1rem;
 justify-content: space-between;
 }
 .footer-links {
 display: flex;
 gap: 0.9rem;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 }

 color: #6b7280;
 text-decoration: none;
 }

 .footer-image { max-width: 150px; height: auto; }

<div class="site-wrapper">
 <header class="site-header">
 <div class="nav-inner">

 <main class="main">
 <!-- HERO -->
 <section class="hero">
 <div class="hero-inner">
 <div>
 <div class="hero-eyebrow">Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes</div>
 <h1 class="hero-title">
 Results. <span class="hero-highlight">Delivered.</span>
 </h1>
 <p class="hero-body">
 3N Consulting is a Maryland-based management consulting firm that
 builds long-term partnerships, takes ownership of outcomes, and
 practices frugality so savings flow to clients.
 </p>
 <div class="hero-meta">
 <span class="chip">Certified MD Minority Business Enterprise (MBE)</span>

 <a href="case-studies.html" class="btn btn-ghost">View recent case studies</a>
 </div>
 </div>

 <aside class="hero-media">
 <div class="caps-label">Our work in motion</div>
 <div style="background:#020617;border-radius:0.9rem;padding:1.5rem;text-align:center;font-size:0.85rem;color:#9ca3af;">
 Video / animation placeholder
 </div>
 <div class="badge-row">
 <span class="badge">MD MBE • SBR</span>

 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">MD MBE</div>
 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">NMSDC</div>
 </div>
 <p style="font-size:0.8rem; color:#9ca3af;">
 Proud to support Maryland's public agencies, colleges, and communities.
 </p>
 </aside>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- WHY 3N -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Why 3N Consulting?</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">
 Because we maintain integrity. Because we value clients. And because we deliver results.
 </h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our model is built for outcome-based partnerships, true ownership of commitments,
 and a cost structure that puts client value first.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Vested in client success</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Vested in Client Success:</strong> Outcome-based partnerships and long-term relationships.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Ownership</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Ownership:</strong> We don't "staff"—we own results and keep our commitments.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Cost structure</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Cost Structure:</strong> Frugal by design—invest in talent, minimize overhead, pass savings on.
 </p>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- TESTIMONIALS -->
 <section class="section">

 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">

 <p class="section-subtitle">

 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">

 <section class="section">
 <div class="section-inner">

 knowledge and experience—in procurement, manufacturing, and technology.

 <div class="grid-3">

 Planning, operations, and process redesign for manufacturers seeking to
 scale while maintaining service and quality.

 </article>

 <article class="card">

 Portfolio rationalization, IT strategy, and value-focused technology
 investment for public sector and mid-market organizations.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">

 </p>

 }
 img, video { max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; }
 .site-wrapper { min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; }
 .main { flex: 1; }

 .site-header {
 background: #020617;
 color: #e5e7eb;

 .brand-title {

 .nav-links { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; }
 .nav-links a {
 color: #e5e7eb;

 font-size: 0.85rem;

 border-radius: 999px;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
 }
 .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }
 .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
 .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }

 @media (max-width: 768px) {
 .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
 .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
 .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
 .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
 }

 .hero {
 padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .hero-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 3fr) minmax(0, 2fr);
 gap: 3rem;
 align-items: center;
 }
 .hero-eyebrow {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.13em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
 }
 .hero-title {

 }
 .hero-highlight { color: #38bdf8; }

 }

 }
 .hero-media {

 gap: 0.75rem;

 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .badge-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.5rem; align-items: center; }
 .badge {

 }
 .badge-outline { background: transparent; }
 .logo-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; align-items: center; }
 .logo-row img { max-height: 40px; width: auto; }
 .caps-label {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.16em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 }

 .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }

 }

 .card {

 border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;

 gap: 0.4rem;

<div class="site-wrapper">
 <header class="site-header">
 <div class="nav-inner">

 <main class="main">
 <!-- HERO -->
 <section class="hero">
 <div class="hero-inner">
 <div>
 <div class="hero-eyebrow">Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes</div>
 <h1 class="hero-title">
 Results. <span class="hero-highlight">Delivered.</span>
 </h1>
 <p class="hero-body">
 3N Consulting is a Maryland-based management consulting firm that
 builds long-term partnerships, takes ownership of outcomes, and
 practices frugality so savings flow to clients.
 </p>
 <div class="hero-meta">
 <span class="chip">Certified MD Minority Business Enterprise (MBE)</span>

 <span class="chip">NMSDC Certified MBE</span>

 <a href="#" class="btn btn-primary">Discuss your initiative →</a>
 <a href="case-studies.html" class="btn btn-ghost">View recent case studies</a>
 </div>
 </div>

 <aside class="hero-media">
 <div class="caps-label">Our work in motion</div>
 <div style="background:#020617;border-radius:0.9rem;padding:1.5rem;text-align:center;font-size:0.85rem;color:#9ca3af;">

 </div>
 <div class="badge-row">
 <span class="badge">MD MBE • SBR</span>
 <span class="badge badge-outline">NMSDC Certified MBE</span>
 </div>
 <div class="logo-row">
 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">MD MBE</div>
 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">NMSDC</div>
 </div>
 <p style="font-size:0.8rem; color:#9ca3af;">
 Proud to support Maryland's public agencies, colleges, and communities.
 </p>
 </aside>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- WHY 3N -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Why 3N Consulting?</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">
 Because we maintain integrity. Because we value clients. And because we deliver results.
 </h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our model is built for outcome-based partnerships, true ownership of commitments,
 and a cost structure that puts client value first.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Vested in client success</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Vested in Client Success:</strong> Outcome-based partnerships and long-term relationships.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Ownership</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Ownership:</strong> We don't "staff"—we own results and keep our commitments.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Cost structure</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Cost Structure:</strong> Frugal by design—invest in talent, minimize overhead, pass savings on.
 </p>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- TESTIMONIALS -->
 <section class="section">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header" style="display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:baseline;gap:0.75rem;flex-wrap:wrap;">

She combines strategic HR leadership with operational execution—an approach that consistently delivers measurable improvements in efficiency, equity, and workforce engagement."},{"type":"text","text":"At 3N Consulting, Ms. Sellers leads Human Resources and Finance workstreams for organizational assessments and operational redesign engagements, including the Calvert County Public Schools Operating & Efficiency Assessment. Her expertise in workforce planning, process automation, and human capital analytics ensures clients receive practical, data-informed recommendations that strengthen both institutional effectiveness and employee experience."},{"type":"text","text":"Ms. Sellers currently serves as Director of Member Services for the Baltimore City Council, where she oversees all HR functions, including recruitment, compensation, performance management, and organizational development. In this role, she modernized personnel structures, digitized HR processes, and introduced transparent systems that improved compliance and accountability across Council operations."},{"type":"text","text":"Previously, Ms. Sellers held senior leadership roles at Baltimore City Public Schools, where she directed teacher recruitment and selection for an 8,000-employee district—achieving the lowest teacher vacancy rate in more than a decade. +</head>
+<body>
+<div class="site-wrapper">
+ <header class="site-header">
+ <div class="nav-inner">
+ <div class="brand">
+ <img src="images/3nlogo.png" alt="3N Consulting Logo" style="height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px;">
+ </div>
+ <button class="nav-toggle" aria-label="Toggle navigation">☰</button>
+ <nav class="nav-links">
+ <a href="index.html">Home</a>
+ <a href="about.html">About Us</a>
+ <a href="services.html">Service Lines</a>
+ <a href="careers.html">Careers</a>
+ <a href="contact.html">Contact Us</a>
+ <a href="thought-leadership.html" class="active">Meet our Team</a>
+ <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
+ </nav>
+ </div>
+ </header>
+
+ <main class="main">
+ <!-- HERO -->
+ <section class="hero">
+ <div class="hero-inner">
+ <div>
+ <div class="hero-eyebrow">Our Team</div>
+ <h1 class="hero-title">Dyan Sellers</h1>
+ <div class="hero-subtitle">Senior Manager, Human Capital & Organizational Transformation</div>
+ <p class="hero-body">
+ 15+ Years of HR & Organizational Transformation Experience | Workforce Modernization & Process Improvement Expert
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- BIOGRAPHY SECTION -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Biography</h2>
+ </div>
+ <div class="bio-section">
+ <p>
+ Ms. Dyan Sellers is a seasoned human resources and organizational transformation executive with more than 15 years of experience leading workforce modernization, classification alignment, and process improvement initiatives across K–12 education systems, local government, and nonprofit sectors. She combines strategic HR leadership with operational execution—an approach that consistently delivers measurable improvements in efficiency, equity, and workforce engagement.
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ At 3N Consulting, Ms. Sellers leads Human Resources and Finance workstreams for organizational assessments and operational redesign engagements, including the Calvert County Public Schools Operating & Efficiency Assessment. Her expertise in workforce planning, process automation, and human capital analytics ensures clients receive practical, data-informed recommendations that strengthen both institutional effectiveness and employee experience.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE SECTION -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Professional Experience</h2>
+ </div>
+ <div class="bio-section">
+ <p>
+ <strong>Baltimore City Council:</strong> Ms. Sellers currently serves as Director of Member Services for the Baltimore City Council, where she oversees all HR functions, including recruitment, compensation, performance management, and organizational development. In this role, she modernized personnel structures, digitized HR processes, and introduced transparent systems that improved compliance and accountability across Council operations.
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ <strong>Baltimore City Public Schools:</strong> Previously, Ms. Sellers held senior leadership roles at Baltimore City Public Schools, where she directed teacher recruitment and selection for an 8,000-employee district—achieving the lowest teacher vacancy rate in more than a decade. She also spearheaded HRIS modernization and equity-focused policy reform initiatives, aligning classification and compensation frameworks to ensure consistency and fairness system-wide.
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ <strong>Edgility Consulting:</strong> As a former Principal Consultant at Edgility Consulting, Ms. Sellers advised school districts, education agencies, and nonprofits nationwide on equitable hiring, workforce restructuring, and HR modernization. Her consulting engagements regularly produced improvements in recruitment efficiency, employee satisfaction, and diversity outcomes.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- EDUCATION & CREDENTIALS SECTION -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Education & Credentials</h2>
+ </div>
+ <div class="bio-section">
+ <p>
+ Ms. Sellers holds a <strong>Master of Science in Human Resources Management</strong> from The Catholic University of America and a <strong>Bachelor of Science in Zoology</strong> from the University of Michigan.
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ Her work is guided by a belief that strong, equitable people systems are the foundation of every high-performing organization.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- CTA SECTION -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="cta-section">
+ <h3 style="font-size: 1.3rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;">Ready to Transform Your Organization?</h3>
+ <p style="margin-bottom: 1.5rem; color: #4b5563;">Let's discuss how human capital strategy and organizational transformation can drive sustainable performance.</p>
+ <a href="contact.html" class="btn btn-primary">Contact Us →</a>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+ </main>
+
+ <footer class="site-footer">
+ <div class="footer-inner">
+ <div style="flex: 1; min-width: 200px;">
+ <div style="font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">3N Consulting</div>
+ <p style="color: #6b7280;">Results. Delivered.</p>
+ </div>
+ <div class="footer-links">
+ <a href="index.html">Home</a>
+ <a href="about.html">About</a>
+ <a href="services.html">Services</a>
+ <a href="contact.html">Contact</a>
+ <a href="thought-leadership.html">Meet our Team</a>
+ <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ <div style="text-align: center; margin-top: 1.5rem; padding-top: 1.5rem; border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb; color: #9ca3af;">
+ <p>© 2024 3N Consulting. All rights reserved.</p>
+ </div>
+ </footer>
+</div>
+
+<script src="script.js"></script>
+</body>

In this role, she modernized personnel structures, digitized HR processes, and introduced transparent systems that improved compliance and accountability across Council operations.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A %3Cstrong%3EBaltimore City Public Schools:%3C/strong%3E Previously, Ms. Sellers held senior leadership roles at Baltimore City Public Schools, where she directed teacher recruitment and selection for an 8,000-employee district%E2%80%94achieving the lowest teacher vacancy rate in more than a decade. She also spearheaded HRIS modernization and equity-focused policy reform initiatives, aligning classification and compensation frameworks to ensure consistency and fairness system-wide.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A %3Cstrong%3EEdgility Consulting:%3C/strong%3E As a former Principal Consultant at Edgility Consulting, Ms. Sellers advised school districts, education agencies, and nonprofits nationwide on equitable hiring, workforce restructuring, and HR modernization. Her consulting engagements regularly produced improvements in recruitment efficiency, employee satisfaction, and diversity outcomes.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- EDUCATION & CREDENTIALS SECTION --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section section-alt%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-header%22%3E%0A %3Ch2 class=%22section-title%22%3EEducation & Credentials%3C/h2%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22bio-section%22%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A Ms. Sellers holds a %3Cstrong%3EMaster of Science in Human Resources Management%3C/strong%3E from The Catholic University of America and a %3Cstrong%3EBachelor of Science in Zoology%3C/strong%3E from the University of Michigan.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A Her work is guided by a belief that strong, equitable people systems are the foundation of every high-performing organization.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- CTA SECTION --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22cta-section%22%3E%0A %3Ch3 style=%22font-size: 1.3rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;%22%3EReady to Transform Your Organization?%3C/h3%3E%0A %3Cp style=%22margin-bottom: 1.5rem; color: #4b5563;%22%3ELet's discuss how human capital strategy and organizational transformation can drive sustainable performance.%3C/p%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22contact.html%22 class=%22btn btn-primary%22%3EContact Us %E2%86%92%3C/a%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A %3C/main%3E%0A%0A %3Cfooter class=%22site-footer%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22footer-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv style=%22flex: 1; min-width: 200px;%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv style=%22font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;%22%3E3N Consulting%3C/div%3E%0A %3Cp style=%22color: #6b7280;%22%3EResults. Delivered.%3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22footer-links%22%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22index.html%22%3EHome%3C/a%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22about.html%22%3EAbout%3C/a%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22services.html%22%3EServices%3C/a%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22contact.html%22%3EContact%3C/a%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22thought-leadership.html%22%3EMeet our Team%3C/a%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22disclaimers.html%22%3EDisclaimers%3C/a%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3Cdiv style=%22text-align: center; margin-top: 1.5rem; padding-top: 1.5rem; border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb; color: #9ca3af;%22%3E%0A %3Cp%3E© 2024 3N Consulting. ","isNew":false,"isApplied":true}]}],"context":{"author":"Coding Agent","operationId":"582f306f-d674-40de-b743-1f46f2b19588","usageStatistics":{"llmCallsUsedForAnswer":4.0,"llmCallsUsedTotal":169.0,"llmCallsLimit":280.0,"limitRenewalMillisecondTimestamp":1764430567020}},"createdAt":1764357404529,"isInternal":false},{"id":"09fe1d65-e782-4dce-8301-a5b6789f3c6a","role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Here is the information for David Hochman's page, and I want it linked to words "David Hochman" on the "Meet Our Team" page: David Hochman"},{"type":"text","text":"Strategy & Operations Practice"},{"type":"text","text":"David Hochman is a Director at 3N Consulting LLC, bringing more than 30 years of experience in strategic planning, innovation-led economic development, and organizational performance improvement for universities, government agencies, and nonprofit foundations. He is widely recognized for his expertise in technology-based economic development, benchmarking, and strategic management, helping organizations design and implement policies that strengthen regional innovation ecosystems and research commercialization."},{"type":"text","text":"Mr. Hochman has advised state and regional economic-development agencies, public-private partnerships, and higher-education institutions nationwide. He currently serves as an Associate and Special Advisor with TEConomy Partners LLC, the nation’s leading consulting practice for innovation-driven economic development, where he supports engagements for state governments, universities, and foundations. Previously, he was a Senior Principal Consultant at Battelle Memorial Institute’s Technology Partnership Practice, where he led large-scale strategy and planning initiatives for science and technology-driven economies."},{"type":"text","text":"Earlier in his career, Mr. Hochman served as Deputy Director and Interim Executive Director of the New Jersey Commission on Science and Technology, managing $15 million in annual R&D grant programs and overseeing more than $125 million in research facility investments across the state. He also founded and served as the Executive Director of the Business Incubator Association of New York State, expanding it to nearly 40 member organizations operating more than 70 innovation facilities. His work has helped catalyze entrepreneurship, strengthen university-industry partnerships, and accelerate commercialization capacity nationwide."},{"type":"text","text":"Mr. Hochman holds a Master of Business Administration in Finance from New York University’s Stern School of Business and a Bachelor of Arts in History and Philosophy of Science from Princeton University. A former adjunct professor at New York University’s Wagner Graduate School of Public Administration, he has taught courses on strategic management and continues to be recognized for his lifelong commitment to advancing regional innovation and public-sector excellence."}],"context":{"currentFile":{"path":"index.html","fsPath":"/Users/anupeesay/PycharmProjects/3NWebsite2/index.html","sources":["opened_tab"],"content":"<!DOCTYPE html>

 <section class="section section-alt">

 <h2 class="section-title">
 Because we maintain integrity. Because we value clients. And because we deliver results.
 </h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our model is built for outcome-based partnerships, true ownership of commitments,
 and a cost structure that puts client value first.
 </p>

 <article class="card">

 </p>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Cost structure</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Cost Structure:</strong> Frugal by design—invest in talent, minimize overhead, pass savings on.
 </p>

+<body>
+<div class="site-wrapper">
+ <header class="site-header">
+ <div class="nav-inner">
+ <div class="brand">
+ <img src="images/3nlogo.png" alt="3N Consulting Logo" style="height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px;">
+ </div>
+ <button class="nav-toggle" aria-label="Toggle navigation">☰</button>
+ <nav class="nav-links">
+ <a href="index.html">Home</a>
+ <a href="about.html">About Us</a>
+ <a href="services.html">Service Lines</a>
+ <a href="careers.html">Careers</a>
+ <a href="contact.html">Contact Us</a>
+ <a href="thought-leadership.html" class="active">Meet our Team</a>
+ <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
+ </nav>
+ </div>
+ </header>
+
+ <main class="main">
+ <!-- HERO -->
+ <section class="hero">
+ <div class="hero-inner">
+ <div>
+ <div class="hero-eyebrow">Our Team</div>
+ <h1 class="hero-title">David Hochman</h1>
+ <div class="hero-subtitle">Director, Strategy & Operations Practice</div>
+ <p class="hero-body">
+ 30+ Years of Strategic Planning & Economic Development | Innovation Ecosystem Expert | University & Government Advisory
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- BIOGRAPHY SECTION -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Biography</h2>
+ </div>
+ <div class="bio-section">
+ <p>
+ David Hochman is a Director at 3N Consulting LLC, bringing more than 30 years of experience in strategic planning, innovation-led economic development, and organizational performance improvement for universities, government agencies, and nonprofit foundations. He is widely recognized for his expertise in technology-based economic development, benchmarking, and strategic management, helping organizations design and implement policies that strengthen regional innovation ecosystems and research commercialization.
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ Mr. Hochman has advised state and regional economic-development agencies, public-private partnerships, and higher-education institutions nationwide. He currently serves as an Associate and Special Advisor with TEConomy Partners LLC, the nation's leading consulting practice for innovation-driven economic development, where he supports engagements for state governments, universities, and foundations.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE SECTION -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Professional Experience</h2>
+ </div>
+ <div class="bio-section">
+ <p>
+ <strong>TEConomy Partners LLC:</strong> Mr. Hochman currently serves as an Associate and Special Advisor with TEConomy Partners LLC, the nation's leading consulting practice for innovation-driven economic development.
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ <strong>Battelle Memorial Institute:</strong> Previously, he was a Senior Principal Consultant at Battelle Memorial Institute's Technology Partnership Practice, where he led large-scale strategy and planning initiatives for science and technology-driven economies.
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ <strong>New Jersey Commission on Science and Technology:</strong> Earlier in his career, Mr. Hochman served as Deputy Director and Interim Executive Director of the New Jersey Commission on Science and Technology, managing $15 million in annual R&D grant programs and overseeing more than $125 million in research facility investments across the state.
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ <strong>Business Incubator Association of New York State:</strong> He also founded and served as the Executive Director of the Business Incubator Association of New York State, expanding it to nearly 40 member organizations operating more than 70 innovation facilities. His work has helped catalyze entrepreneurship, strengthen university-industry partnerships, and accelerate commercialization capacity nationwide.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- EDUCATION & CREDENTIALS SECTION -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Education & Academic Background</h2>
+ </div>
+ <div class="bio-section">
+ <p>
+ Mr. Hochman holds a <strong>Master of Business Administration in Finance</strong> from New York University's Stern School of Business and a <strong>Bachelor of Arts in History and Philosophy of Science</strong> from Princeton University.
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ A former adjunct professor at New York University's Wagner Graduate School of Public Administration, he has taught courses on strategic management and continues to be recognized for his lifelong commitment to advancing regional innovation and public-sector excellence.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- CTA SECTION -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="cta-section">
+ <h3 style="font-size: 1.3rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;">Ready to Drive Strategic Growth?</h3>
+ <p style="margin-bottom: 1.5rem; color: #4b5563;">Let's discuss how strategic planning and innovation-driven development can strengthen your organization's competitive position.</p>
+ <a href="contact.html" class="btn btn-primary">Contact Us →</a>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+ </main>
+
+ <footer class="site-footer">
+ <div class="footer-inner">
+ <div style="flex: 1; min-width: 200px;">
+ <div style="font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">3N Consulting</div>
+ <p style="color: #6b7280;">Results. Delivered.</p>
+ </div>
+ <div class="footer-links">
+ <a href="index.html">Home</a>
+ <a href="about.html">About</a>
+ <a href="services.html">Services</a>
+ <a href="contact.html">Contact</a>
+ <a href="thought-leadership.html">Meet our Team</a>
+ <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ <div style="text-align: center; margin-top: 1.5rem; padding-top: 1.5rem; border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb; color: #9ca3af;">
+ <p>© 2024 3N Consulting. All rights reserved.</p>
+ </div>
+ </footer>
+</div>
+

- Expertise in technology-based economic development and research commercialization

**Professional Experience:**

- New Jersey Commission on Science and Technology - Deputy Director & Interim Executive Director
- Founder & Executive Director of Business Incubator Association of New York State

**Education:**
- MBA in Finance from NYU's Stern School of Business
- BA in History and Philosophy of Science from Princeton University
- Former adjunct professor at NYU's Wagner Graduate School of Public Administration

He is widely recognized for his expertise in technology-based economic development, benchmarking, and strategic management, helping organizations design and implement policies that strengthen regional innovation ecosystems and research commercialization.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A Mr. Hochman has advised state and regional economic-development agencies, public-private partnerships, and higher-education institutions nationwide. He currently serves as an Associate and Special Advisor with TEConomy Partners LLC, the nation's leading consulting practice for innovation-driven economic development, where he supports engagements for state governments, universities, and foundations.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE SECTION --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-header%22%3E%0A %3Ch2 class=%22section-title%22%3EProfessional Experience%3C/h2%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22bio-section%22%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A %3Cstrong%3ETEConomy Partners LLC:%3C/strong%3E Mr. Hochman currently serves as an Associate and Special Advisor with TEConomy Partners LLC, the nation's leading consulting practice for innovation-driven economic development.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A %3Cstrong%3EBattelle Memorial Institute:%3C/strong%3E Previously, he was a Senior Principal Consultant at Battelle Memorial Institute's Technology Partnership Practice, where he led large-scale strategy and planning initiatives for science and technology-driven economies.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A %3Cstrong%3ENew Jersey Commission on Science and Technology:%3C/strong%3E Earlier in his career, Mr. Hochman served as Deputy Director and Interim Executive Director of the New Jersey Commission on Science and Technology, managing $15 million in annual R&D grant programs and overseeing more than $125 million in research facility investments across the state.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A %3Cstrong%3EBusiness Incubator Association of New York State:%3C/strong%3E He also founded and served as the Executive Director of the Business Incubator Association of New York State, expanding it to nearly 40 member organizations operating more than 70 innovation facilities. His work has helped catalyze entrepreneurship, strengthen university-industry partnerships, and accelerate commercialization capacity nationwide.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- EDUCATION & CREDENTIALS SECTION --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section section-alt%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-header%22%3E%0A %3Ch2 class=%22section-title%22%3EEducation & Academic Background%3C/h2%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22bio-section%22%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A Mr. Hochman holds a %3Cstrong%3EMaster of Business Administration in Finance%3C/strong%3E from New York University's Stern School of Business and a %3Cstrong%3EBachelor of Arts in History and Philosophy of Science%3C/strong%3E from Princeton University.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3Cp%3E%0A A former adjunct professor at New York University's Wagner Graduate School of Public Administration, he has taught courses on strategic management and continues to be recognized for his lifelong commitment to advancing regional innovation and public-sector excellence.%0A %3C/p%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A%0A %3C!-- CTA SECTION --%3E%0A %3Csection class=%22section%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22section-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22cta-section%22%3E%0A %3Ch3 style=%22font-size: 1.3rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;%22%3EReady to Drive Strategic Growth?%3C/h3%3E%0A %3Cp style=%22margin-bottom: 1.5rem; color: #4b5563;%22%3ELet's discuss how strategic planning and innovation-driven development can strengthen your organization's competitive position.%3C/p%3E%0A %3Ca href=%22contact.html%22 class=%22btn btn-primary%22%3EContact Us %E2%86%92%3C/a%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/div%3E%0A %3C/section%3E%0A %3C/main%3E%0A%0A %3Cfooter class=%22site-footer%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv class=%22footer-inner%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv style=%22flex: 1; min-width: 200px;%22%3E%0A %3Cdiv style=%22font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;%22%3E3N Consulting%3C/div%3E%0A %3Cp style=%22color: #6b7280;%22%3EResults. I will give you the information for their pages shortly."}],"context":{"currentFile":{"path":"index.html","fsPath":"/Users/anupeesay/PycharmProjects/3NWebsite2/index.html","sources":["opened_tab"],"content":"<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
 <meta charset="UTF-8">
 <title>3N Consulting | Results. Delivered.</title>
 <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
 <style>
 /* Inline CSS so this preview actually renders with layout */
 *, *::before, *::after { box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
 html, body {
 font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
 color: #111827;
 background-color: #f9fafb;
 line-height: 1.6;
 }
 img, video { max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; }
 .site-wrapper { min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; }
 .main { flex: 1; }

 .site-header {
 background: #020617;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 border-bottom: 1px solid #1f2937;
 position: sticky;
 top: 0;
 z-index: 10;
 }
 .nav-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
 display: flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: space-between;
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 .brand-title {
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: 0.08em;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 font-size: 0.9rem;
 }
 .brand-tagline { font-size: 0.75rem; color: #9ca3af; }
 .brand-logo { height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px; }
 .nav-links { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; }
 .nav-links a {
 color: #e5e7eb;
 text-decoration: none;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 padding: 0.35rem 0.7rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
 }
 .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }
 .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
 .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }

 @media (max-width: 768px) {
 .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
 .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
 .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
 .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
 }

 .hero {
 padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .hero-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 3fr) minmax(0, 2fr);
 gap: 3rem;
 align-items: center;
 }
 .hero-eyebrow {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.13em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
 }
 .hero-title {
 font-size: clamp(2.1rem, 3vw, 2.7rem);
 font-weight: 750;
 letter-spacing: -0.03em;
 margin-bottom: 1rem;
 }
 .hero-highlight { color: #38bdf8; }
 .hero-body {
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 color: #d1d5db;
 max-width: 32rem;
 margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
 }
 .hero-meta {
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1.25rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 2rem;
 }
 .chip {
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.7);
 }
 .hero-media {
 border-radius: 1.2rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, rgba(56,189,248,0.12), transparent 50%),
 radial-gradient(circle at bottom right, rgba(52,211,153,0.12), transparent 55%);
 padding: 1rem;
 display: flex;
 flex-direction: column;
 gap: 0.75rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .badge-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.5rem; align-items: center; }
 .badge {
 border-radius: 999px;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.7rem;
 font-size: 0.7rem;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.12em;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.8);
 white-space: nowrap;
 }
 .badge-outline { background: transparent; }
 .logo-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; align-items: center; }
 .logo-row img { max-height: 40px; width: auto; }
 .caps-label {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.16em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 }

 .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }
 .section-alt { background: #f3f4f6; }
 .section-inner { max-width: 1120px; margin: 0 auto; }
 .section-header { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; }
 .section-kicker {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.15em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 color: #6b7280;
 margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
 }
 .section-title {
 font-size: 1.8rem;
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: -0.02em;
 margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
 }
 .section-subtitle {
 color: #4b5563;
 max-width: 40rem;
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 }

 .grid-3 {
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0,1fr));
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 @media (max-width: 900px) {
 .hero-inner { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0,1fr)); }
 }
 @media (max-width: 640px) {
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 }

 .card {
 border-radius: 1rem;
 border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 background: #ffffff;
 padding: 1.1rem 1.1rem 1.25rem;
 box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(15,23,42,0.04);
 }
 .card-title {
 font-size: 1rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 margin-bottom: 0.4rem;
 }
 .card-body { font-size: 0.9rem; color: #4b5563; }

 .testimonial-quote { font-style: italic; margin-bottom: 0.4rem; }
 .testimonial-client { font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.2rem; }
 .testimonial-ratings { font-size: 0.8rem; color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.4; }

 .btn {
 display: inline-flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: center;
 gap: 0.4rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.55rem 1.2rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 text-decoration: none;
 border: 1px solid transparent;
 cursor: pointer;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease, border-color 0.15s ease, transform 0.08s ease;
 }
 .btn-primary { background: #38bdf8; color: #020617; border-color: #0ea5e9; }
 .btn-primary:hover { background: #0ea5e9; transform: translateY(-1px); }
 .btn-ghost { background: transparent; color: #111827; border-color: #d1d5db; }
 .btn-ghost:hover { background: #e5e7eb; }

 .site-footer {
 border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 2rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #6b7280;
 background: #f9fafb;
 }
 .footer-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1rem;
 justify-content: space-between;
 }
 .footer-links {
 display: flex;
 gap: 0.9rem;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 }
 .footer-links a {
 color: #6b7280;
 text-decoration: none;
 }
 .footer-links a:hover { text-decoration: underline; }
 .footer-image { max-width: 150px; height: auto; }
 </style>
</head>

<div class="site-wrapper">
 <header class="site-header">
 <div class="nav-inner">
 <div class="brand">
 <img src="images/3nlogo.png" alt="3N Consulting Logo" style="height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px;">
 </div>
 <button class="nav-toggle" aria-label="Toggle navigation">☰</button>
 <nav class="nav-links">

 </div>

 <main class="main">
 <!-- HERO -->
 <section class="hero">
 <div class="hero-inner">
 <div>
 <div class="hero-eyebrow">Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes</div>
 <h1 class="hero-title">
 Results. <span class="hero-highlight">Delivered.</span>
 </h1>
 <p class="hero-body">
 3N Consulting is a Maryland-based management consulting firm that
 builds long-term partnerships, takes ownership of outcomes, and
 practices frugality so savings flow to clients.
 </p>
 <div class="hero-meta">
 <span class="chip">Certified MD Minority Business Enterprise (MBE)</span>
 <span class="chip">Small Business Reserve (SBR) Program</span>
 <span class="chip">NMSDC Certified MBE</span>
 </div>
 <div class="hero-cta">
 <a href="#" class="btn btn-primary">Discuss your initiative →</a>
 <a href="case-studies.html" class="btn btn-ghost">View recent case studies</a>
 </div>
 </div>

 <aside class="hero-media">
 <div class="caps-label">Our work in motion</div>
 <div style="background:#020617;border-radius:0.9rem;padding:1.5rem;text-align:center;font-size:0.85rem;color:#9ca3af;">
 Video / animation placeholder
 </div>
 <div class="badge-row">
 <span class="badge">MD MBE • SBR</span>
 <span class="badge badge-outline">NMSDC Certified MBE</span>
 </div>
 <div class="logo-row">
 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">MD MBE</div>
 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">NMSDC</div>
 </div>
 <p style="font-size:0.8rem; color:#9ca3af;">
 Proud to support Maryland's public agencies, colleges, and communities.
 </p>
 </aside>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- WHY 3N -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Why 3N Consulting?</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">
 Because we maintain integrity. Because we value clients. And because we deliver results.
 </h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our model is built for outcome-based partnerships, true ownership of commitments,
 and a cost structure that puts client value first.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Vested in client success</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Vested in Client Success:</strong> Outcome-based partnerships and long-term relationships.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Ownership</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Ownership:</strong> We don't "staff"—we own results and keep our commitments.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Cost structure</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Cost Structure:</strong> Frugal by design—invest in talent, minimize overhead, pass savings on.
 </p>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- TESTIMONIALS -->
 <section class="section">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header" style="display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:baseline;gap:0.75rem;flex-wrap:wrap;">

 *, *::before, *::after { box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
 html, body {
 font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
 color: #111827;
 background-color: #f9fafb;
 line-height: 1.6;
 }
 img, video { max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; }
 .site-wrapper { min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; }
 .main { flex: 1; }

 .site-header {
 background: #020617;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 border-bottom: 1px solid #1f2937;
 position: sticky;
 top: 0;
 z-index: 10;
 }
 .nav-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;

 .brand-title {

 }

 .nav-links { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; }
 .nav-links a {
 color: #e5e7eb;
 text-decoration: none;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 padding: 0.35rem 0.7rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
 }
 .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }
 .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
 .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }

 @media (max-width: 768px) {
 .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
 .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
 .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
 .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
 }

 .hero {
 padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .hero-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 3fr) minmax(0, 2fr);
 gap: 3rem;
 align-items: center;
 }
 .hero-eyebrow {
 text-transform: uppercase;

 }

 }
 .hero-highlight { color: #38bdf8; }

 }

 }

 }
 .hero-media {

 flex-direction: column;
 gap: 0.75rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .badge-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.5rem; align-items: center; }
 .badge {
 border-radius: 999px;

 font-size: 0.7rem;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.12em;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.8);

 }
 .badge-outline { background: transparent; }
 .logo-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; align-items: center; }
 .logo-row img { max-height: 40px; width: auto; }
 .caps-label {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.16em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 }

 .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }
 .section-alt { background: #f3f4f6; }
 .section-inner { max-width: 1120px; margin: 0 auto; }
 .section-header { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; }
 .section-kicker {
 text-transform: uppercase;

 .section-title {

 }
 .section-subtitle {

 .grid-3 {

 }
 @media (max-width: 900px) {
 .hero-inner { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }

 }
 @media (max-width: 640px) {
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 }

 .card {
 border-radius: 1rem;
 border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 background: #ffffff;
 padding: 1.1rem 1.1rem 1.25rem;

 .card-title {
 font-size: 1rem;

 }

 .testimonial-quote { font-style: italic; margin-bottom: 0.4rem; }

 .btn {

 .site-footer {

 .footer-inner {

 <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">

+ <style>
+ /* Reset and base styles */
+ *, *::before, *::after { box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
+ html, body {
+ font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
+ color: #111827;
+ background-color: #f9fafb;
+ line-height: 1.6;
+ }
+
+ /* Header styles */
+ .site-header {
+ background: #020617;
+ color: #e5e7eb;
+ border-bottom: 1px solid #1f2937;
+ position: sticky;
+ top: 0;
+ z-index: 10;
+ }
+ .nav-inner {
+ max-width: 1120px;
+ margin: 0 auto;
+ padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
+ display: flex;
+ align-items: center;
+ justify-content: space-between;
+ gap: 1.5rem;
+ }
+ .brand { display: flex; align-items: center; }
+ .brand img { height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px; }
+ .nav-links { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; }
+ .nav-links a {
+ color: #e5e7eb;
+ text-decoration: none;
+ font-size: 0.85rem;
+ padding: 0.35rem 0.7rem;
+ border-radius: 999px;
+ transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
+ }
+ .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }
+ .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
+
+ /* Page header */
+ .page-header {
+ background: linear-gradient(135deg, #020617 0%, #0f172a 100%);
+ color: #e5e7eb;
+ padding: 4rem 1.5rem;
+ text-align: center;
+ border-bottom: 1px solid #1f2937;
+ }
+ .page-header h1 {
+ font-size: 2.5rem;
+ font-weight: 750;
+ margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
+ letter-spacing: -0.02em;
+ }
+ .page-header p {
+ font-size: 1.1rem;
+ color: #9ca3af;
+ max-width: 600px;
+ margin: 0 auto;
+ }
+
+ /* Case studies grid */
+ .case-studies-section {
+ padding: 4rem 1.5rem;
+ background: #f9fafb;
+ }
+ .case-study-grid {
+ max-width: 1120px;
+ margin: 0 auto;
+ display: grid;
+ grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0, 1fr));
+ gap: 2rem;
+ margin-bottom: 4rem;
+ }
+
+ /* Case study card */
+ .case-study-card {
+ background: white;
+ border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
+ border-radius: 1rem;
+ padding: 2rem;
+ box-shadow: 0 10px 25px rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.05);
+ transition: all 0.3s ease;
+ cursor: pointer;
+ position: relative;
+ overflow: hidden;
+ }
+ .case-study-card::before {
+ content: '';
+ position: absolute;
+ top: 0;
+ left: 0;
+ right: 0;
+ height: 4px;
+ background: linear-gradient(90deg, #38bdf8 0%, #34d399 100%);
+ transform: scaleX(0);
+ transform-origin: left;
+ transition: transform 0.3s ease;
+ }
+ .case-study-card:hover {
+ box-shadow: 0 20px 40px rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.1);
+ transform: translateY(-4px);
+ }
+ .case-study-card:hover::before {
+ transform: scaleX(1);
+ }
+
+ .case-study-number {
+ display: inline-block;
+ width: 40px;
+ height: 40px;
+ background: linear-gradient(135deg, #38bdf8 0%, #34d399 100%);
+ color: white;
+ border-radius: 50%;
+ display: flex;
+ align-items: center;
+ justify-content: center;
+ font-weight: 700;
+ font-size: 1.1rem;
+ margin-bottom: 1rem;
+ }
+
+ .case-study-card h3 {
+ font-size: 1.3rem;
+ font-weight: 700;
+ color: #020617;
+ margin-bottom: 1rem;
+ line-height: 1.4;
+ letter-spacing: -0.01em;
+ }
+
+ .case-study-card p {
+ font-size: 0.95rem;
+ color: #4b5563;
+ line-height: 1.6;
+ margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
+ }
+
+ .case-study-link {
+ display: inline-flex;
+ align-items: center;
+ gap: 0.5rem;
+ color: #38bdf8;
+ text-decoration: none;
+ font-weight: 600;
+ font-size: 0.9rem;
+ transition: gap 0.2s ease;
+ }
+ .case-study-link:hover {
+ gap: 0.75rem;
+ }
+
+ /* CTA Section */
+ .cta-section {
+ max-width: 1120px;
+ margin: 0 auto;
+ background: linear-gradient(135deg, #020617 0%, #0f172a 100%);
+ color: #e5e7eb;
+ padding: 3rem;
+ border-radius: 1rem;
+ text-align: center;
+ border: 1px solid #1f2937;
+ }
+ .cta-section h2 {
+ font-size: 1.8rem;
+ font-weight: 700;
+ margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
+ letter-spacing: -0.02em;
+ }
+ .cta-section p {
+ font-size: 1rem;
+ color: #d1d5db;
+ margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
+ }
+
+ .cta-button {
+ display: inline-flex;
+ align-items: center;
+ justify-content: center;
+ gap: 0.5rem;
+ background: #38bdf8;
+ color: #020617;
+ padding: 0.75rem 1.8rem;
+ border-radius: 999px;
+ text-decoration: none;
+ font-weight: 600;
+ font-size: 0.95rem;
+ border: 1px solid transparent;
+ transition: all 0.2s ease;
+ }
+ .cta-button:hover {
+ background: #0ea5e9;
+ transform: translateY(-2px);
+ }
+
+ /* Footer */
+ .site-footer {
+ border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
+ padding: 2rem 1.5rem;
+ font-size: 0.8rem;
+ color: #6b7280;
+ background: #f9fafb;
+ margin-top: 3rem;
+ }
+ .footer-inner {
+ max-width: 1120px;
+ margin: 0 auto;
+ display: flex;
+ flex-wrap: wrap;
+ gap: 2rem;
+ justify-content: space-between;
+ }
+ .footer-section h4 {
+ color: #111827;
+ margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
+ font-weight: 600;
+ }
+ .footer-links {
+ display: flex;
+ gap: 0.9rem;
+ flex-wrap: wrap;
+ }
+ .footer-links a {
+ color: #6b7280;
+ text-decoration: none;
+ }
+ .footer-links a:hover { text-decoration: underline; }
+
+ /* Responsive */
+ @media (max-width: 900px) {
+ .case-study-grid {
+ grid-template-columns: 1fr;
+ }
+ .page-header h1 {
+ font-size: 2rem;
+ }
+ }
+ </style>
