","isNew":false,"isApplied":true}]}],"context":{"author":"Coding Agent","operationId":"d8068229-a341-488a-932d-260856ab31d5"},"createdAt":1764364096030,"isInternal":false},{"id":"54fd6ced-981a-486e-bda3-1817a0634c60","role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Here is the content for the page of Organizational Readiness Assessment Methodology (O-RAM) in Action, linked to "Organizational Readiness Assessment Methodology (O-RAM) in Action" in the view recent studies page:“Organizational Readiness Assessment Methodology (O-RAM) in Action”"},{"type":"text","text":"“From Fragmented to Future-Ready: How 3N Consulting Transformed a College’s Procurement into a Model of Efficiency, Compliance, and Savings”"},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"“Situation: A leading college faced growing challenges in its procurement function — fragmented processes, outdated policies, and limited automation. Despite strong institutional values, the college lacked a unified structure to manage over $30 million in annual purchasing efficiently and compliantly. Stakeholder feedback revealed: 35% rated procurement efficiency as below average or very inefficient. 82% believed policies and procedures required revision. 45% of purchases bypassed purchase orders, heightening compliance risk. Nearly half of the stakeholders surveyed reported little or no procurement training. The college sought a consulting partner capable of evaluating readiness for change and designing a realistic transformation roadmap grounded in policy compliance and operational data.”"},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"“3N Approach and Solution — Guided by O-RAM"},{"type":"text","text":"3N deployed its Organizational Readiness Assessment Methodology (O-RAM) to evaluate institutional capacity, identify change barriers, and structure a transformation that could succeed within the existing culture and resources."},{"type":"text","text":"O-RAM Readiness Dimensions Applied:"},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"Dimension"},{"type":"text","text":"Focus"},{"type":"text","text":"Key Findings"},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"Leadership Alignment"},{"type":"text","text":"Executive buy-in and strategic goals"},{"type":"text","text":"Clear mission alignment with student success but limited cross-departmental governance."},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"Governance & Controls"},{"type":"text","text":"Policy maturity and compliance"},{"type":"text","text":"39 policy areas assessed; 25 lacked definition, exposing audit risks."},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"People & Capability"},{"type":"text","text":"Organizational structure and training"},{"type":"text","text":"Roles overlapped; 41% had no formal procurement training."},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"Technology & Data"},{"type":"text","text":"System automation and analytics"},{"type":"text","text":"ERP underutilized; manual workarounds caused delays and inconsistency."},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"Process & Performance"},{"type":"text","text":"Efficiency, accountability, and measurement"},{"type":"text","text":"Fragmented workflows and absence of standard KPIs."},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"3N analyzed annual average spend in various dimensions:"},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"Transformation Framework and Execution"},{"type":"text","text":"1. Diagnostic Analysis"},{"type":"text","text":"Reviewed 33.5 months of spend and procurement transactions."},{"type":"text","text":"Conducted 30 stakeholder interviews and 34 surveys."},{"type":"text","text":"Identified over $1.8M in split-purchase activity and $609K in mis-grouped spend."},{"type":"text","text":"2. Organizational Readiness Mapping Each department was evaluated across the five O-RAM pillars to determine maturity, adoption risk, and support requirements."},{"type":"text","text":"3. Targeted Recommendations 3N created a roadmap that included:"},{"type":"text","text":"Centralized procurement structure phased in over 24 months."},{"type":"text","text":"Implementation of an eProcurement system (Jaggaer or PeopleSoft SRM)."},{"type":"text","text":"132 automated controls within ERP workflows."},{"type":"text","text":"A complete rewrite of policies for COMAR compliance."},{"type":"text","text":"4. Change Enablement and Capability Building 3N embedded training, communication, and performance metrics to ensure readiness and sustainability."},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"Results Delivered"},{"type":"text","text":"Through 3N Consulting’s Organizational Readiness Assessment Methodology (O-RAM), the college achieved a profound shift from fragmented processes to a fully aligned, data-driven procurement function. The initiative advanced procurement maturity from Level 1 (Ad Hoc) to Level 3 (Standardized) with a clear path toward Level 5 (Center of Excellence). In the process, 3N identified $1.2 – $3.7 million in annual savings through vendor consolidation, automation, and policy modernization, while establishing 39 COMAR-aligned policies and a comprehensive eProcurement roadmap for end-to-end digital integration."},{"type":"text","text":"These structural and technological changes directly improved core financial and operational metrics, including days cash on hand, operating margin, net tuition per FTE, purchase-order cycle time, and compliance with state and college regulations. Staff and stakeholder engagement rose sharply as transparency, training, and accountability became embedded in daily operations."},{"type":"text","text":"Crucially, the realized savings are being reinvested to expand student opportunity—lowering tuition costs and growing the work-study program by over 40 percent, providing more paid, hands-on learning experiences. Building on this momentum, 3N partnered with the college to scale its Procurement Center of Excellence into a fee-based shared-services model for peer institutions. The initiative is projected to generate six-figure annual revenue and achieve self-funding within 12 months, while offering students ongoing real-world employment pathways."},{"type":"text","text":"For 3N Consulting, this engagement has evolved into a multi-year strategic partnership and a replicable transformation model for other institutions—demonstrating measurable, sustainable impact for both the client and the firm."},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","text":"---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------"},{"type":"text","text":"3N Consulting’s Organizational Readiness Assessment Methodology (O-RAM) ensures every engagement translates vision into achievable transformation. Through rigorous analysis, stakeholder partnership, and disciplined execution, 3N consistently delivers exceptional, sustainable results — on time and with measurable impact.”"}],"context":{"currentFile":{"path":"index.html","fsPath":"/Users/anupeesay/PycharmProjects/3NWebsite2/index.html","sources":["opened_tab"],"content":"<!DOCTYPE html>

<head>

 <title>3N Consulting | Results. Delivered.</title>

 /* Inline CSS so this preview actually renders with layout */
 *, *::before, *::after { box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
 html, body {
 font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
 color: #111827;
 background-color: #f9fafb;
 line-height: 1.6;
 }
 img, video { max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; }
 .site-wrapper { min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; }
 .main { flex: 1; }

 .site-header {
 background: #020617;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 border-bottom: 1px solid #1f2937;
 position: sticky;
 top: 0;
 z-index: 10;
 }
 .nav-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
 display: flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: space-between;
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 .brand-title {
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: 0.08em;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 font-size: 0.9rem;
 }
 .brand-tagline { font-size: 0.75rem; color: #9ca3af; }
 .brand-logo { height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px; }
 .nav-links { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; }
 .nav-links a {
 color: #e5e7eb;
 text-decoration: none;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 padding: 0.35rem 0.7rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
 }
 .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }
 .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
 .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }

 @media (max-width: 768px) {
 .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
 .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
 .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
 .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
 }

 .hero {
 padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .hero-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 3fr) minmax(0, 2fr);
 gap: 3rem;
 align-items: center;
 }
 .hero-eyebrow {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.13em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
 }
 .hero-title {
 font-size: clamp(2.1rem, 3vw, 2.7rem);
 font-weight: 750;
 letter-spacing: -0.03em;
 margin-bottom: 1rem;
 }
 .hero-highlight { color: #38bdf8; }
 .hero-body {
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 color: #d1d5db;
 max-width: 32rem;
 margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
 }
 .hero-meta {
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1.25rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 2rem;
 }
 .chip {
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.7);
 }
 .hero-media {
 border-radius: 1.2rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, rgba(56,189,248,0.12), transparent 50%),
 radial-gradient(circle at bottom right, rgba(52,211,153,0.12), transparent 55%);
 padding: 1rem;
 display: flex;
 flex-direction: column;
 gap: 0.75rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .badge-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.5rem; align-items: center; }
 .badge {
 border-radius: 999px;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.7rem;
 font-size: 0.7rem;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.12em;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.8);
 white-space: nowrap;
 }
 .badge-outline { background: transparent; }
 .logo-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; align-items: center; }
 .logo-row img { max-height: 40px; width: auto; }
 .caps-label {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.16em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 }

 .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }
 .section-alt { background: #f3f4f6; }
 .section-inner { max-width: 1120px; margin: 0 auto; }
 .section-header { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; }
 .section-kicker {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.15em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 color: #6b7280;
 margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
 }
 .section-title {
 font-size: 1.8rem;
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: -0.02em;
 margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
 }
 .section-subtitle {
 color: #4b5563;
 max-width: 40rem;
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 }

 .grid-3 {
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0,1fr));
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 @media (max-width: 900px) {
 .hero-inner { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0,1fr)); }
 }
 @media (max-width: 640px) {
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 }

 .card {
 border-radius: 1rem;
 border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 background: #ffffff;
 padding: 1.1rem 1.1rem 1.25rem;
 box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(15,23,42,0.04);
 }
 .card-title {
 font-size: 1rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 margin-bottom: 0.4rem;
 }
 .card-body { font-size: 0.9rem; color: #4b5563; }

 .testimonial-quote { font-style: italic; margin-bottom: 0.4rem; }
 .testimonial-client { font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.2rem; }
 .testimonial-ratings { font-size: 0.8rem; color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.4; }

 .btn {
 display: inline-flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: center;
 gap: 0.4rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.55rem 1.2rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 text-decoration: none;
 border: 1px solid transparent;
 cursor: pointer;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease, border-color 0.15s ease, transform 0.08s ease;
 }
 .btn-primary { background: #38bdf8; color: #020617; border-color: #0ea5e9; }
 .btn-primary:hover { background: #0ea5e9; transform: translateY(-1px); }
 .btn-ghost { background: transparent; color: #111827; border-color: #d1d5db; }
 .btn-ghost:hover { background: #e5e7eb; }

 .site-footer {
 border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 2rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #6b7280;
 background: #f9fafb;
 }
 .footer-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1rem;
 justify-content: space-between;
 }
 .footer-links {
 display: flex;
 gap: 0.9rem;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 }
 .footer-links a {
 color: #6b7280;
 text-decoration: none;
 }
 .footer-links a:hover { text-decoration: underline; }
 .footer-image { max-width: 150px; height: auto; }
 </style>
</head>

Despite strong institutional values, the college lacked a unified structure to manage over $30 million in annual purchasing efficiently and compliantly. Stakeholder feedback revealed: 35% rated procurement efficiency as below average or very inefficient. 82% believed policies and procedures required revision. 45% of purchases bypassed purchase orders, heightening compliance risk. Nearly half of the stakeholders surveyed reported little or no procurement training. The college sought a consulting partner capable of evaluating readiness for change and designing a realistic transformation roadmap grounded in policy compliance and operational data.”"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"“3N Approach and Solution — Guided by O-RAM"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3N deployed its Organizational Readiness Assessment Methodology (O-RAM) to evaluate institutional capacity, identify change barriers, and structure a transformation that could succeed within the existing culture and resources."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"O-RAM Readiness Dimensions Applied:"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Dimension"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Focus"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Key Findings"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Leadership Alignment"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Executive buy-in and strategic goals"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Clear mission alignment with student success but limited cross-departmental governance."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Governance & Controls"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Policy maturity and compliance"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"39 policy areas assessed; 25 lacked definition, exposing audit risks."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"People & Capability"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Organizational structure and training"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Roles overlapped; 41% had no formal procurement training."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Technology & Data"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"System automation and analytics"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"ERP underutilized; manual workarounds caused delays and inconsistency."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Process & Performance"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Efficiency, accountability, and measurement"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Fragmented workflows and absence of standard KPIs."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3N analyzed annual average spend in various dimensions:"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Transformation Framework and Execution"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1. Diagnostic Analysis"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Reviewed 33.5 months of spend and procurement transactions."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Conducted 30 stakeholder interviews and 34 surveys."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Identified over $1.8M in split-purchase activity and $609K in mis-grouped spend."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2. Organizational Readiness Mapping Each department was evaluated across the five O-RAM pillars to determine maturity, adoption risk, and support requirements."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3. Targeted Recommendations 3N created a roadmap that included:"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Centralized procurement structure phased in over 24 months."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Implementation of an eProcurement system (Jaggaer or PeopleSoft SRM)."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"132 automated controls within ERP workflows."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A complete rewrite of policies for COMAR compliance."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"4. Change Enablement and Capability Building 3N embedded training, communication, and performance metrics to ensure readiness and sustainability."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Results Delivered"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Through 3N Consulting’s Organizational Readiness Assessment Methodology (O-RAM), the college achieved a profound shift from fragmented processes to a fully aligned, data-driven procurement function. The initiative advanced procurement maturity from Level 1 (Ad Hoc) to Level 3 (Standardized) with a clear path toward Level 5 (Center of Excellence). In the process, 3N identified $1.2 – $3.7 million in annual savings through vendor consolidation, automation, and policy modernization, while establishing 39 COMAR-aligned policies and a comprehensive eProcurement roadmap for end-to-end digital integration."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"These structural and technological changes directly improved core financial and operational metrics, including days cash on hand, operating margin, net tuition per FTE, purchase-order cycle time, and compliance with state and college regulations. Staff and stakeholder engagement rose sharply as transparency, training, and accountability became embedded in daily operations."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Crucially, the realized savings are being reinvested to expand student opportunity—lowering tuition costs and growing the work-study program by over 40 percent, providing more paid, hands-on learning experiences. Building on this momentum, 3N partnered with the college to scale its Procurement Center of Excellence into a fee-based shared-services model for peer institutions. The initiative is projected to generate six-figure annual revenue and achieve self-funding within 12 months, while offering students ongoing real-world employment pathways."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"For 3N Consulting, this engagement has evolved into a multi-year strategic partnership and a replicable transformation model for other institutions—demonstrating measurable, sustainable impact for both the client and the firm."}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3N Consulting’s Organizational Readiness Assessment Methodology (O-RAM) ensures every engagement translates vision into achievable transformation. Through rigorous analysis, stakeholder partnership, and disciplined execution, 3N consistently delivers exceptional, sustainable results — on time and with measurable impact.”"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":" "}]}]}}],"isAgent":true,"isNameGenerated":true,"isCustomAgent":false,"isUnitTestsAgent":false,"isE2EAgent":false,"autoApply":false},"666c66ff-2b9d-48f8-b824-86dedbf16f14":{"id":"666c66ff-2b9d-48f8-b824-86dedbf16f14","createdAt":1764358184129,"updatedAt":1764360269269,"title":"Menu Update and Consistency","messages":[{"id":"243e4553-ef09-465a-95d6-20094f95aaae","role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I want to first change the name of "Thought Leadership" in the top menu of the home page to "Meet Our Team" and I want that to be consistent in menu among all other pages.  radial-gradient(circle at bottom right, rgba(52,211,153,0.12), transparent 55%);
 padding: 1rem;
 display: flex;
 flex-direction: column;
 gap: 0.75rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .badge-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.5rem; align-items: center; }
 .badge {
 border-radius: 999px;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.7rem;
 font-size: 0.7rem;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.12em;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.8);
 white-space: nowrap;
 }
 .badge-outline { background: transparent; }
 .logo-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; align-items: center; }
 .logo-row img { max-height: 40px; width: auto; }
 .caps-label {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.16em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 }

 .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }
 .section-alt { background: #f3f4f6; }
 .section-inner { max-width: 1120px; margin: 0 auto; }
 .section-header { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; }
 .section-kicker {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.15em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 color: #6b7280;
 margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
 }
 .section-title {
 font-size: 1.8rem;
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: -0.02em;
 margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
 }
 .section-subtitle {
 color: #4b5563;
 max-width: 40rem;
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 }

 .grid-3 {
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0,1fr));
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 @media (max-width: 900px) {
 .hero-inner { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0,1fr)); }
 }
 @media (max-width: 640px) {
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 }

 .card {
 border-radius: 1rem;
 border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 background: #ffffff;
 padding: 1.1rem 1.1rem 1.25rem;
 box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(15,23,42,0.04);
 }
 .card-title {
 font-size: 1rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 margin-bottom: 0.4rem;
 }
 .card-body { font-size: 0.9rem; color: #4b5563; }

 .testimonial-quote { font-style: italic; margin-bottom: 0.4rem; }
 .testimonial-client { font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.2rem; }
 .testimonial-ratings { font-size: 0.8rem; color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.4; }

 .btn {
 display: inline-flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: center;
 gap: 0.4rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.55rem 1.2rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 text-decoration: none;
 border: 1px solid transparent;
 cursor: pointer;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease, border-color 0.15s ease, transform 0.08s ease;
 }
 .btn-primary { background: #38bdf8; color: #020617; border-color: #0ea5e9; }
 .btn-primary:hover { background: #0ea5e9; transform: translateY(-1px); }
 .btn-ghost { background: transparent; color: #111827; border-color: #d1d5db; }
 .btn-ghost:hover { background: #e5e7eb; }

 .site-footer {
 border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 2rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #6b7280;
 background: #f9fafb;
 }
 .footer-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1rem;
 justify-content: space-between;
 }
 .footer-links {
 display: flex;
 gap: 0.9rem;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 }
 .footer-links a {
 color: #6b7280;
 text-decoration: none;
 }
 .footer-links a:hover { text-decoration: underline; }
 .footer-image { max-width: 150px; height: auto; }
 </style>

 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">NMSDC</div>

 <!-- WHY 3N -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">

 <h2 class="section-title">
 Because we maintain integrity. Because we value clients. And because we deliver results.
 </h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our model is built for outcome-based partnerships, true ownership of commitments,
 and a cost structure that puts client value first.
 </p>

 <article class="card">

I want it to the page with the header "Our Team""},{"type":"text","text":"Avoid repeating steps you've already taken."}],"context":{"currentFile":{"path":"index.html","fsPath":"/Users/anupeesay/PycharmProjects/3NWebsite2/index.html","sources":["opened_tab"],"content":"<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
 <meta charset="UTF-8">
 <title>3N Consulting | Results. Delivered.</title>
 <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
 <style>
 /* Inline CSS so this preview actually renders with layout */
 *, *::before, *::after { box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
 html, body {
 font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", sans-serif;
 color: #111827;
 background-color: #f9fafb;
 line-height: 1.6;
 }
 img, video { max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; }
 .site-wrapper { min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; }
 .main { flex: 1; }

 .site-header {
 background: #020617;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 border-bottom: 1px solid #1f2937;
 position: sticky;
 top: 0;
 z-index: 10;
 }
 .nav-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
 display: flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: space-between;
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 .brand-title {
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: 0.08em;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 font-size: 0.9rem;
 }
 .brand-tagline { font-size: 0.75rem; color: #9ca3af; }
 .brand-logo { height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px; }
 .nav-links { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; }
 .nav-links a {
 color: #e5e7eb;
 text-decoration: none;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 padding: 0.35rem 0.7rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
 }
 .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }
 .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
 .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }

 @media (max-width: 768px) {
 .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
 .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
 .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
 .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
 }

 .hero {
 padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .hero-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 3fr) minmax(0, 2fr);
 gap: 3rem;
 align-items: center;
 }
 .hero-eyebrow {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.13em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
 }
 .hero-title {
 font-size: clamp(2.1rem, 3vw, 2.7rem);
 font-weight: 750;
 letter-spacing: -0.03em;
 margin-bottom: 1rem;
 }
 .hero-highlight { color: #38bdf8; }
 .hero-body {
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 color: #d1d5db;
 max-width: 32rem;
 margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
 }
 .hero-meta {
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1.25rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 margin-bottom: 2rem;
 }
 .chip {
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.7);
 }
 .hero-media {
 border-radius: 1.2rem;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, rgba(56,189,248,0.12), transparent 50%),
 radial-gradient(circle at bottom right, rgba(52,211,153,0.12), transparent 55%);
 padding: 1rem;
 display: flex;
 flex-direction: column;
 gap: 0.75rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 color: #e5e7eb;
 }
 .badge-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.5rem; align-items: center; }
 .badge {
 border-radius: 999px;
 border: 1px solid #1f2937;
 padding: 0.25rem 0.7rem;
 font-size: 0.7rem;
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.12em;
 background: rgba(15,23,42,0.8);
 white-space: nowrap;
 }
 .badge-outline { background: transparent; }
 .logo-row { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; align-items: center; }
 .logo-row img { max-height: 40px; width: auto; }
 .caps-label {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.16em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 color: #9ca3af;
 }

 .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }
 .section-alt { background: #f3f4f6; }
 .section-inner { max-width: 1120px; margin: 0 auto; }
 .section-header { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; }
 .section-kicker {
 text-transform: uppercase;
 letter-spacing: 0.15em;
 font-size: 0.75rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 color: #6b7280;
 margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
 }
 .section-title {
 font-size: 1.8rem;
 font-weight: 700;
 letter-spacing: -0.02em;
 margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
 }
 .section-subtitle {
 color: #4b5563;
 max-width: 40rem;
 font-size: 0.98rem;
 }

 .grid-3 {
 display: grid;
 grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0,1fr));
 gap: 1.5rem;
 }
 @media (max-width: 900px) {
 .hero-inner { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0,1fr)); }
 }
 @media (max-width: 640px) {
 .grid-3 { grid-template-columns: minmax(0,1fr); }
 }

 .card {
 border-radius: 1rem;
 border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 background: #ffffff;
 padding: 1.1rem 1.1rem 1.25rem;
 box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(15,23,42,0.04);
 }
 .card-title {
 font-size: 1rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 margin-bottom: 0.4rem;
 }
 .card-body { font-size: 0.9rem; color: #4b5563; }

 .testimonial-quote { font-style: italic; margin-bottom: 0.4rem; }
 .testimonial-client { font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.2rem; }
 .testimonial-ratings { font-size: 0.8rem; color: #4b5563; line-height: 1.4; }

 .btn {
 display: inline-flex;
 align-items: center;
 justify-content: center;
 gap: 0.4rem;
 border-radius: 999px;
 padding: 0.55rem 1.2rem;
 font-size: 0.85rem;
 font-weight: 600;
 text-decoration: none;
 border: 1px solid transparent;
 cursor: pointer;
 transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease, border-color 0.15s ease, transform 0.08s ease;
 }
 .btn-primary { background: #38bdf8; color: #020617; border-color: #0ea5e9; }
 .btn-primary:hover { background: #0ea5e9; transform: translateY(-1px); }
 .btn-ghost { background: transparent; color: #111827; border-color: #d1d5db; }
 .btn-ghost:hover { background: #e5e7eb; }

 .site-footer {
 border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
 padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 2rem;
 font-size: 0.8rem;
 color: #6b7280;
 background: #f9fafb;
 }
 .footer-inner {
 max-width: 1120px;
 margin: 0 auto;
 display: flex;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 gap: 1rem;
 justify-content: space-between;
 }
 .footer-links {
 display: flex;
 gap: 0.9rem;
 flex-wrap: wrap;
 }
 .footer-links a {
 color: #6b7280;
 text-decoration: none;
 }
 .footer-links a:hover { text-decoration: underline; }
 .footer-image { max-width: 150px; height: auto; }
 </style>
</head>
<body>
<div class="site-wrapper">
 <header class="site-header">
 <div class="nav-inner">
 <div class="brand">
 <img src="images/3nlogo.png" alt="3N Consulting Logo" style="height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px;">
 </div>
 <button class="nav-toggle" aria-label="Toggle navigation">☰</button>
 <nav class="nav-links">
 <a href="#" class="active">Home</a>
 <a href="about.html">About Us</a>
 <a href="services.html">Service Lines</a>
 <a href="careers.html">Careers</a>
 <a href="contact.html">Contact Us</a>
 <a href="thought-leadership.html">Thought Leadership</a>
 <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
 </nav>
 </div>
 </header>

 <main class="main">
 <!-- HERO -->
 <section class="hero">
 <div class="hero-inner">
 <div>
 <div class="hero-eyebrow">Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes</div>
 <h1 class="hero-title">
 Results. <span class="hero-highlight">Delivered.</span>
 </h1>
 <p class="hero-body">
 3N Consulting is a Maryland-based management consulting firm that
 builds long-term partnerships, takes ownership of outcomes, and
 practices frugality so savings flow to clients.
 </p>
 <div class="hero-meta">
 <span class="chip">Certified MD Minority Business Enterprise (MBE)</span>
 <span class="chip">Small Business Reserve (SBR) Program</span>
 <span class="chip">NMSDC Certified MBE</span>
 </div>
 <div class="hero-cta">
 <a href="#" class="btn btn-primary">Discuss your initiative →</a>
 <a href="case-studies.html" class="btn btn-ghost">View recent case studies</a>
 </div>
 </div>

 <aside class="hero-media">
 <div class="caps-label">Our work in motion</div>
 <div style="background:#020617;border-radius:0.9rem;padding:1.5rem;text-align:center;font-size:0.85rem;color:#9ca3af;">
 Video / animation placeholder
 </div>
 <div class="badge-row">
 <span class="badge">MD MBE • SBR</span>
 <span class="badge badge-outline">NMSDC Certified MBE</span>
 </div>
 <div class="logo-row">
 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">MD MBE</div>
 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">NMSDC</div>
 </div>
 <p style="font-size:0.8rem; color:#9ca3af;">
 Proud to support Maryland's public agencies, colleges, and communities.
 </p>
 </aside>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- WHY 3N -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Why 3N Consulting?</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">
 Because we maintain integrity. Because we value clients. And because we deliver results.
 </h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our model is built for outcome-based partnerships, true ownership of commitments,
 and a cost structure that puts client value first.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Vested in client success</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Vested in Client Success:</strong> Outcome-based partnerships and long-term relationships.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Ownership</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Ownership:</strong> We don't "staff"—we own results and keep our commitments.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Cost structure</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Cost Structure:</strong> Frugal by design—invest in talent, minimize overhead, pass savings on.
 </p>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- TESTIMONIALS -->
 <section class="section">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header" style="display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:baseline;gap:0.75rem;flex-wrap:wrap;">
 <div>
 <div class="section-kicker">Client testimonials</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">What our clients say</h2>
 </div>
 <a href="case-studies.html" class="btn btn-ghost">Recent case studies →</a>
 </div>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our performance is continuously evaluated. Below are excerpts from formal client satisfaction surveys.
 </p>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <div class="testimonial-client">State Education Agency ~ Project Executive</div>
 <p class="testimonial-quote">
 "3N delivered tremendous value"
 </p>
 <div class="testimonial-ratings">
 <strong>Client Satisfaction Survey Rating:</strong><br>
 Quality of Work: "Exceptional"<br>
 Management Team: "Exceptional"<br>
 Cost Control: "Exceptional"<br>
 Schedule Management: "Very Good"
 </div>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <div class="testimonial-client">State Treasurer's Office ~ Deputy State Treasurer</div>
 <p class="testimonial-quote">
 "Their communication was fantastic"
 </p>
 <div class="testimonial-ratings">
 <strong>Client Satisfaction Survey Rating:</strong><br>
 Quality of Work: "Very Good"<br>
 Management Team: "Exceptional"<br>
 Cost Control: "Exceptional"<br>
 Schedule Management: "Exceptional"
 </div>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <div class="testimonial-client">
 CEO, Cosmetics, Health and Beauty Products Manufacturing firm
 </div>
 <p class="testimonial-quote">
 "We would highly recommend them to others"
 </p>
 <div class="testimonial-ratings">
 <strong>Client Satisfaction Survey Rating:</strong><br>
 Quality of Work: "Exceptional"<br>
 Management Team: "Very Good"<br>
 Cost Control: "Exceptional"<br>
 Schedule Management: "Exceptional"
 </div>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- CAPABILITIES -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Capabilities</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">Core areas where we deliver results</h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 These capability areas link into your service lines and toolkits, supported by
 proven methods like O-RAM and AAA.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <a href="organizational-redesign.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Organizational Redesign</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 Align structure, people, and processes for resilience and agility.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <a href="strategy-operations.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Strategy & Operations</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 Corporate strategy. Interim management. Lean improvements that minimize waste and maximize efficiency.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <a href="data-analytics.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Data Analytics</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 Frameworks & dashboards that uncover patterns and predict trends.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <a href="digital-transformation.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Digital Transformation</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 From legacy modernization to AI—reduce the ~70% failure risk with alignment.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <a href="human-capital.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Human Capital & Change Management</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 Strengthen engagement, accelerate adoption, and lead with purpose.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- SOLUTIONS -->
 <section class="section">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Productized solution offerings</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">Solutions we can rapidly deploy</h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Solutions we can rapidly deploy through assets developed over years of
 knowledge and experience—in procurement, manufacturing, and technology.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title"><a href="manufacturing.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">Manufacturing</a></h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 Planning, operations, and process redesign for manufacturers seeking to
 scale while maintaining service and quality.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title"><a href="cio-services.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">CIO Services</a></h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 Portfolio rationalization, IT strategy, and value-focused technology
 investment for public sector and mid-market organizations.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title"><a href="procurement.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">Procurement</a></h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 A structured procurement solution to unlock savings, improve compliance,
 and turn purchasing into a strategic advantage.
 </p>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>
 </main>

 <!-- WHY 3N -->
 <section class="section">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Why 3N Consulting</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">Clarity, Control, and Measurable Impact</h2>
 </div>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 3N's CIO Services are designed for leaders who demand clarity, control, and measurable impact from their technology investments. We go beyond benchmarking—we build a foundation for modernization that is both strategic and executable.
 </p>
 <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 1rem;">
 Our approach bridges the gap between business and IT, combining consulting rigor with technical depth to deliver sustained results.
 </p>
 <p class="section-subtitle" style="margin-top: 1rem;">
 At 3N Consulting, CIO Services means smarter spend, simpler portfolios, and stronger performance.
 </p>

 <div style="margin-top: 2rem;">
 <a href="contact.html" class="btn btn-primary">Discuss your CIO strategy →</a>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>
 </main>

 <footer class="site-footer">
 <div class="footer-inner">
 <div>
 <div><strong>Results. Delivered.</strong> Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes.</div>
 <div style="margin-top:0.4rem; font-size:0.85rem;">
 We build long-term partnerships, take ownership of outcomes, and practice frugality so savings flow to clients.
 </div>
 <div style="margin-top:0.75rem; font-size:0.85rem;">
 <strong>Phone:</strong> (301) 723-7057<br>
 <strong>Address:</strong> 6710A Rockledge Drive, Bethesda, MD 20817
 </div>
 </div>

 - about.html
 - careers.html 
 - services.html
 - contact.html
 - case-studies.html

 - solutions.html

 - dyan-sellers.html

- ✅ All navigation links now display "Meet Our Team"

- ✅ Both header and footer navigation updated where applicable
- ✅ Consistent capitalization maintained throughout ("Meet Our Team")

<div class="site-wrapper">
 <header class="site-header">
 <div class="nav-inner">
 <div class="brand">
 <img src="images/3nlogo.png" alt="3N Consulting Logo" style="height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px;">
 </div>
 <button class="nav-toggle" aria-label="Toggle navigation">☰</button>
 <nav class="nav-links">
 <a href="#" class="active">Home</a>

 <a href="contact.html">Contact Us</a>
 <a href="thought-leadership.html">Meet Our Team</a>
 <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
 </nav>
 </div>
 </header>

 <main class="main">
 <!-- HERO -->
 <section class="hero">
 <div class="hero-inner">
 <div>
 <div class="hero-eyebrow">Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes</div>
 <h1 class="hero-title">
 Results. <span class="hero-highlight">Delivered.</span>
 </h1>
 <p class="hero-body">
 3N Consulting is a Maryland-based management consulting firm that
 builds long-term partnerships, takes ownership of outcomes, and
 practices frugality so savings flow to clients.
 </p>
 <div class="hero-meta">
 <span class="chip">Certified MD Minority Business Enterprise (MBE)</span>
 <span class="chip">Small Business Reserve (SBR) Program</span>
 <span class="chip">NMSDC Certified MBE</span>
 </div>
 <div class="hero-cta">
 <a href="#" class="btn btn-primary">Discuss your initiative →</a>
 <a href="case-studies.html" class="btn btn-ghost">View recent case studies</a>
 </div>
 </div>

 <aside class="hero-media">
 <div class="caps-label">Our work in motion</div>
 <div style="background:#020617;border-radius:0.9rem;padding:1.5rem;text-align:center;font-size:0.85rem;color:#9ca3af;">
 Video / animation placeholder
 </div>
 <div class="badge-row">
 <span class="badge">MD MBE • SBR</span>
 <span class="badge badge-outline">NMSDC Certified MBE</span>
 </div>
 <div class="logo-row">
 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">MD MBE</div>
 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">NMSDC</div>
 </div>
 <p style="font-size:0.8rem; color:#9ca3af;">
 Proud to support Maryland's public agencies, colleges, and communities.
 </p>
 </aside>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- WHY 3N -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Why 3N Consulting?</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">
 Because we maintain integrity. Because we value clients. And because we deliver results.
 </h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our model is built for outcome-based partnerships, true ownership of commitments,
 and a cost structure that puts client value first.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Vested in client success</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Vested in Client Success:</strong> Outcome-based partnerships and long-term relationships.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Ownership</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Ownership:</strong> We don't "staff"—we own results and keep our commitments.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Cost structure</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Cost Structure:</strong> Frugal by design—invest in talent, minimize overhead, pass savings on.
 </p>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- TESTIMONIALS -->
 <section class="section">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header" style="display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:baseline;gap:0.75rem;flex-wrap:wrap;">
 <div>
 <div class="section-kicker">Client testimonials</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">What our clients say</h2>
 </div>
 <a href="case-studies.html" class="btn btn-ghost">Recent case studies →</a>
 </div>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our performance is continuously evaluated. Below are excerpts from formal client satisfaction surveys.
 </p>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <div class="testimonial-client">State Education Agency ~ Project Executive</div>
 <p class="testimonial-quote">
 "3N delivered tremendous value"
 </p>
 <div class="testimonial-ratings">
 <strong>Client Satisfaction Survey Rating:</strong><br>
 Quality of Work: "Exceptional"<br>
 Management Team: "Exceptional"<br>
 Cost Control: "Exceptional"<br>
 Schedule Management: "Very Good"
 </div>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <div class="testimonial-client">State Treasurer's Office ~ Deputy State Treasurer</div>
 <p class="testimonial-quote">
 "Their communication was fantastic"
 </p>
 <div class="testimonial-ratings">
 <strong>Client Satisfaction Survey Rating:</strong><br>
 Quality of Work: "Very Good"<br>
 Management Team: "Exceptional"<br>
 Cost Control: "Exceptional"<br>
 Schedule Management: "Exceptional"
 </div>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <div class="testimonial-client">
 CEO, Cosmetics, Health and Beauty Products Manufacturing firm
 </div>
 <p class="testimonial-quote">
 "We would highly recommend them to others"
 </p>
 <div class="testimonial-ratings">
 <strong>Client Satisfaction Survey Rating:</strong><br>
 Quality of Work: "Exceptional"<br>
 Management Team: "Very Good"<br>
 Cost Control: "Exceptional"<br>
 Schedule Management: "Exceptional"
 </div>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- CAPABILITIES -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Capabilities</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">Core areas where we deliver results</h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 These capability areas link into your service lines and toolkits, supported by
 proven methods like O-RAM and AAA.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <a href="organizational-redesign.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Organizational Redesign</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 Align structure, people, and processes for resilience and agility.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <a href="strategy-operations.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Strategy & Operations</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 Corporate strategy. Interim management. Lean improvements that minimize waste and maximize efficiency.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <a href="data-analytics.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Data Analytics</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 Frameworks & dashboards that uncover patterns and predict trends.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <a href="digital-transformation.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Digital Transformation</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 From legacy modernization to AI—reduce the ~70% failure risk with alignment.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <a href="human-capital.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">
 <div class="card-title">Human Capital & Change Management</div>
 <p class="card-body">
 Strengthen engagement, accelerate adoption, and lead with purpose.
 </p>
 </a>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>

 <!-- SOLUTIONS -->
 <section class="section">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Productized solution offerings</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">Solutions we can rapidly deploy</h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Solutions we can rapidly deploy through assets developed over years of
 knowledge and experience—in procurement, manufacturing, and technology.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title"><a href="manufacturing.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">Manufacturing</a></h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 Planning, operations, and process redesign for manufacturers seeking to
 scale while maintaining service and quality.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title"><a href="cio-services.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">CIO Services</a></h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 Portfolio rationalization, IT strategy, and value-focused technology
 investment for public sector and mid-market organizations.
 </p>
 </article>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title"><a href="procurement.html" style="text-decoration: none; color: inherit;">Procurement</a></h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 A structured procurement solution to unlock savings, improve compliance,
 and turn purchasing into a strategic advantage.
 </p>
 </article>
 </div>
 </div>
 </section>
 </main>

 <footer class="site-footer">
 <div class="footer-inner">
 <div>

 <div style="margin-top:0.4rem; font-size:0.85rem;">
 We build long-term partnerships, take ownership of outcomes, and practice frugality so savings flow to clients.
 </div>
 <div style="margin-top:0.75rem; font-size:0.85rem;">

</script>

+ .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }
+
+ @media (max-width: 768px) {
+ .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
+ .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
+ .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
+ .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
+ }
+
+ .hero {
+ padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
+ background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
+ color: #e5e7eb;
+ }
+ .hero-inner {
+ max-width: 1120px;
+ margin: 0 auto;
+ display: grid;
+ grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 1fr);
+ gap: 3rem;
+ align-items: center;
+ }
+ .hero-eyebrow {
+ text-transform: uppercase;
+ letter-spacing: 0.13em;
+ font-size: 0.75rem;
+ color: #9ca3af;
+ margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
+ }
+ .hero-title {
+ font-size: clamp(2.1rem, 3vw, 2.7rem);
+ font-weight: 750;
+ letter-spacing: -0.03em;
+ margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
+ }
+ .hero-subtitle {
+ font-size: 1.3rem;
+ color: #38bdf8;
+ font-weight: 600;
+ margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
+ }
+ .hero-body {
+ font-size: 0.98rem;
+ color: #d1d5db;
+ max-width: 48rem;
+ margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
+ }
+
+ .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }
+ .section-alt { background: #f3f4f6; }
+ .section-inner { max-width: 1120px; margin: 0 auto; }
+ .section-header { margin-bottom: 2rem; }
+ .section-kicker {
+ text-transform: uppercase;
+ letter-spacing: 0.15em;
+ font-size: 0.75rem;
+ font-weight: 600;
+ color: #6b7280;
+ margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
+ }
+ .section-title {
+ font-size: 1.8rem;
+ font-weight: 700;
+ letter-spacing: -0.02em;
+ margin-bottom: 1rem;
+ }
+ .section-subtitle {
+ color: #4b5563;
+ max-width: 48rem;
+ font-size: 0.98rem;
+ line-height: 1.8;
+ }
+ 
+ .content-block {
+ color: #4b5563;
+ font-size: 0.98rem;
+ line-height: 1.8;
+ margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
+ }
+
+ .bio-section {
+ color: #4b5563;
+ font-size: 0.98rem;
+ line-height: 1.8;
+ max-width: 48rem;
+ }
+ 
+ .bio-section p {
+ margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
+ }
+
+ .cta-section {
+ text-align: center;
+ padding: 2rem;
+ background: #f3f4f6;
+ border-radius: 1rem;
+ margin-top: 3rem;
+ }
+
+ .btn {
+ display: inline-flex;
+ align-items: center;
+ justify-content: center;
+ gap: 0.4rem;
+ border-radius: 999px;
+ padding: 0.55rem 1.2rem;
+ font-size: 0.85rem;
+ font-weight: 600;
+ text-decoration: none;
+ border: 1px solid transparent;
+ cursor: pointer;
+ transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease, border-color 0.15s ease, transform 0.08s ease;
+ }
+ .btn-primary { background: #38bdf8; color: #020617; border-color: #0ea5e9; }
+ .btn-primary:hover { background: #0ea5e9; transform: translateY(-1px); }
+
+ .site-footer {
+ border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
+ padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 2rem;
+ font-size: 0.8rem;
+ color: #6b7280;
+ background: #f9fafb;
+ margin-top: 2rem;
+ }
+ .footer-inner {
+ max-width: 1120px;
+ margin: 0 auto;
+ display: flex;
+ flex-wrap: wrap;
+ gap: 1rem;
+ justify-content: space-between;
+ }
+ .footer-links {
+ display: flex;
+ gap: 0.9rem;
+ flex-wrap: wrap;
+ }
+ .footer-links a {
+ color: #6b7280;
+ text-decoration: none;
+ }
+ .footer-links a:hover { text-decoration: underline; }
+ .footer-image { max-width: 150px; height: auto; }
+
+ @media (max-width: 768px) {
+ .hero { padding: 3rem 1.5rem 2rem; }
+ .section { padding: 2rem 1.5rem; }
+ }

+<body>
+<div class="site-wrapper">
+ <header class="site-header">
+ <div class="nav-inner">
+ <div class="brand">
+ <img src="images/3nlogo.png" alt="3N Consulting Logo" style="height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px;">
+ </div>
+ <button class="nav-toggle" aria-label="Toggle navigation">☰</button>
+ <nav class="nav-links">
+ <a href="index.html">Home</a>
+ <a href="about.html">About Us</a>
+ <a href="services.html">Service Lines</a>
+ <a href="careers.html">Careers</a>
+ <a href="contact.html">Contact Us</a>
+ <a href="thought-leadership.html" class="active">Meet Our Team</a>
+ <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
+ </nav>
+ </div>
+ </header>
+
+ <main class="main">
+ <!-- HERO -->
+ <section class="hero">
+ <div class="hero-inner">
+ <div>
+ <div class="hero-eyebrow">Meet Our Team</div>
+ <h1 class="hero-title">Soorya Rajendran</h1>
+ <div class="hero-subtitle">Business Analyst</div>
+ <p class="hero-body">
+ Bachelor of Science in Computer Science | Data-Driven Research Specialist | Education & Public-Sector Focus
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- BIOGRAPHY SECTION -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">About Soorya</h2>
+ </div>
+ <div class="bio-section">
+ <p>
+ Soorya Rajendran is a Business Analyst at 3N Consulting who specializes in data-driven research, stakeholder engagement, and organizational assessment for education and public-sector initiatives. He brings an analytical and structured approach to helping institutions improve performance, strengthen collaboration, and make evidence-based decisions aligned with their strategic objectives.
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ At 3N, Soorya contributes to statewide projects that enhance operational efficiency, policy development, and institutional planning. His work involves synthesizing large volumes of qualitative and quantitative input into clear insights that guide leadership priorities and improve accountability. He is recognized for his ability to translate complex data into accessible, actionable strategies that inform decision-making across diverse stakeholders.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- BACKGROUND SECTION -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Background & Expertise</h2>
+ </div>
+ <div class="bio-section">
+ <p>
+ A Maryland native, Soorya holds a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from Mount St. Mary's University. His work reflects a strong commitment to public impact—applying analytical rigor, clarity, and stakeholder alignment to help strengthen Maryland's education and governance systems.
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ <strong>Core Competencies:</strong> Data analysis and visualization, stakeholder engagement, organizational assessment, policy analysis, research synthesis, and strategic planning for education and public-sector organizations.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- CTA SECTION -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="cta-section">
+ <h3 style="font-size: 1.3rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;">Ready to Drive Data-Informed Change?</h3>
+ <p style="margin-bottom: 1.5rem; color: #4b5563;">Let's discuss how strategic analysis and stakeholder engagement can strengthen your organization.</p>
+ <a href="contact.html" class="btn btn-primary">Contact Us →</a>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+ </main>
+
+ <footer class="site-footer">
+ <div class="footer-inner">
+ <div style="flex: 1; min-width: 200px;">
+ <div style="font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">3N Consulting</div>
+ <p style="color: #6b7280;">Results. Delivered.</p>
+ </div>
+ <div class="footer-links">
+ <a href="index.html">Home</a>
+ <a href="about.html">About</a>
+ <a href="services.html">Services</a>
+ <a href="contact.html">Contact</a>
+ <a href="thought-leadership.html">Meet Our Team</a>
+ <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ <div style="text-align: center; margin-top: 1.5rem; padding-top: 1.5rem; border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb; color: #9ca3af;">
+ <p>© 2024 3N Consulting. All rights reserved.</p>
+ </div>
+ </footer>
+</div>

<div class="site-wrapper">

 Results. <span class="hero-highlight">Delivered.</span>

 3N Consulting is a Maryland-based management consulting firm that
 builds long-term partnerships, takes ownership of outcomes, and
 practices frugality so savings flow to clients.

 <div style="height:40px;width:80px;border-radius:0.5rem;border:1px dashed #1f2937;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:0.7rem;">NMSDC</div>
 </div>
 <p style="font-size:0.8rem; color:#9ca3af;">
 Proud to support Maryland's public agencies, colleges, and communities.
 </p>

 <!-- WHY 3N -->
 <section class="section section-alt">
 <div class="section-inner">
 <div class="section-header">
 <div class="section-kicker">Why 3N Consulting?</div>
 <h2 class="section-title">
 Because we maintain integrity. Because we value clients. And because we deliver results.
 </h2>
 <p class="section-subtitle">
 Our model is built for outcome-based partnerships, true ownership of commitments,
 and a cost structure that puts client value first.
 </p>
 </div>

 <div class="grid-3">
 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Vested in client success</h3>

 <article class="card">

 <p class="card-body">

 </p>

 <article class="card">
 <h3 class="card-title">Cost structure</h3>
 <p class="card-body">
 <strong>Cost Structure:</strong> Frugal by design—invest in talent, minimize overhead, pass savings on.
 </p>
 </article>

+<body>
+<div class="site-wrapper">
+ <header class="site-header">
+ <div class="nav-inner">
+ <div class="brand">
+ <img src="images/3nlogo.png" alt="3N Consulting Logo" style="height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px;">
+ </div>

+ <nav class="nav-links">
+ <a href="index.html">Home</a>

+ <a href="careers.html">Careers</a>
+ <a href="contact.html">Contact Us</a>
+ <a href="thought-leadership.html" class="active">Meet Our Team</a>
+ <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
+ </nav>
+ </div>
+ </header>
+
+ <main class="main">
+ <!-- HERO -->
+ <section class="hero">
+ <div class="hero-inner">
+ <div>
+ <div class="hero-eyebrow">Meet Our Team</div>
+ <h1 class="hero-title">Dhatri Mulpuri</h1>
+ <div class="hero-subtitle">Data Analyst</div>
+ <p class="hero-body">
+ Master of Science in Data Intelligence | 5+ Years of Experience | Data Analytics & Engineering Specialist
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- BIOGRAPHY SECTION -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">About Dhatri</h2>
+ </div>
+ <div class="bio-section">
+ <p>
+ Dhatri Mulpuri is a Data Analyst at 3N Consulting, where she transforms complex datasets into meaningful insights that drive smarter decisions and measurable performance improvement. With a background spanning data engineering, analytics, and cloud technologies, she brings both technical depth and strategic perspective to every engagement. Her work supports 3N's mission of helping public institutions and businesses achieve clarity, efficiency, and results through evidence-based management.
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ Dhatri's experience includes designing analytical models, developing dashboards, and integrating data-driven insights into organizational planning and performance assessment. Her approach blends technical precision with a strong understanding of business context—helping leaders connect metrics to mission and identify opportunities for improvement and innovation.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- EXPERTISE & BACKGROUND SECTION -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Expertise & Professional Background</h2>
+ </div>
+ <div class="bio-section">
+ <p>
+ She holds a <strong>Master of Science in Data Intelligence</strong> from the University of South Florida and has over five years of professional experience in data analytics and engineering, including prior work as a Specialist Programmer at a global IT firm. 
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ <strong>Core Competencies:</strong> Data analytics and modeling, dashboard development, data engineering, cloud technologies, business intelligence, performance assessment, organizational planning, and evidence-based decision-making.
+ </p>
+ <p>
+ Dedicated to continuous learning and public value, Dhatri exemplifies 3N Consulting's commitment to excellence, transparency, and impact through data.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- CTA SECTION -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="cta-section">
+ <h3 style="font-size: 1.3rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;">Ready to Turn Data Into Insights?</h3>
+ <p style="margin-bottom: 1.5rem; color: #4b5563;">Let's discuss how data-driven analysis and strategic planning can transform your organization's performance.</p>
+ <a href="contact.html" class="btn btn-primary">Contact Us →</a>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+ </main>
+
+ <footer class="site-footer">
+ <div class="footer-inner">
+ <div style="flex: 1; min-width: 200px;">
+ <div style="font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">3N Consulting</div>
+ <p style="color: #6b7280;">Results. Delivered.</p>
+ </div>
+ <div class="footer-links">
+ <a href="index.html">Home</a>
+ <a href="about.html">About</a>
+ <a href="services.html">Services</a>
+ <a href="contact.html">Contact</a>
+ <a href="thought-leadership.html">Meet Our Team</a>
+ <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>

+ <p>© 2024 3N Consulting. All rights reserved.</p>
+ </div>
+ </footer>
+</div>

+ img, video { max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; }
+ .site-wrapper { min-height: 100vh; display: flex; flex-direction: column; }
+ .main { flex: 1; }
+
+ .site-header {
+ background: #020617;
+ color: #e5e7eb;
+ border-bottom: 1px solid #1f2937;
+ position: sticky;
+ top: 0;
+ z-index: 10;
+ }
+ .nav-inner {
+ max-width: 1120px;
+ margin: 0 auto;
+ padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
+ display: flex;
+ align-items: center;
+ justify-content: space-between;
+ gap: 1.5rem;
+ }
+ .brand-title {
+ font-weight: 700;
+ letter-spacing: 0.08em;
+ text-transform: uppercase;
+ font-size: 0.9rem;
+ }
+ .brand-tagline { font-size: 0.75rem; color: #9ca3af; }
+ .brand-logo { height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px; }
+ .nav-links { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.75rem; }
+ .nav-links a {
+ color: #e5e7eb;
+ text-decoration: none;
+ font-size: 0.85rem;
+ padding: 0.35rem 0.7rem;
+ border-radius: 999px;
+ transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease;
+ }
+ .nav-links a:hover { background: #111827; }
+ .nav-links a.active { background: #e5e7eb; color: #020617; }
+ .nav-toggle { display: none; border: none; background: transparent; color: #e5e7eb; font-size: 1.3rem; }
+
+ @media (max-width: 768px) {
+ .nav-inner { flex-wrap: wrap; }
+ .nav-toggle { display: block; margin-left: auto; }
+ .nav-links { width: 100%; display: none; padding-top: 0.5rem; }
+ .nav-links.show { display: flex; }
+ }
+
+ .hero {
+ padding: 4rem 1.5rem 3rem;
+ background: radial-gradient(circle at top left, #0f172a 0, #020617 45%, #020617 100%);
+ color: #e5e7eb;
+ }
+ .hero-inner {
+ max-width: 1120px;
+ margin: 0 auto;
+ display: grid;
+ grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 1fr);
+ gap: 3rem;
+ align-items: center;
+ }
+ .hero-eyebrow {
+ text-transform: uppercase;
+ letter-spacing: 0.13em;
+ font-size: 0.75rem;
+ color: #9ca3af;
+ margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
+ }
+ .hero-title {
+ font-size: clamp(2.1rem, 3vw, 2.7rem);
+ font-weight: 750;
+ letter-spacing: -0.03em;
+ margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
+ }
+ .hero-body {
+ font-size: 0.98rem;
+ color: #d1d5db;
+ max-width: 48rem;
+ margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
+ }
+
+ .section { padding: 3rem 1.5rem; }
+ .section-alt { background: #f3f4f6; }
+ .section-inner { max-width: 1120px; margin: 0 auto; }
+ .section-header { margin-bottom: 2rem; }
+ .section-kicker {
+ text-transform: uppercase;
+ letter-spacing: 0.15em;
+ font-size: 0.75rem;
+ font-weight: 600;
+ color: #6b7280;
+ margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
+ }
+ .section-title {
+ font-size: 1.8rem;
+ font-weight: 700;
+ letter-spacing: -0.02em;
+ margin-bottom: 1rem;
+ }
+ .section-subtitle {
+ color: #4b5563;
+ max-width: 48rem;
+ font-size: 0.98rem;
+ line-height: 1.8;
+ }
+ 
+ .grid-2 {
+ display: grid;
+ grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(280px, 1fr));
+ gap: 2rem;
+ margin-top: 2rem;
+ }
+
+ .toolkit-card {
+ border-radius: 1.2rem;
+ border: 2px solid #38bdf8;
+ background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f0f9ff 0%, #e0f2fe 100%);
+ padding: 2.5rem;
+ box-shadow: 0 12px 30px rgba(56, 189, 248, 0.12);
+ transition: transform 0.15s ease, box-shadow 0.15s ease;
+ position: relative;
+ overflow: hidden;
+ }
+
+ .toolkit-card::before {
+ content: '';
+ position: absolute;
+ top: 0;
+ right: 0;
+ width: 100px;
+ height: 100px;
+ background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(56, 189, 248, 0.15), transparent);
+ border-radius: 50%;
+ margin: -50px -50px 0 0;
+ }
+
+ .toolkit-card:hover {
+ transform: translateY(-4px);
+ box-shadow: 0 16px 40px rgba(56, 189, 248, 0.2);
+ }
+
+ .toolkit-card-icon {
+ font-size: 2.5rem;
+ margin-bottom: 1rem;
+ }
+
+ .toolkit-card-title {
+ font-size: 1.4rem;
+ font-weight: 700;
+ color: #020617;
+ margin-bottom: 1rem;
+ letter-spacing: -0.02em;
+ }
+
+ .toolkit-card-description {
+ color: #4b5563;
+ font-size: 0.98rem;
+ line-height: 1.8;
+ margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
+ position: relative;
+ z-index: 1;
+ }
+
+ .toolkit-highlights {
+ position: relative;
+ z-index: 1;
+ }
+
+ .toolkit-highlights ul {
+ list-style: none;
+ padding: 0;
+ margin: 0;
+ }
+
+ .toolkit-highlights li {
+ padding: 0.5rem 0 0.5rem 1.8rem;
+ color: #4b5563;
+ font-size: 0.9rem;
+ position: relative;
+ }
+
+ .toolkit-highlights li::before {
+ content: '→';
+ position: absolute;
+ left: 0;
+ color: #38bdf8;
+ font-weight: 600;
+ }
+
+ .btn {
+ display: inline-flex;
+ align-items: center;
+ justify-content: center;
+ gap: 0.4rem;
+ border-radius: 999px;
+ padding: 0.55rem 1.2rem;
+ font-size: 0.85rem;
+ font-weight: 600;
+ text-decoration: none;
+ border: 1px solid transparent;
+ cursor: pointer;
+ transition: background 0.15s ease, color 0.15s ease, border-color 0.15s ease, transform 0.08s ease;

+ .btn-primary { background: #38bdf8; color: #020617; border-color: #0ea5e9; }

+ .cta-section {

+ padding: 2rem;
+ background: #f3f4f6;
+ border-radius: 1rem;

+ }
+
+ .site-footer {
+ border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
+ padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 2rem;
+ font-size: 0.8rem;
+ color: #6b7280;
+ background: #f9fafb;

+ .footer-inner {
+ max-width: 1120px;

+ display: flex;
+ gap: 0.9rem;
+ flex-wrap: wrap;
+ }
+ .footer-links a {
+ color: #6b7280;
+ text-decoration: none;
+ }

+
+ @media (max-width: 768px) {
+ .hero { padding: 3rem 1.5rem 2rem; }
+ .section { padding: 2rem 1.5rem; }
+ .grid-2 { grid-template-columns: minmax(0, 1fr); }
+ .toolkit-card { padding: 1.8rem; }
+ }
+ </style>
+</head>
+<body>
+<div class="site-wrapper">
+ <header class="site-header">
+ <div class="nav-inner">
+ <div class="brand">
+ <img src="images/3nlogo.png" alt="3N Consulting Logo" style="height: 70px; width: auto; max-width: 250px;">
+ </div>
+ <button class="nav-toggle" aria-label="Toggle navigation">☰</button>
+ <nav class="nav-links">
+ <a href="index.html">Home</a>
+ <a href="about.html">About Us</a>
+ <a href="services.html">Service Lines</a>
+ <a href="careers.html">Careers</a>
+ <a href="contact.html">Contact Us</a>
+ <a href="thought-leadership.html">Meet Our Team</a>
+ <a href="toolkit.html" class="active">Our Toolkit</a>
+ <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
+ </nav>
+ </div>
+ </header>
+
+ <main class="main">
+ <!-- HERO -->
+ <section class="hero">
+ <div class="hero-inner">
+ <div>
+ <div class="hero-eyebrow">Strategic Consulting Methods</div>
+ <h1 class="hero-title">Our Toolkit</h1>
+ <p class="hero-body">
+ Proven methodologies and frameworks designed to drive organizational transformation, clarity, and measurable results. Explore the strategic approaches that guide our consulting engagements.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- TOOLKIT SECTION -->
+ <section class="section section-alt">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="section-header">
+ <h2 class="section-title">Our Methodologies</h2>
+ <p class="section-subtitle">
+ At 3N Consulting, we leverage evidence-based frameworks to help organizations assess current state, align stakeholders, and accelerate results.
+ </p>
+ </div>
+
+ <div class="grid-2">
+ <!-- O-RAM Card -->
+ <div class="toolkit-card">
+ <div class="toolkit-card-icon"></div>
+ <h3 class="toolkit-card-title">Organizational Readiness Assessment Methodology (O-RAM)</h3>
+ <p class="toolkit-card-description">
+ A comprehensive diagnostic framework that evaluates organizational capacity, alignment, and readiness for strategic initiatives and transformation efforts.
+ </p>
+ <div class="toolkit-highlights">
+ <ul>
+ <li>Current-state organizational assessment</li>
+ <li>Stakeholder alignment mapping</li>
+ <li>Capacity and capability analysis</li>
+ <li>Risk and readiness scoring</li>
+ <li>Actionable improvement roadmap</li>
+ </ul>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+
+ <!-- AAA Card -->
+ <div class="toolkit-card">
+ <div class="toolkit-card-icon">⚡</div>
+ <h3 class="toolkit-card-title">Assess–Align–Accelerate (AAA)</h3>
+ <p class="toolkit-card-description">
+ A three-phase engagement model that systematically assesses challenges, aligns leadership and teams, and accelerates implementation of solutions and outcomes.
+ </p>
+ <div class="toolkit-highlights">
+ <ul>
+ <li><strong>Assess:</strong> Deep analysis of organizational challenges and opportunities</li>
+ <li><strong>Align:</strong> Build consensus and synchronize priorities across leadership</li>
+ <li><strong>Accelerate:</strong> Execute solutions with speed and accountability</li>
+ </ul>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+
+ <!-- CTA SECTION -->
+ <section class="section">
+ <div class="section-inner">
+ <div class="cta-section">
+ <h3 style="font-size: 1.3rem; margin-bottom: 1rem;">Ready to Transform Your Organization?</h3>
+ <p style="margin-bottom: 1.5rem; color: #4b5563;">Let's discuss how our proven methodologies can drive clarity, alignment, and results for your initiative.</p>
+ <a href="contact.html" class="btn btn-primary">Start Your Assessment →</a>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ </section>
+ </main>
+
+ <footer class="site-footer">
+ <div class="footer-inner">
+ <div style="flex: 1; min-width: 200px;">
+ <div style="font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">3N Consulting</div>
+ <p style="color: #6b7280;">Results. Delivered.</p>
+ </div>
+ <div class="footer-links">
+ <a href="index.html">Home</a>
+ <a href="about.html">About</a>
+ <a href="services.html">Services</a>
+ <a href="contact.html">Contact</a>
+ <a href="thought-leadership.html">Meet Our Team</a>
+ <a href="toolkit.html">Our Toolkit</a>
+ <a href="disclaimers.html">Disclaimers</a>
+ </div>
+ </div>
+ <div style="text-align: center; margin-top: 1.5rem; padding-top: 1.5rem; border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb; color: #9ca3af;">
+ <p>© 2024 3N Consulting. All rights reserved.</p>
+ </div>
+ </footer>
+</div>
+
+<script src="script.js"></script>
+</body>

## Summary of Changes:

### ✅ New Page Created:
- **`toolkit.html`** - Features our two core methodologies:
 - **Organizational Readiness Assessment Methodology (O-RAM)** - Comprehensive diagnostic framework with assessment and readiness analysis
 - **Assess–Align–Accelerate (AAA)** - Three-phase engagement model for strategic transformation
 - Beautiful card-based formatting with gradient backgrounds and hover effects

### ✅ Navigation Updates Across All Pages (20+ files):
**Header Navigation:** "Our Toolkit" link added to menu before "Disclaimers" on:
- index.html
- about.html
- services.html
- careers.html
- contact.html
- case-studies.html
- disclaimers.html
- solutions.html
- All service line pages (human-capital, procurement, data-analytics, strategy-operations, cio-services, digital-transformation, organizational-redesign, manufacturing)
- All team member profile pages (rachel-demuth, nick-gupta, david-hochman, dyan-sellers, soorya-rajendran, dhatri-mulpuri)
- thought-leadership.html

**Footer Navigation:** "Our Toolkit" link added to footers on:
- index.html (main footer links)
- thought-leadership.html (Quick Links footer)
- All profile pages

The "Our Toolkit" page includes:
- Professional hero section with tagline
- Two beautifully formatted cards with:
 - Cyan blue borders and light gradient backgrounds
 - Icon badges ( for O-RAM, ⚡ for AAA)
 - Descriptive text
 - Key highlights with arrow bullets
 - Hover effects for interactivity
- Call-to-action section linking to contact page
